h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0127^ea^ ^a^V1.0123^ea^ ^a^P1.0101^ea^ ^a^M1.0099^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante {bhaddante (ka0)}''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``yaani kaanici, bhikkhave, bhayaani uppajjanti sabbaani taani baalato uppajjanti, no ^a^V1.0124^ea^ pa.n.ditato. ye keci upaddavaa uppajjanti sabbe te baalato uppajjanti, no pa.n.ditato. ye keci upasaggaa uppajjanti sabbe te baalato uppajjanti, no pa.n.ditato. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, na.laagaaraa vaa ti.naagaaraa vaa {na.laagaara.m vaa ti.naagaara.m vaa (sii0)} aggi mutto {aggimukko (sii0), aggi mukko (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} kuu.taagaaraanipi .dahati ullittaavalittaani nivaataani phusitagga.laani pihitavaatapaanaani; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici bhayaani uppajjanti sabbaani taani baalato uppajjanti, no pa.n.ditato. ye keci upaddavaa uppajjanti sabbe te baalato uppajjanti, no pa.n.ditato. ye keci upasaggaa uppajjanti sabbe te baalato uppajjanti, no pa.n.ditato.

[03] ``iti ^a^M1.0100^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, sappa.tibhayo ^a^T1.0128^ea^ baalo, appa.tibhayo pa.n.dito. saupaddavo baalo, anupaddavo pa.n.dito. saupasaggo baalo, anupasaggo pa.n.dito. natthi, bhikkhave, pa.n.ditato bhaya.m, natthi pa.n.ditato upaddavo, natthi pa.n.ditato upasaggo.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `yehi tiihi dhammehi samannaagato baalo veditabbo te tayo dhamme abhinivajjetvaa, yehi tiihi dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito veditabbo te tayo dhamme samaadaaya vattissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``kammalakkha.no ^a^P1.0102^ea^, bhikkhave, baalo, kammalakkha.no pa.n.dito, apadaanasobhanii {apadaane sobhati (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pa~n~naati {pa~n~natti (?)}. tiihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato baalo veditabbo. katamehi tiihi? kaayaduccaritena, vaciiduccaritena, manoduccaritena. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato baalo veditabbo.

[03] ``tiihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito veditabbo. katamehi tiihi? kaayasucaritena, vaciisucaritena, manosucaritena. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito veditabbo.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `yehi tiihi dhammehi samannaagato baalo veditabbo ^a^V1.0125^ea^ te tayo dhamme abhinivajjetvaa, yehi tiihi dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito veditabbo te tayo dhamme samaadaaya vattissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, baalassa baalalakkha.naani baalanimittaani baalaapadaanaani ^a^T1.0129^ea^. katamaani tii.ni? idha, bhikkhave, baalo duccintitacintii ca hoti dubbhaasitabhaasii ca dukka.takammakaarii ca. no ceda.m {no ceta.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, bhikkhave, baalo duccintitacintii ca abhavissa dubbhaasitabhaasii ca dukka.takammakaarii ca, kena na.m pa.n.ditaa jaaneyyu.m {tena na.m pa.n.ditaa na jaaneyyu.m (ka0), na na.m pa.n.ditaa jaaneyyu.m (?)} -- `baalo aya.m bhava.m asappuriso'ti? yasmaa ^a^M1.0101^ea^ ca kho, bhikkhave, baalo duccintitacintii ca hoti dubbhaasitabhaasii ca dukka.takammakaarii ca tasmaa na.m pa.n.ditaa jaananti -- `baalo aya.m bhava.m asappuriso'ti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni baalassa baalalakkha.naani baalanimittaani baalaapadaanaani.

[03] ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, pa.n.ditassa pa.n.ditalakkha.naani pa.n.ditanimittaani pa.n.ditaapadaanaani. katamaani tii.ni? idha, bhikkhave, pa.n.dito sucintitacintii ca hoti subhaasitabhaasii ca sukatakammakaarii ca. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, pa.n.dito sucintitacintii ca abhavissa subhaasitabhaasii ca sukatakammakaarii ca, kena na.m pa.n.ditaa jaaneyyu.m -- `pa.n.dito aya.m bhava.m sappuriso'ti? yasmaa ^a^P1.0103^ea^ ca kho, bhikkhave, pa.n.dito sucintitacintii ca hoti subhaasitabhaasii ca sukatakammakaarii ca tasmaa na.m pa.n.ditaa jaananti -- `pa.n.dito aya.m bhava.m sappuriso'ti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni pa.n.ditassa pa.n.ditalakkha.naani pa.n.ditanimittaani pa.n.ditaapadaanaani. tasmaatiha.... tatiya.m.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi ^a^T1.0130^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato baalo veditabbo. katamehi tiihi? accaya.m accayato na passati, accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m nappa.tikaroti, parassa kho ^a^V1.0126^ea^ pana accaya.m desentassa yathaadhamma.m nappa.tigga.nhaati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato baalo veditabbo.

[03] ``tiihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito veditabbo. katamehi tiihi? accaya.m accayato passati, accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikaroti, parassa kho pana accaya.m desentassa yathaadhamma.m pa.tigga.nhaati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito veditabbo. tasmaatiha.... catuttha.m.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato baalo veditabbo. katamehi tiihi? ayoniso pa~nha.m kattaa hoti, ayoniso pa~nha.m vissajjetaa hoti, parassa kho pana yoniso pa~nha.m vissajjita.m parima.n.dalehi ^a^M1.0102^ea^ padabya~njanehi sili.t.thehi upagatehi naabbhanumoditaa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato baalo veditabbo.

[03] ``tiihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito veditabbo. katamehi tiihi? yoniso pa~nha.m kattaa hoti, yoniso pa~nha.m vissajjetaa hoti, parassa kho pana yoniso pa~nha.m vissajjita.m parima.n.dalehi padabya~njanehi sili.t.thehi upagatehi abbhanumoditaa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito veditabbo. tasmaatiha.... pa~ncama.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato baalo veditabbo. katamehi ^a^T1.0131^ea^ tiihi? akusalena ^a^P1.0104^ea^ kaayakammena, akusalena vaciikammena, akusalena manokammena. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato baalo veditabbo.

[03] ``tiihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito veditabbo. katamehi tiihi? kusalena kaayakammena ^a^V1.0127^ea^, kusalena vaciikammena, kusalena manokammena. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito veditabbo. tasmaatiha.... cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato baalo veditabbo. katamehi tiihi? saavajjena kaayakammena, saavajjena vaciikammena, saavajjena manokammena...pe0... anavajjena kaayakammena, anavajjena vaciikammena, anavajjena manokammena...pe0.... sattama.m.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato baalo veditabbo. katamehi tiihi? sabyaabajjhena kaayakammena, sabyaabajjhena vaciikammena, sabyaabajjhena manokammena...pe0... abyaabajjhena kaayakammena, abyaabajjhena vaciikammena ^a^M1.0103^ea^, abyaabajjhena manokammena. imehi, kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito veditabbo.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m ^a^T1.0132^ea^ sikkhitabba.m -- `yehi tiihi dhammehi samannaagato baalo veditabbo te tayo dhamme abhinivajjetvaa, yehi tiihi dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito veditabbo te tayo dhamme samaadaaya vattissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi ^a^P1.0105^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato baalo abyatto asappuriso khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. katamehi tiihi? kaayaduccaritena, vaciiduccaritena, manoduccaritena. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato baalo abyatto asappuriso khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati.

[03] ``tiihi ^a^V1.0128^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito viyatto sappuriso akkhata.m anupahata.m attaana.m pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca pu~n~na.m pasavati. katamehi tiihi? kaayasucaritena, vaciisucaritena, manosucaritena. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito viyatto sappuriso akkhata.m anupahata.m attaana.m pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca pu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato tayo male appahaaya yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi tiihi? dussiilo ca hoti, dussiilyamala~ncassa appahiina.m ^a^T1.0133^ea^ hoti; issukii ca hoti, issaamala~ncassa appahiina.m hoti; maccharii ca hoti, maccheramala~ncassa appahiina.m hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato ime tayo male appahaaya yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.

[03] ``tiihi ^a^M1.0104^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato tayo male pahaaya yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi tiihi? siilavaa ca hoti, dussiilyamala~ncassa pahiina.m hoti; anissukii ca hoti, issaamala~ncassa pahiina.m hoti; amaccharii ca hoti, maccheramala~ncassa pahiina.m hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato ime tayo male pahaaya yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge''ti. dasama.m.
[06] baalavaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] bhaya.m lakkha.nacintii ca, accaya~nca ayoniso.
[22] akusala~nca saavajja.m, sabyaabajjhakhata.m malanti..

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi ^a^V1.0129^ea^ ^a^P1.0106^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato ~naato bhikkhu bahujanaahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti bahujanadukkhaaya, bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. katamehi tiihi? ananulomike kaayakamme samaadapeti, ananulomike vaciikamme samaadapeti, ananulomikesu dhammesu samaadapeti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato ~naato bhikkhu bahujanaahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti bahujanadukkhaaya, bahuno janassa ^a^T1.0134^ea^ anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m.

[03] ``tiihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato ~naato bhikkhu bahujanahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti bahujanasukhaaya, bahuno janassa atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. katamehi tiihi? anulomike kaayakamme samaadapeti, anulomike vaciikamme samaadapeti, anulomikesu dhammesu samaadapeti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato ~naato bhikkhu bahujanahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti bahujanasukhaaya, bahuno janassa atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani ^a^M1.0105^ea^, bhikkhave, ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa yaavajiiva.m saara.niiyaani {sara.niiyaani (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhavanti. katamaani tii.ni? yasmi.m, bhikkhave, padese raajaa khattiyo muddhaavasitto jaato hoti. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa yaavajiiva.m saara.niiya.m hoti.
[01] ``puna ^a^V1.0130^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, yasmi.m padese raajaa khattiyo muddhaavasitto hoti. ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa yaavajiiva.m saara.niiya.m hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, yasmi.m padese raajaa khattiyo muddhaavasitto sa"ngaama.m abhivijinitvaa vijitasa"ngaamo tameva sa"ngaamasiisa.m ajjhaavasati. ida.m, bhikkhave, tatiya.m ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa yaavajiiva.m saara.niiya.m hoti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa yaavajiiva.m saara.niiyaani bhavanti.

[03] ``evameva.m ^a^P1.0107^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, tii.nimaani bhikkhussa yaavajiiva.m saara.niiyaani bhavanti. katamaani tii.ni? yasmi.m, bhikkhave, padese bhikkhu kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m ^a^T1.0135^ea^ pabbajito hoti. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m bhikkhussa yaavajiiva.m saara.niiya.m hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, yasmi.m padese bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m bhikkhussa yaavajiiva.m saara.niiya.m hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, yasmi.m padese bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. ida.m, bhikkhave, tatiya.m bhikkhussa yaavajiiva.m saara.niiya.m hoti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni bhikkhussa yaavajiiva.m saara.niiyaani bhavantii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ ``tayome ^a^M1.0106^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? niraaso, aasa.mso, vigataaso. katamo ca, bhikkhave puggalo niraaso? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo niice kule paccaajaato hoti, ca.n.daalakule vaa venakule {ve.nakule (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa nesaadakule vaa ^a^V1.0131^ea^ rathakaarakule vaa pukkusakule vaa dalidde appannapaanabhojane kasiravuttike, yattha kasirena ghaasacchaado labbhati. so ca hoti dubba.n.no duddasiko oko.timako bavhaabaadho {bahvaabaadho (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} kaa.no vaa ku.nii vaa kha~njo vaa pakkhahato vaa, na laabhii annassa paanassa vatthassa yaanassa maalaagandhavilepanassa seyyaavasathapadiipeyyassa. so su.naati -- `itthannaamo kira khattiyo khattiyehi khattiyaabhisekena abhisitto'ti. tassa na eva.m hoti -- `kudaassu naama mampi ^a^T1.0136^ea^ khattiyaa khattiyaabhisekena abhisi~ncissantii'ti! aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo niraaso.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo aasa.mso? idha ^a^P1.0108^ea^, bhikkhave, ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa je.t.tho putto hoti aabhiseko anabhisitto acalappatto {macalappatto (sii0 pii0)}. so su.naati -- `itthannaamo kira khattiyo khattiyehi khattiyaabhisekena abhisitto'ti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `kudaassu naama mampi khattiyaa khattiyaabhisekena abhisi~ncissantii'ti! aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo aasa.mso.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo vigataaso? idha, bhikkhave, raajaa hoti khattiyo muddhaavasitto. so su.naati -- `itthannaamo kira khattiyo khattiyehi khattiyaabhisekena abhisitto'ti. tassa na eva.m hoti -- `kudaassu naama mampi khattiyaa khattiyaabhisekena abhisi~ncissantii'ti! ta.m kissa hetu? yaa hissa, bhikkhave, pubbe anabhisittassa abhisekaasaa saa {saassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pa.tippassaddhaa. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo vigataaso. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m.

[03] ``evameva.m ^a^M1.0107^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa bhikkhuusu. katame tayo? niraaso, aasa.mso, vigataaso. katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo niraaso? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussiilo hoti paapadhammo asuci sa"nkassarasamaacaaro pa.ticchannakammanto assama.no sama.napa.ti~n~no abrahmacaarii brahmacaaripa.ti~n~no antopuuti avassuto kasambujaato. so su.naati -- `itthannaamo kira bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m ^a^T1.0137^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii'ti. tassa na eva.m hoti -- `kudaassu naama ahampi aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m ^a^V1.0132^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissaamii'ti! aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo niraaso.

[01] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo aasa.mso? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti kalyaa.nadhammo. so su.naati ^a^P1.0109^ea^ aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii'ti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `kudaassu naama ahampi aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissaamii'ti! aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo aasa.mso.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo vigataaso? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araha.m hoti khii.naasavo. so su.naati -- `itthannaamo kira bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii'ti. tassa na eva.m hoti -- `kudaassu naama ahampi aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissaamii'ti! ta.m kissa hetu? yaa hissa, bhikkhave, pubbe avimuttassa vimuttaasaa saa pa.tippassaddhaa. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo vigataaso. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa bhikkhuusuu''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ``yopi ^a^T1.0138^ea^ so, bhikkhave, raajaa cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa sopi na araajaka.m cakka.m vattetii''ti. eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^M1.0108^ea^ -- ``ko pana, bhante, ra~n~no cakkavattissa dhammikassa dhammara~n~no raajaa''ti {cakkanti (ka0)}? ``dhammo, bhikkhuu''ti bhagavaa avoca -- ``idha, bhikkhu, raajaa cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa dhamma.myeva nissaaya {garukaronto (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahati antojanasmi.m''.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhu, raajaa cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa dhamma.myeva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m ^a^V1.0133^ea^ rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahati khattiyesu, anuyantesu {anuyuttesu (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, balakaayasmi.m, braahma.nagahapatikesu ^a^P1.0110^ea^, negamajaanapadesu, sama.nabraahma.nesu, migapakkhiisu. sa kho so bhikkhu raajaa cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa dhamma.myeva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa antojanasmi.m, dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa khattiyesu, anuyantesu, balakaayasmi.m, braahma.nagahapatikesu, negamajaanapadesu, sama.nabraahma.nesu, migapakkhiisu, dhammeneva cakka.m vatteti. ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m kenaci manussabhuutena paccatthikena paa.ninaa.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhu {bhikkhave (ka0)}, tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho dhammiko dhammaraajaa dhamma.myeva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo ^a^T1.0139^ea^ dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahati kaayakammasmi.m -- `evaruupa.m kaayakamma.m sevitabba.m, evaruupa.m kaayakamma.m na sevitabba'''nti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhu, tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho dhammiko dhammaraajaa dhamma.myeva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahati vaciikammasmi.m -- `evaruupa.m vaciikamma.m sevitabba.m, evaruupa.m vaciikamma.m na sevitabba'nti...pe0... manokammasmi.m -- `evaruupa.m manokamma.m sevitabba.m, evaruupa.m manokamma.m na sevitabba'''nti.

[03] ``sa ^a^M1.0109^ea^ kho so, bhikkhu, tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho dhammiko dhammaraajaa dhamma.myeva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa kaayakammasmi.m, dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa vaciikammasmi.m, dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahitvaa manokammasmi.m, dhammeneva anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavatteti. ta.m hoti cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V1.0134^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m viharati isipatane migadaaye. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti ^a^P1.0111^ea^ te ^a^T1.0140^ea^ bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, raajaa ahosi sacetano {pacetano (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} naama. atha kho, bhikkhave, raajaa sacetano rathakaara.m aamantesi -- `ito me, samma rathakaara, channa.m maasaana.m accayena sa"ngaamo bhavissati. sakkhissasi {sakkhasi (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} me, samma rathakaara, nava.m cakkayuga.m kaatu'nti? `sakkomi devaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, rathakaaro ra~n~no sacetanassa paccassosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, rathakaaro chahi maasehi chaarattuunehi eka.m cakka.m ni.t.thaapesi. atha kho, bhikkhave, raajaa sacetano rathakaara.m aamantesi -- `ito me, samma rathakaara, channa.m divasaana.m accayena sa"ngaamo bhavissati, ni.t.thita.m nava.m cakkayuga'nti? `imehi kho, deva, chahi maasehi chaarattuunehi eka.m cakka.m ni.t.thita'nti. `sakkhissasi pana me, samma rathakaara, imehi chahi divasehi dutiya.m cakka.m ni.t.thaapetu'nti? `sakkomi devaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, rathakaaro chahi divasehi dutiya.m cakka.m ni.t.thaapetvaa nava.m cakkayuga.m aadaaya yena raajaa sacetano tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m sacetana.m etadavoca -- `ida.m te, deva, nava.m cakkayuga.m ni.t.thita'nti. `ya~nca te ida.m, samma rathakaara, cakka.m chahi maasehi ni.t.thita.m chaarattuunehi ya~nca te ida.m cakka.m chahi divasehi ni.t.thita.m, imesa.m ki.m naanaakara.na.m? nesaaha.m ki~nci naanaakara.na.m passaamii'ti. `atthesa.m, deva, naanaakara.na.m. passatu devo naanaakara.na'''nti.

[03] ``atha ^a^M1.0110^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, rathakaaro ya.m ta.m cakka.m chahi divasehi ni.t.thita.m ta.m pavattesi. ta.m pavattita.m samaana.m yaavatikaa abhisa"nkhaarassa gati taavatika.m gantvaa ci"ngulaayitvaa ^a^T1.0141^ea^ bhuumiya.m papati. ya.m pana ta.m cakka.m chahi maasehi ni.t.thita.m ^a^P1.0112^ea^ chaarattuunehi ta.m pavattesi. ta.m pavattita.m samaana.m yaavatikaa abhisa"nkhaarassa gati taavatika.m gantvaa akkhaahata.m ma~n~ne a.t.thaasi.

[03] ```ko nu kho, samma rathakaara, hetu ko paccayo yamida.m {yadida.m (ka0)} cakka.m chahi divasehi ni.t.thita.m ta.m pavattita.m samaana.m yaavatikaa abhisa"nkhaarassa gati taavatika.m gantvaa ci"ngulaayitvaa bhuumiya.m ^a^V1.0135^ea^ papati? ko pana, samma rathakaara, hetu ko paccayo yamida.m cakka.m chahi maasehi ni.t.thita.m chaarattuunehi ta.m pavattita.m samaana.m yaavatikaa abhisa"nkhaarassa gati taavatika.m gantvaa akkhaahata.m ma~n~ne a.t.thaasii'ti? `yamida.m, deva, cakka.m chahi divasehi ni.t.thita.m tassa nemipi sava"nkaa sadosaa sakasaavaa, araapi sava"nkaa sadosaa sakasaavaa, naabhipi sava"nkaa sadosaa sakasaavaa. ta.m nemiyaapi sava"nkattaa sadosattaa sakasaavattaa, araanampi sava"nkattaa sadosattaa sakasaavattaa, naabhiyaapi sava"nkattaa sadosattaa sakasaavattaa pavattita.m samaana.m yaavatikaa abhisa"nkhaarassa gati taavatika.m gantvaa ci"ngulaayitvaa bhuumiya.m papati. ya.m pana ta.m, deva, cakka.m chahi maasehi ni.t.thita.m chaarattuunehi tassa nemipi ava"nkaa adosaa akasaavaa, araapi ava"nkaa adosaa akasaavaa, naabhipi ava"nkaa adosaa akasaavaa. ta.m nemiyaapi ava"nkattaa adosattaa akasaavattaa, araanampi ava"nkattaa adosattaa akasaavattaa, naabhiyaapi ava"nkattaa adosattaa akasaavattaa pavattita.m samaana.m yaavatikaa abhisa"nkhaarassa gati taavatika.m gantvaa akkhaahata.m ma~n~ne a.t.thaasii'''ti.

[03] ``siyaa kho pana, bhikkhave, tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `a~n~no nuuna tena samayena so ^a^T1.0142^ea^ rathakaaro ahosii'ti! na kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. aha.m tena samayena so rathakaaro ahosi.m. tadaaha.m, bhikkhave, kusalo daaruva"nkaana.m daarudosaana.m daarukasaavaana.m. etarahi kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho kusalo kaayava"nkaana.m kaayadosaana.m ^a^M1.0111^ea^ kaayakasaavaana.m, kusalo vaciiva"nkaana.m vaciidosaana.m vaciikasaavaana.m, kusalo manova"nkaana.m manodosaana.m manokasaavaana.m. yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa kaayava"nko appahiino kaayadoso kaayakasaavo, vaciiva"nko appahiino vaciidoso vaciikasaavo, manova"nko appahiino manodoso manokasaavo, eva.m papatitaa te, bhikkhave, imasmaa dhammavinayaa, seyyathaapi ta.m cakka.m chahi divasehi ni.t.thita.m.

[03] ``yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa kaayava"nko pahiino kaayadoso kaayakasaavo, vaciiva"nko pahiino vaciidoso vaciikasaavo, manova"nko pahiino manodoso manokasaavo ^a^P1.0113^ea^, eva.m pati.t.thitaa te, bhikkhave, imasmi.m dhammavinaye, seyyathaapi ta.m cakka.m chahi maasehi ni.t.thita.m chaarattuunehi.

[03] ``tasmaatiha ^a^V1.0136^ea^, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `kaayava"nka.m pajahissaama kaayadosa.m kaayakasaava.m, vaciiva"nka.m pajahissaama vaciidosa.m vaciikasaava.m, manova"nka.m pajahissaama manodosa.m manokasaava'nti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu apa.n.nakapa.tipada.m {apa.n.nakata.m pa.tipada.m (sii0 pii0) .tiikaaya pana sameti} pa.tipanno hoti, yoni cassa aaraddhaa hoti aasavaana.m khayaaya. katamehi tiihi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti, bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti, jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^T1.0143^ea^ indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m {yatvaadhikara.nameta.m (sii0)} cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m ^a^M1.0112^ea^ manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^P1.0114^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso aahaara.m aahaareti -- `neva davaaya na madaaya na ma.n.danaaya na vibhuusanaaya, yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa yaapanaaya vihi.msuuparatiyaa brahmacariyaanuggahaaya, iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami, nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa ca me bhavissati anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro caa'ti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu divasa.m ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti, rattiyaa pa.thama.m yaama.m ca"nkamena ^a^V1.0137^ea^ nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti, rattiyaa ^a^T1.0144^ea^ majjhima.m yaama.m dakkhi.nena passena siihaseyya.m kappeti paade paada.m accaadhaaya sato sampajaano u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasi karitvaa, rattiyaa pacchima.m yaama.m paccu.t.thaaya ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu apa.n.nakapa.tipada.m pa.tipanno hoti, yoni cassa aaraddhaa hoti aasavaana.m khayaayaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhammaa attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattanti, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattanti, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattanti. katame tayo? kaayaduccarita.m, vaciiduccarita.m, manoduccarita.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhammaa attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattanti, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattanti, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, dhammaa nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattanti, na parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattanti, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattanti. katame tayo? kaayasucarita.m, vaciisucarita.m, manosucarita.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo ^a^M1.0113^ea^ dhammaa nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattanti, na parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattanti, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattantii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ ``sace ^a^P1.0115^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `devalokuupapattiyaa, aavuso, sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m vussathaa'ti? nanu tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m pu.t.thaa a.t.tiiyeyyaatha haraayeyyaatha jiguccheyyaathaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``iti kira tumhe, bhikkhave, dibbena aayunaa a.t.tiiyatha haraayatha jigucchatha, dibbena va.n.nena dibbena sukhena ^a^T1.0145^ea^ dibbena yasena dibbenaadhipateyyena a.t.tiiyatha haraayatha jigucchatha; pageva kho pana, bhikkhave, tumhehi kaayaduccaritena a.t.tiiyitabba.m haraayitabba.m jigucchitabba.m, vaciiduccaritena... manoduccaritena a.t.tiiyitabba.m haraayitabba.m jigucchitabba''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi ^a^V1.0138^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato paapa.niko abhabbo anadhigata.m vaa bhoga.m adhigantu.m, adhigata.m vaa bhoga.m phaati.m kaatu.m. katamehi tiihi? idha, bhikkhave, paapa.niko pubba.nhasamaya.m {majjhantikasamaya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} na sakkacca.m kammanta.m adhi.t.thaati, majjhanhikasamaya.m na sakkacca.m kammanta.m adhi.t.thaati, saayanhasamaya.m na sakkacca.m kammanta.m adhi.t.thaati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi a"ngehi samannaagato paapa.niko abhabbo anadhigata.m vaa bhoga.m adhigantu.m, adhigata.m vaa bhoga.m phaati.m kaatu.m {phaatikattu.m (sii0), phaatikaatu.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu abhabbo anadhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m adhigantu.m, adhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m phaati.m kaatu.m. katamehi tiihi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pubba.nhasamaya.m na sakkacca.m samaadhinimitta.m adhi.t.thaati, majjhanhikasamaya.m na sakkacca.m samaadhinimitta.m adhi.t.thaati, saayanhasamaya.m na sakkacca.m samaadhinimitta.m adhi.t.thaati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu abhabbo anadhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m adhigantu.m, adhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m phaati.m kaatu.m.

[03] ``tiihi ^a^M1.0114^ea^ ^a^P1.0116^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato paapa.niko bhabbo anadhigata.m vaa bhoga.m adhigantu.m, adhigata.m vaa bhoga.m phaati.m kaatu.m. katamehi tiihi? idha ^a^T1.0146^ea^, bhikkhave, paapa.niko pubba.nhasamaya.m sakkacca.m kammanta.m adhi.t.thaati, majjhanhikasamaya.m...pe0... saayanhasamaya.m sakkacca.m kammanta.m adhi.t.thaati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi a"ngehi samannaagato paapa.niko bhabbo anadhigata.m vaa bhoga.m adhigantu.m, adhigata.m vaa bhoga.m phaati.m kaatu.m.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhabbo anadhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m adhigantu.m, adhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m phaati.m kaatu.m. katamehi tiihi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pubba.nhasamaya.m sakkacca.m samaadhinimitta.m adhi.t.thaati, majjhanhikasamaya.m...pe0... saayanhasamaya.m sakkacca.m samaadhinimitta.m adhi.t.thaati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu bhabbo anadhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m adhigantu.m, adhigata.m vaa kusala.m dhamma.m phaati.m kaatu''nti. navama.m.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi ^a^V1.0139^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato paapa.niko nacirasseva mahatta.m vepullatta.m {mahantatta.m vaa vepullatta.m vaa (pii0 ka0)} paapu.naati bhogesu. katamehi tiihi? idha, bhikkhave, paapa.niko cakkhumaa ca hoti vidhuro ca nissayasampanno ca. katha~nca, bhikkhave, paapa.niko cakkhumaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, paapa.niko pa.niya.m jaanaati -- `ida.m pa.niya.m eva.m kiita.m, eva.m vikkayamaana.m {vikkiiyamaana.m (?)}, ettaka.m muula.m bhavissati, ettako udayo'ti {uddayoti (sii0)}. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paapa.niko cakkhumaa hoti.
[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paapa.niko vidhuro hoti? idha, bhikkhave, paapa.niko kusalo hoti pa.niya.m ketu~nca vikketu~nca. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paapa.niko vidhuro hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paapa.niko nissayasampanno hoti? idha ^a^P1.0117^ea^ bhikkhave ^a^T1.0147^ea^, paapa.nika.m ye te gahapatii vaa gahapatiputtaa vaa a.d.dhaa mahaddhanaa mahaabhogaa te eva.m jaananti -- `aya.m kho bhava.m paapa.niko cakkhumaa vidhuro ^a^M1.0115^ea^ ca pa.tibalo puttadaara~nca posetu.m, amhaaka~nca kaalena kaala.m anuppadaatu'nti. te na.m bhogehi nipatanti -- `ito, samma paapa.nika, bhoge karitvaa {haritvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} puttadaara~nca posehi, amhaaka~nca kaalena kaala.m anuppadehii'ti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paapa.niko nissayasampanno hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi a"ngehi samannaagato paapa.niko nacirasseva mahatta.m vepullatta.m paapu.naati bhogesu.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu nacirasseva mahatta.m vepullatta.m paapu.naati kusalesu dhammesu. katamehi tiihi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhumaa ca hoti vidhuro ca nissayasampanno ca. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhumaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhumaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vidhuro hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aaraddhaviiriyo viharati ^a^V1.0140^ea^ akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vidhuro hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissayasampanno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhuu bahussutaa aagataagamaa dhammadharaa vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa te kaalena kaala.m upasa"nkamitvaa paripucchati paripa~nhati ^a^T1.0148^ea^ -- `ida.m, bhante, katha.m, imassa ko attho'ti? tassa te aayasmanto aviva.ta~nceva vivaranti, anuttaaniikata~nca uttaaniikaronti, anekavihitesu ca ka"nkhaa.thaaniyesu dhammesu ka"nkha.m pa.tivinodenti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissayasampanno hoti. imehi ^a^P1.0118^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu nacirasseva mahatta.m vepullatta.m paapu.naati kusalesu dhammesuu''ti. dasama.m.
[06] rathakaaravaggo dutiyo.
[06] pa.thamabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[21] ~naato ^a^M1.0116^ea^ {~naatako (syaa0 ka.m0)} saara.niiyo bhikkhu, cakkavattii sacetano.
[22] apa.n.nakattaa devo ca, duve paapa.nikena caati..

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V1.0141^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa ca samiddho {savi.t.tho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} aayasmaa ca mahaako.t.thiko {mahaako.t.thito (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m samiddha.m aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[03] ``tayome, aavuso samiddha, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? kaayasakkhii, di.t.thippatto {di.t.thappatto (ka0)}, saddhaavimutto. ime kho, aavuso, tayo puggalaa santo ^a^T1.0149^ea^ sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. imesa.m, aavuso, ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti?

[03] ``tayome, aavuso saariputta, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? kaayasakkhii, di.t.thippatto, saddhaavimutto. ime kho, aavuso, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. imesa.m, aavuso, ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m yvaaya.m {yoya.m (ka0)} puggalo saddhaavimutto, aya.m me puggalo khamati imesa.m ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro ca. ta.m kissa hetu? imassa, aavuso, puggalassa saddhindriya.m adhimatta''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m mahaako.t.thika.m etadavoca -- ``tayome, aavuso ko.t.thika, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m ^a^M1.0117^ea^. katame tayo? kaayasakkhii, di.t.thippatto, saddhaavimutto. ime kho, aavuso, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. imesa.m ^a^P1.0119^ea^, aavuso, ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti?

[03] ``tayome ^a^V1.0142^ea^, aavuso saariputta, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? kaayasakkhii, di.t.thippatto, saddhaavimutto. ime kho, aavuso, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. imesa.m, aavuso, ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m yvaaya.m puggalo kaayasakkhii, aya.m me puggalo khamati imesa.m ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro ca. ta.m kissa hetu? imassa, aavuso, puggalassa samaadhindriya.m adhimatta''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``tayome, aavuso saariputta, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? kaayasakkhii ^a^T1.0150^ea^, di.t.thippatto, saddhaavimutto. ime kho, aavuso, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. imesa.m, aavuso, ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m katamo te puggalo khamati abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti?

[03] ``tayome, aavuso ko.t.thika, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? kaayasakkhii, di.t.thippatto, saddhaavimutto. ime kho, aavuso, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. imesa.m, aavuso, ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m yvaaya.m puggalo di.t.thippatto, aya.m me puggalo khamati imesa.m ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro ca. ta.m kissa hetu? imassa, aavuso, puggalassa pa~n~nindriya.m adhimatta''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta~nca samiddha.m aayasmanta~nca mahaako.t.thika.m etadavoca -- ``byaakata.m kho, aavuso, amhehi sabbeheva yathaasaka.m pa.tibhaana.m. aayaamaavuso, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamissaama; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocessaama. yathaa no bhagavaa byaakarissati tathaa na.m dhaaressaamaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa ca samiddho aayasmaa ca mahaako.t.thiko aayasmato saariputtassa ^a^M1.0118^ea^ paccassosu.m. atha kho aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca samiddho aayasmaa ca mahaako.t.thiko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m ^a^P1.0120^ea^ nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto yaavatako ahosi aayasmataa ca samiddhena aayasmataa ca mahaako.t.thikena saddhi.m kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m ^a^T1.0151^ea^ bhagavato aarocesi.

[03] ``na ^a^V1.0143^ea^ khvettha, saariputta, sukara.m eka.msena byaakaatu.m -- `aya.m imesa.m ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa'ti. .thaana~nheta.m, saariputta, vijjati yvaaya.m puggalo saddhaavimutto svaassa {svaaya.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), soya.m (ka0)} arahattaaya pa.tipanno, yvaaya.m puggalo kaayasakkhii svaassa sakadaagaamii vaa anaagaamii vaa, yo caaya.m puggalo di.t.thippatto sopassa {soya.m (ka0)} sakadaagaamii vaa anaagaamii vaa.

[03] ``na khvettha, saariputta, sukara.m eka.msena byaakaatu.m -- `aya.m imesa.m ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa'ti. .thaana~nheta.m, saariputta, vijjati yvaaya.m puggalo kaayasakkhii svaassa arahattaaya pa.tipanno, yvaaya.m puggalo saddhaavimutto svaassa sakadaagaamii vaa anaagaamii vaa, yo caaya.m puggalo di.t.thippatto sopassa sakadaagaamii vaa anaagaamii vaa.

[03] ``na khvettha, saariputta, sukara.m eka.msena byaakaatu.m -- `aya.m imesa.m ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa'ti. .thaana~nheta.m, saariputta, vijjati yvaaya.m puggalo di.t.thippatto svaassa arahattaaya pa.tipanno, yvaaya.m puggalo saddhaavimutto svaassa sakadaagaamii vaa anaagaamii vaa, yo caaya.m puggalo kaayasakkhii sopassa sakadaagaamii vaa anaagaamii vaa.
[03] ``na khvettha, saariputta, sukara.m eka.msena byaakaatu.m -- `aya.m imesa.m ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa'''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ {pu0 pa0 94} ``tayome, bhikkhave, gilaanaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco gilaano labhanto vaa sappaayaani bhojanaani alabhanto vaa sappaayaani bhojanaani, labhanto vaa sappaayaani bhesajjaani ^a^T1.0152^ea^ alabhanto vaa sappaayaani bhesajjaani, labhanto vaa ^a^M1.0119^ea^ ^a^P1.0121^ea^ patiruupa.m upa.t.thaaka.m alabhanto vaa patiruupa.m upa.t.thaaka.m neva vu.t.thaati tamhaa aabaadhaa.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco gilaano labhanto vaa sappaayaani bhojanaani alabhanto vaa sappaayaani bhojanaani, labhanto vaa sappaayaani bhesajjaani alabhanto vaa sappaayaani bhesajjaani ^a^V1.0144^ea^, labhanto vaa patiruupa.m upa.t.thaaka.m alabhanto vaa patiruupa.m upa.t.thaaka.m vu.t.thaati tamhaa aabaadhaa.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco gilaano labhantova sappaayaani bhojanaani no alabhanto, labhantova sappaayaani bhesajjaani no alabhanto, labhantova patiruupa.m upa.t.thaaka.m no alabhanto vu.t.thaati tamhaa aabaadhaa.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m gilaano labhantova sappaayaani bhojanaani no alabhanto, labhantova sappaayaani bhesajjaani no alabhanto, labhantova patiruupa.m upa.t.thaaka.m no alabhanto vu.t.thaati tamhaa aabaadhaa, ima.m kho, bhikkhave, gilaana.m pa.ticca gilaanabhatta.m anu~n~naata.m gilaanabhesajja.m anu~n~naata.m gilaanupa.t.thaako anu~n~naato. ima~nca pana, bhikkhave, gilaana.m pa.ticca a~n~nepi gilaanaa upa.t.thaatabbaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo gilaanaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tayome gilaanuupamaa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo labhanto vaa tathaagata.m dassanaaya alabhanto vaa tathaagata.m dassanaaya, labhanto vaa tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m savanaaya alabhanto vaa tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m ^a^T1.0153^ea^ savanaaya neva okkamati niyaama.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m.

[03] ``idha, pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo labhanto vaa tathaagata.m dassanaaya alabhanto vaa tathaagata.m dassanaaya, labhanto vaa tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m savanaaya alabhanto vaa tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m savanaaya okkamati niyaama.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo labhantova tathaagata.m dassanaaya no alabhanto, labhantova tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m savanaaya no alabhanto okkamati niyaama.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m.

[03] ``tatra ^a^M1.0120^ea^ ^a^P1.0122^ea^, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo labhantova tathaagata.m dassanaaya no alabhanto, labhantova ^a^V1.0145^ea^ tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m savanaaya no alabhanto okkamati niyaama.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m, ima.m kho bhikkhave, puggala.m pa.ticca dhammadesanaa anu~n~naataa. ima~nca pana, bhikkhave, puggala.m pa.ticca a~n~nesampi dhammo desetabbo. ``ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo gilaanuupamaa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabyaabajjha.m {sabyaapajjha.m (sabbattha) evamuparipi} kaayasa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharoti, sabyaabajjha.m vaciisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharoti, sabyaabajjha.m manosa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharoti. so sabyaabajjha.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharitvaa, sabyaabajjha.m vaciisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharitvaa, sabyaabajjha.m manosa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharitvaa sabyaabajjha.m loka.m upapajjati. tamena.m sabyaabajjha.m loka.m ^a^T1.0154^ea^ upapanna.m samaana.m sabyaabajjhaa phassaa phusanti. so sabyaabajjhehi phassehi phu.t.tho samaano sabyaabajjha.m vedana.m vedayati ekantadukkha.m, seyyathaapi sattaa nerayikaa.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abyaabajjha.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharoti, abyaabajjha.m vaciisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharoti, abyaabajjha.m manosa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharoti. so abyaabajjha.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharitvaa, abyaabajjha.m vaciisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharitvaa, abyaabajjha.m manosa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharitvaa abyaabajjha.m loka.m upapajjati. tamena.m abyaabajjha.m loka.m upapanna.m samaana.m abyaabajjhaa phassaa phusanti. so abyaabajjhehi phassehi phu.t.tho samaano abyaabajjha.m vedana.m vedayati ekantasukha.m, seyyathaapi devaa subhaki.nhaa.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi kaayasa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharoti, sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi vaciisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharoti, sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi manosa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharoti. so sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi kaayasa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharitvaa, sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi vaciisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharitvaa, sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi ^a^P1.0123^ea^ manosa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharitvaa sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi loka.m upapajjati. tamena.m sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi loka.m ^a^M1.0121^ea^ upapanna.m samaana.m sabyaabajjhaapi abyaabajjhaapi phassaa ^a^V1.0146^ea^ phusanti. so sabyaabajjhehipi abyaabajjhehipi phassehi phu.t.tho samaano sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi vedana.m vedayati voki.n.nasukhadukkha.m, seyyathaapi manussaa ekacce ca devaa ekacce ca vinipaatikaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ ``tayome ^a^T1.0155^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa puggalassa bahukaaraa. katame tayo? ya.m, bhikkhave, puggala.m aagamma puggalo buddha.m sara.na.m gato hoti, dhamma.m sara.na.m gato hoti, sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gato hoti; aya.m, bhikkhave, puggalo imassa puggalassa bahukaaro.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ya.m puggala.m aagamma puggalo `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; aya.m, bhikkhave, puggalo imassa puggalassa bahukaaro.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ya.m puggala.m aagamma puggalo aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati; aya.m, bhikkhave, puggalo imassa puggalassa bahukaaro. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa puggalassa bahukaaraa.

[03] ``imehi ca pana, bhikkhave, tiihi puggalehi imassa puggalassa nattha~n~no puggalo bahukaaroti vadaami. imesa.m pana, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m iminaa puggalena na suppatikaara.m vadaami, yadida.m abhivaadanapaccu.t.thaanaa~njalikammasaamiicikammaciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasana-gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraanuppadaanenaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ ``tayome ^a^V1.0147^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m ^a^P1.0124^ea^. katame tayo? arukuupamacitto puggalo, vijjuupamacitto puggalo, vajiruupamacitto puggalo. katamo ca, bhikkhave, arukuupamacitto puggalo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upaayaasabahulo appampi ^a^M1.0122^ea^ vutto ^a^T1.0156^ea^ samaano abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, du.t.thaaruko {du.t.thaarukaa (sii0)} ka.t.thena vaa ka.thalaaya {kathalaaya (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0), ka.thalena-kathalena (a.t.thakathaa)} vaa gha.t.tito {gha.t.titaa (sii0)} bhiyyosomattaaya aasava.m deti {assavanoti (sii0)}; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upaayaasabahulo appampi vutto samaano abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, arukuupamacitto puggalo.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, vijjuupamacitto puggalo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. seyyathaapi bhikkhave, cakkhumaa puriso rattandhakaaratimisaaya.m vijjantarikaaya ruupaani passeyya; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, vijjuupamacitto puggalo.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, vajiruupamacitto puggalo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, vajirassa natthi ki~nci abhejja.m ma.ni vaa paasaa.no vaa; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, vajiruupamacitto puggalo. `ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa ^a^T1.0157^ea^ lokasmi'''nti {pu0 pa0 102}. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ ``tayome ^a^V1.0148^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo. atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo. atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo ^a^P1.0125^ea^ sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo. katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo ^a^M1.0123^ea^ na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo hiino hoti siilena samaadhinaa pa~n~naaya. evaruupo, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo a~n~natra anuddayaa a~n~natra anukampaa.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sadiso hoti siilena samaadhinaa pa~n~naaya. evaruupo, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? siilasaama~n~nagataana.m sata.m siilakathaa ca no bhavissati, saa ca no pavattinii {pavattanii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) pu0 pa0 122 passitabba.m} bhavissati, saa ca no phaasu bhavissati. samaadhisaama~n~nagataana.m sata.m samaadhikathaa ca no bhavissati, saa ca no pavattinii bhavissati, saa ca no phaasu bhavissati. pa~n~naasaama~n~nagataana.m sata.m pa~n~naakathaa ca no bhavissati, saa ca no pavattinii bhavissati, saa ca no phaasu bhavissatiiti. tasmaa evaruupo puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo? idha, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0158^ea^, ekacco puggalo adhiko hoti siilena samaadhinaa pa~n~naaya. evaruupo, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? iti aparipuura.m vaa siilakkhandha.m paripuuressaami, paripuura.m vaa siilakkhandha.m tattha tattha pa~n~naaya anuggahessaami; aparipuura.m vaa samaadhikkhandha.m paripuuressaami, paripuura.m vaa samaadhikkhandha.m tattha tattha pa~n~naaya anuggahessaami; aparipuura.m vaa pa~n~naakkhandha.m paripuuressaami, paripuura.m vaa pa~n~naakkhandha.m tattha tattha pa~n~naaya anuggahessaamiiti. tasmaa evaruupo puggalo sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti.
[21] ``nihiiyati ^a^V1.0149^ea^ ^a^P1.0126^ea^ puriso nihiinasevii,
[27] na ca haayetha kadaaci tulyasevii.
[26] se.t.thamupanama.m udeti khippa.m,
[22] tasmaa attano uttari.m bhajethaa''ti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ ``tayome ^a^M1.0124^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo. atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo. atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo. katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo? idha ^a^T1.0159^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussiilo hoti paapadhammo asuci sa"nkassarasamaacaaro pa.ticchannakammanto, assama.no sama.napa.ti~n~no, abrahmacaarii brahmacaaripa.ti~n~no, antopuuti avassuto kasambujaato. evaruupo, bhikkhave, puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? ki~ncaapi, bhikkhave, evaruupassa puggalassa na di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati, atha kho na.m paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati -- `paapamitto purisapuggalo paapasahaayo paapasampava"nko'ti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ahi guuthagato ki~ncaapi na da.msati {.da.msati (sii0 syaa0), .dassati (pii0)}, atha kho na.m makkheti; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, ki~ncaapi evaruupassa puggalassa na di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati, atha kho na.m paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati -- `paapamitto purisapuggalo paapasahaayo paapasampava"nko'ti. tasmaa evaruupo puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upaayaasabahulo ^a^P1.0127^ea^, appampi vutto samaano abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, du.t.thaaruko ka.t.thena vaa ka.thalaaya vaa gha.t.tito bhiyyosomattaaya aasava.m deti; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave...pe0... seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, tindukaalaata.m ^a^V1.0150^ea^ ka.t.thena ^a^T1.0160^ea^ vaa ka.thalaaya vaa gha.t.tita.m bhiyyosomattaaya cicci.taayati ci.tici.taayati; evameva.m kho bhikkhave...pe0... seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, guuthakuupo ka.t.thena vaa ka.thalaaya vaa gha.t.tito bhiyyosomattaaya duggandho hoti; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo ^a^M1.0125^ea^ kodhano hoti upaayaasabahulo, appampi vutto samaano abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. evaruupo, bhikkhave, puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? akkoseyyapi ma.m paribhaaseyyapi ma.m anatthampi ma.m kareyyaati. tasmaa evaruupo puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo siilavaa hoti kalyaa.nadhammo. evaruupo, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? ki~ncaapi, bhikkhave, evaruupassa puggalassa na di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati, atha kho na.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggacchati -- `kalyaa.namitto purisapuggalo kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko'ti. tasmaa evaruupo puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo. `ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi'''nti.
[21] ``nihiiyati ^a^T1.0161^ea^ puriso nihiinasevii,
[27] na ca haayetha kadaaci tulyasevii.
[26] se.t.thamupanama.m udeti khippa.m,
[22] tasmaa attano uttari.m bhajethaa''ti.. sattama.m.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m ^a^P1.0128^ea^. katame tayo? guuthabhaa.nii, pupphabhaa.nii, madhubhaa.nii. katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo guuthabhaa.nii? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabhaggato vaa parisaggato vaa {sabhaagato vaa parisaagato vaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} ~naatimajjhagato vaa puugamajjhagato vaa raajakulamajjhagato vaa abhiniito sakkhipu.t.tho -- `ehambho purisa, ya.m jaanaasi ta.m vadehii'ti. so ^a^V1.0151^ea^ ajaana.m vaa aaha `jaanaamii'ti, jaana.m vaa aaha `na jaanaamii'ti, apassa.m vaa aaha `passaamii'ti, passa.m vaa aaha `na ^a^M1.0126^ea^ passaamii'ti {ma0 ni0 1.440; pu0 pa0 91}; iti attahetu vaa parahetu vaa aamisaki~ncikkhahetu vaa sampajaanamusaa bhaasitaa hoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo guuthabhaa.nii.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo pupphabhaa.nii? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabhaggato vaa parisaggato vaa ~naatimajjhagato vaa puugamajjhagato vaa raajakulamajjhagato vaa abhiniito sakkhipu.t.tho -- `ehambho purisa, ya.m pajaanaasi ta.m vadehii'ti, so ajaana.m vaa aaha `na jaanaamii'ti, jaana.m vaa aaha `jaanaamii'ti, apassa.m vaa aaha `na passaamii'ti, passa.m vaa aaha `passaamii'ti; iti attahetu vaa parahetu vaa aamisaki~ncikkhahetu vaa na sampajaanamusaa bhaasitaa hoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo ^a^T1.0162^ea^ pupphabhaa.nii.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo madhubhaa.nii? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti; yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo madhubhaa.nii. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? andho, ekacakkhu, dvicakkhu. katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo andho? idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa tathaaruupa.m cakkhu na ^a^P1.0129^ea^ hoti yathaaruupena cakkhunaa anadhigata.m vaa bhoga.m adhigaccheyya adhigata.m vaa bhoga.m phaati.m kareyya {phaatikareyya (sii0)}; tathaaruupampissa cakkhu na hoti yathaaruupena cakkhunaa kusalaakusale dhamme jaaneyya, saavajjaanavajje dhamme jaaneyya, hiinappa.niite dhamme jaaneyya, ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaage dhamme jaaneyya. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo andho.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo ekacakkhu? idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa tathaaruupa.m ^a^V1.0152^ea^ cakkhu hoti yathaaruupena cakkhunaa anadhigata.m vaa bhoga.m ^a^M1.0127^ea^ adhigaccheyya adhigata.m vaa bhoga.m phaati.m kareyya; tathaaruupa.m panassa {tathaaruupampissa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} cakkhu na hoti yathaaruupena cakkhunaa kusalaakusale dhamme jaaneyya, saavajjaanavajje dhamme jaaneyya, hiinappa.niite dhamme jaaneyya, ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaage ^a^T1.0163^ea^ dhamme jaaneyya. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo ekacakkhu.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo dvicakkhu? idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa tathaaruupa.m cakkhu hoti yathaaruupena cakkhunaa anadhigata.m vaa bhoga.m adhigaccheyya, adhigata.m vaa bhoga.m phaati.m kareyya; tathaaruupampissa cakkhu hoti yathaaruupena cakkhunaa kusalaakusale dhamme jaaneyya; saavajjaanavajje dhamme jaaneyya, hiinappa.niite dhamme jaaneyya, ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaage dhamme jaaneyya. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo dvicakkhu. `ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi'''nti.
[21] ``na ceva bhogaa tathaaruupaa, na ca pu~n~naani kubbati.
[22] ubhayattha kaliggaaho, andhassa hatacakkhuno..
[21] ``athaaparaaya.m akkhaato, ekacakkhu ca puggalo.
[22] dhammaadhammena sa.thoso {sa.msa.t.tho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), sa.thoti (ka0)}, bhogaani pariyesati..
[21] ``theyyena kuu.takammena, musaavaadena cuubhaya.m.
[27] kusalo hoti sa"nghaatu.m {sa.mhaatu.m (syaa0)}, kaamabhogii ca maanavo.
[22] ito so niraya.m gantvaa, ekacakkhu viha~n~nati..
[21] ``dvicakkhu pana akkhaato, se.t.tho purisapuggalo.
[22] dhammaladdhehi bhogehi, u.t.thaanaadhigata.m dhana.m..
[21] ``dadaati ^a^P1.0130^ea^ se.t.thasa"nkappo, abyaggamaanaso naro.
[22] upeti bhaddaka.m .thaana.m, yattha gantvaa na socati..
[21] ``andha~nca ^a^V1.0153^ea^ ekacakkhu~nca, aarakaa parivajjaye.
[22] dvicakkhu.m ^a^T1.0164^ea^ pana sevetha, se.t.tha.m purisapuggala''nti.. navama.m.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ ``tayome ^a^M1.0128^ea^, bhikkhave {pu0 pa0 107-108}, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? avakujjapa~n~no puggalo, uccha"ngapa~n~no puggalo, puthupa~n~no puggalo. katamo ca, bhikkhave, avakujjapa~n~no puggalo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo aaraama.m gantaa hoti abhikkha.na.m bhikkhuuna.m santike dhammassavanaaya. tassa bhikkhuu dhamma.m desenti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasenti. so tasmi.m aasane nisinno tassaa kathaaya neva aadi.m manasi karoti, na majjha.m manasi karoti, na pariyosaana.m manasi karoti; vu.t.thitopi tamhaa aasanaa tassaa kathaaya neva aadi.m manasi karoti, na majjha.m manasi karoti, na pariyosaana.m manasi karoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kumbho nikkujjo {nikkujjo (sii0 pii0)} tatra udaka.m aasitta.m viva.t.tati, no sa.n.thaati; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo aaraama.m gantaa hoti abhikkha.na.m bhikkhuuna.m santike dhammassavanaaya. tassa bhikkhuu dhamma.m desenti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasenti. so tasmi.m aasane nisinno tassaa kathaaya neva aadi.m manasi karoti, na majjha.m manasi karoti, na pariyosaana.m manasi karoti; vu.t.thitopi tamhaa aasanaa tassaa kathaaya nevaadi.m manasi karoti, na majjha.m manasi karoti, na pariyosaana.m manasi karoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, avakujjapa~n~no ^a^T1.0165^ea^ puggalo.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, uccha"ngapa~n~no puggalo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo aaraama.m gantaa hoti abhikkha.na.m bhikkhuuna.m santike dhammassavanaaya. tassa bhikkhuu dhamma.m desenti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasenti. so tasmi.m aasane nisinno tassaa kathaaya aadimpi manasi karoti, majjhampi manasi karoti, pariyosaanampi manasi karoti; vu.t.thito ca kho tamhaa aasanaa tassaa kathaaya nevaadi.m manasi karoti, na majjha.m manasi karoti, na pariyosaana.m manasi karoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, purisassa uccha"nge naanaakhajjakaani aaki.n.naani -- tilaa ^a^V1.0154^ea^ ta.n.dulaa modakaa badaraa. so tamhaa aasanaa vu.t.thahanto ^a^P1.0131^ea^ satisammosaa pakireyya ^a^M1.0129^ea^. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo aaraama.m gantaa hoti abhikkha.na.m bhikkhuuna.m santike dhammassavanaaya. tassa bhikkhuu dhamma.m desenti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasenti. so tasmi.m aasane nisinno tassaa kathaaya aadimpi manasi karoti, majjhampi manasi karoti, pariyosaanampi manasi karoti; vu.t.thito ca kho tamhaa aasanaa tassaa kathaaya neva aadi.m manasi karoti, na majjha.m manasi karoti, na pariyosaana.m manasi karoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, uccha"ngapa~n~no puggalo.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puthupa~n~no puggalo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo aaraama.m gantaa hoti abhikkha.na.m bhikkhuuna.m ^a^T1.0166^ea^ santike dhammassavanaaya. tassa bhikkhuu dhamma.m desenti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasenti. so tasmi.m aasane nisinno tassaa kathaaya aadimpi manasi karoti, majjhampi manasi karoti, pariyosaanampi manasi karoti; vu.t.thitopi tamhaa aasanaa tassaa kathaaya aadimpi manasi karoti, majjhampi manasi karoti, pariyosaanampi manasi karoti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kumbho ukkujjo tatra udaka.m aasitta.m sa.n.thaati no viva.t.tati; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo aaraama.m gantaa hoti abhikkha.na.m bhikkhuuna.m santike dhammassavanaaya. tassa bhikkhuu dhamma.m desenti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasenti. so tasmi.m aasane nisinno tassaa kathaaya aadimpi manasi karoti, majjhampi manasi karoti, pariyosaanampi manasi karoti; vu.t.thitopi tamhaa aasanaa tassaa kathaaya aadimpi manasi karoti, majjhampi manasi karoti, pariyosaanampi manasi karoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puthupa~n~no puggalo. `ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi'''nti.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, saariputta, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `imasmi~nca savi~n~naa.nake kaaye aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaanusayaa na bhavissanti, bahiddhaa ca sabbanimittesu aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaanusayaa na bhavissanti, ya~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m ^a^M1.0133^ea^ upasampajja viharato aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaanusayaa na honti ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m upasampajja viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi kho, saariputta, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, nidaanaani kammaana.m samudayaaya. katamaani tii.ni? lobho nidaana.m kammaana.m samudayaaya, doso nidaana.m kammaana.m samudayaaya, moho nidaana.m kammaana.m samudayaaya.

[03] ``ya.m, bhikkhave, lobhapakata.m kamma.m lobhaja.m lobhanidaana.m lobhasamudaya.m, yatthassa attabhaavo nibbattati tattha ta.m kamma.m vipaccati. yattha ta.m kamma.m vipaccati tattha tassa kammassa vipaaka.m pa.tisa.mvedeti, di.t.the vaa dhamme upapajja vaa {upapajje vaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0) upapajjitvaati ma0 ni0 3.303 paa.liyaa sa.mva.n.nanaa} apare vaa {aparaapare vaa (ka0)} pariyaaye.

[03] ``ya.m ^a^M1.0134^ea^, bhikkhave, dosapakata.m kamma.m dosaja.m dosanidaana.m dosasamudaya.m, yatthassa attabhaavo nibbattati tattha ta.m kamma.m vipaccati. yattha ta.m kamma.m vipaccati tattha tassa kammassa vipaaka.m pa.tisa.mvedeti, di.t.the vaa dhamme upapajja vaa apare vaa pariyaaye.

[03] ``ya.m, bhikkhave, mohapakata.m kamma.m mohaja.m mohanidaana.m mohasamudaya.m, yatthassa attabhaavo nibbattati tattha ta.m kamma.m vipaccati. yattha ta.m kamma.m vipaccati tattha ^a^P1.0135^ea^ tassa kammassa vipaaka.m pa.tisa.mvedeti, di.t.the vaa dhamme upapajja ^a^T1.0172^ea^ vaa apare vaa pariyaaye.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, biijaani akha.n.daani apuutiini avaataatapahataani saaraadaani sukhasayitaani sukhette suparikammakataaya bhuumiyaa nikkhittaani. devo ca sammaadhaara.m anuppaveccheyya. evassu taani, bhikkhave, biijaani vuddhi.m viru.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjeyyu.m. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, ya.m lobhapakata.m kamma.m lobhaja.m lobhanidaana.m lobhasamudaya.m, yatthassa attabhaavo nibbattati tattha ta.m kamma.m vipaccati. yattha ta.m kamma.m vipaccati tattha tassa kammassa vipaaka.m pa.tisa.mvedeti, di.t.the vaa dhamme upapajja vaa apare vaa pariyaaye.

[03] ``ya.m ^a^V1.0160^ea^ dosapakata.m kamma.m...pe0... ya.m mohapakata.m kamma.m mohaja.m mohanidaana.m mohasamudaya.m, yatthassa attabhaavo nibbattati tattha ta.m kamma.m vipaccati. yattha ta.m kamma.m vipaccati tattha tassa kammassa vipaaka.m pa.tisa.mvedeti, di.t.the vaa dhamme upapajja vaa apare vaa pariyaaye. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni nidaanaani kammaana.m samudayaaya.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa aa.laviya.m viharati gomagge si.msapaavane pa.n.nasanthare. atha kho hatthako aa.lavako ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano addasa bhagavanta.m gomagge si.msapaavane pa.n.nasanthare nisinna.m. disvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^T1.0174^ea^ bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho hatthako aa.lavako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kacci, bhante, bhagavaa sukhamasayitthaa''ti? ``eva.m ^a^M1.0136^ea^, kumaara, sukhamasayittha.m. ye ca pana loke sukha.m senti, aha.m tesa.m a~n~nataro''ti.

[03] ``siitaa, bhante, hemantikaa ratti, antara.t.thako himapaatasamayo, kharaa goka.n.takahataa bhuumi, tanuko pa.n.nasantharo, vira.laani rukkhassa ^a^P1.0137^ea^ pattaani, siitaani kaasaayaani vatthaani, siito ca verambho vaato vaayati. atha ca pana bhagavaa evamaaha -- `eva.m, kumaara, sukhamasayittha.m. ye ca pana loke sukha.m senti, aha.m tesa.m a~n~nataro'''ti.

[03] ``tena hi, kumaara, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami. yathaa te khameyya tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, kumaara, idhassa gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa kuu.taagaara.m ullittaavalitta.m nivaata.m phusitagga.la.m pihitavaatapaana.m. tatrassa palla"nko gonakatthato pa.tikatthato pa.talikatthato ^a^V1.0162^ea^ kadalimigapavarapaccatthara.no {kaadalimigapavarapaccatthara.no (sii0)} sauttaracchado ubhato lohitakuupadhaano; telappadiipo cettha jhaayeyya {jaaleyya (ka0)}; catasso ca {tasseva (ka0)} pajaapatiyo manaapaamanaapena paccupa.t.thitaa assu. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, kumaara, sukha.m vaa so sayeyya no vaa? katha.m vaa te ettha hotii''ti? ``sukha.m so, bhante, sayeyya. ye ca pana loke sukha.m senti, so tesa.m a~n~nataro''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, kumaara, api nu tassa gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa uppajjeyyu.m raagajaa pari.laahaa kaayikaa vaa cetasikaa vaa yehi so raagajehi pari.laahehi pari.dayhamaano dukkha.m sayeyyaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''ti.

[03] ``yehi ^a^T1.0175^ea^ kho so, kumaara, gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa raagajehi pari.laahehi pari.dayhamaano dukkha.m sayeyya, so raago tathaagatassa pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava"nkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. tasmaaha.m sukhamasayittha.m.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, kumaara, api nu tassa gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa uppajjeyyu.m dosajaa pari.laahaa...pe0... mohajaa pari.laahaa kaayikaa vaa cetasikaa vaa yehi so mohajehi pari.laahehi pari.dayhamaano dukkha.m sayeyyaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''ti.

[03] ``ye ^a^M1.0137^ea^ hi kho so, kumaara, gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa mohajehi pari.laahehi pari.dayhamaano dukkha.m sayeyya, so moho tathaagatassa pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava"nkato ^a^P1.0138^ea^ aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. tasmaaha.m sukhamasayittha''nti.
[21] {cuu.lava0 305; sa.m0 ni0 1.242} ``sabbadaa ve sukha.m seti, braahma.no parinibbuto.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani ^a^V1.0163^ea^, bhikkhave, devaduutaani. katamaani tii.ni? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati. so kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa, vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa, manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. tamena.m, bhikkhave, nirayapaalaa naanaabaahaasu gahetvaa yamassa ra~n~no dassenti -- `aya.m, deva, puriso amatteyyo ^a^T1.0176^ea^ apetteyyo asaama~n~no abrahma~n~no, na kule je.t.thaapacaayii. imassa devo da.n.da.m pa.netuu'''ti.

[03] ``tamena.m, bhikkhave, yamo raajaa pa.thama.m devaduuta.m samanuyu~njati samanugaahati samanubhaasati -- `ambho, purisa, na tva.m addasa manussesu pa.thama.m devaduuta.m paatubhuuta'nti? so evamaaha -- `naaddasa.m, bhante'''ti.

[03] ``tamena.m, bhikkhave, yamo raajaa evamaaha -- `ambho purisa, na tva.m addasa manussesu itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa aasiitika.m vaa naavutika.m vaa vassasatika.m vaa {passa ma0 ni0 3.263} jaatiyaa ji.n.na.m gopaanasiva"nka.m bhogga.m da.n.daparaaya.na.m {da.n.daparaayana.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pavedhamaana.m gacchanta.m aatura.m gatayobbana.m kha.n.dadanta.m palitakesa.m viluuna.m khallitasira.m {khalita.m siro (sii0 pii0), khalitasira.m (syaa0 ka.m0) ma0 ni0 3.263} valita.m tilakaahatagatta'nti? so evamaaha -- `addasa.m, bhante'''ti.

[03] ``tamena.m ^a^M1.0138^ea^, bhikkhave, yamo raajaa evamaaha -- `ambho, purisa, tassa te vi~n~nussa sato mahallakassa na etadahosi -- ahampi khomhi jaraadhammo jara.m anatiito, handaaha.m kalyaa.na.m karomi, kaayena vaacaaya manasaa'ti? so ^a^P1.0139^ea^ evamaaha -- `naasakkhissa.m, bhante. pamaadassa.m, bhante'''ti.

[03] ``tamena.m, bhikkhave, yamo raajaa evamaaha -- `ambho, purisa, pamaadataaya {pamaadavataaya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) ma0 ni0 3.262} na kalyaa.namakaasi kaayena vaacaaya manasaa. taggha tva.m {ta.m (ka0)}, ambho purisa, tathaa karissanti yathaa ta.m {te (ka0)} pamatta.m. ta.m kho pana te eta.m {ta.m kho paneta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} paapakamma.m {paapa.m kamma.m (sii0)} neva maataraa kata.m, na pitaraa kata.m, na bhaataraa kata.m, na bhaginiyaa kata.m, na mittaamaccehi kata.m, na ~naatisaalohitehi kata.m, na devataahi kata.m ^a^V1.0164^ea^, na sama.nabraahma.nehi kata.m; atha kho tayaaveta.m paapakamma.m kata.m, tva~n~nevetassa vipaaka.m pa.tisa.mvedissasii'''ti.

[03] ``tamena.m, bhikkhave, yamo raajaa pa.thama.m devaduuta.m ^a^T1.0177^ea^ samanuyu~njitvaa samanugaahitvaa samanubhaasitvaa, dutiya.m devaduuta.m samanuyu~njati samanugaahati samanubhaasati -- `ambho purisa, na tva.m addasa manussesu dutiya.m devaduuta.m paatubhuuta'nti? so evamaaha -- `naaddasa.m, bhante'ti. ``tamena.m, bhikkhave, yamo raajaa evamaaha -- `ambho purisa, na tva.m addasa manussesu itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa aabaadhika.m dukkhita.m baa.lhagilaana.m, sake muttakariise palipanna.m semaana.m, a~n~nehi vu.t.thaapiyamaana.m, a~n~nehi sa.mvesiyamaana'nti? so evamaaha -- `addasa.m, bhante'''ti.

[03] ``tamena.m, bhikkhave, yamo raajaa evamaaha -- `ambho purisa, tassa te vi~n~nussa sato mahallakassa na etadahosi -- ahampi khomhi byaadhidhammo byaadhi.m anatiito, handaaha.m kalyaa.na.m karomi kaayena vaacaaya manasaa'ti? so evamaaha -- `naasakkhissa.m, bhante. pamaadassa.m, bhante'''ti.

[03] ``tamena.m, bhikkhave, yamo raajaa evamaaha -- `ambho purisa ^a^P1.0140^ea^, pamaadataaya na kalyaa.namakaasi kaayena vaacaaya manasaa. taggha tva.m, ambho purisa, tathaa karissanti yathaa ta.m pamatta.m. ta.m kho pana te eta.m paapakamma.m neva maataraa kata.m, na pitaraa kata.m, na bhaataraa kata.m, na bhaginiyaa kata.m, na mittaamaccehi ^a^M1.0139^ea^ kata.m, na ~naatisaalohitehi kata.m, na devataahi kata.m, na sama.nabraahma.nehi kata.m; atha kho tayaaveta.m paapakamma.m kata.m. tva~n~nevetassa vipaaka.m pa.tisa.mvedissasii'''ti.

[03] ``tamena.m, bhikkhave, yamo raajaa dutiya.m devaduuta.m samanuyu~njitvaa samanugaahitvaa samanubhaasitvaa, tatiya.m devaduuta.m samanuyu~njati samanugaahati samanubhaasati -- `ambho purisa, na tva.m addasa manussesu ^a^T1.0178^ea^ tatiya.m devaduuta.m paatubhuuta'nti? so evamaaha -- `naaddasa.m, bhante'''ti.

[03] ``tamena.m, bhikkhave, yamo raajaa evamaaha -- `ambho purisa, na tva.m addasa manussesu itthi.m ^a^V1.0165^ea^ vaa purisa.m vaa ekaahamata.m vaa dviihamata.m vaa tiihamata.m vaa uddhumaataka.m viniilaka.m vipubbakajaata'nti? so evamaaha -- `addasa.m, bhante'''ti.

[03] ``tamena.m, bhikkhave, yamo raajaa evamaaha -- `ambho purisa, tassa te vi~n~nussa sato mahallakassa na etadahosi -- ahampi khomhi mara.nadhammo mara.na.m anatiito, handaaha.m kalyaa.na.m karomi kaayena vaacaaya manasaa'ti? so evamaaha -- `naasakkhissa.m, bhante. pamaadassa.m, bhante'''ti.

[03] ``tamena.m, bhikkhave, yamo raajaa evamaaha -- `ambho purisa, pamaadataaya na kalyaa.namakaasi kaayena vaacaaya manasaa. taggha tva.m, ambho purisa, tathaa karissanti yathaa ta.m pamatta.m. ta.m kho pana te eta.m paapakamma.m neva maataraa kata.m, na pitaraa kata.m, na bhaataraa kata.m, na bhaginiyaa kata.m, na mittaamaccehi kata.m, na ~naatisaalohitehi kata.m, na devataahi kata.m, na sama.nabraahma.nehi kata.m; atha kho tayaaveta.m paapakamma.m kata.m. tva~n~nevetassa vipaaka.m pa.tisa.mvedissasii'''ti.

[03] ``tamena.m, bhikkhave, yamo raajaa tatiya.m devaduuta.m samanuyu~njitvaa samanugaahitvaa samanubhaasitvaa tu.nhii hoti. tamena.m ^a^P1.0141^ea^, bhikkhave, nirayapaalaa pa~ncavidhabandhana.m naama kaara.na.m karonti. tatta.m ayokhila.m hatthe gamenti. tatta.m ayokhila.m dutiyasmi.m hatthe gamenti. tatta.m ayokhila.m paade gamenti. tatta.m ayokhila.m dutiyasmi.m paade gamenti. tatta.m ayokhila.m majjhe urasmi.m gamenti. so tattha dukkhaa ^a^T1.0179^ea^ tibbaa {tippaa (sii0)} kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyati, na ca taava kaala"nkaroti yaava na ta.m paapakamma.m byantiihoti.

[03] ``tamena.m ^a^M1.0140^ea^, bhikkhave, nirayapaalaa sa.mvesetvaa {sa.mka.d.dhitvaa (ka0)} kudhaariihi tacchanti. so tattha dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyati, na ca taava kaala"nkaroti yaava na ta.m paapakamma.m byantiihoti.

[03] ``tamena.m, bhikkhave, nirayapaalaa uddha.mpaada.m adhosira.m gahetvaa vaasiihi tacchanti...pe0... tamena.m, bhikkhave, nirayapaalaa rathe yojetvaa aadittaaya bhuumiyaa sampajjalitaaya sajotibhuutaaya {sa~njotibhuutaaya (syaa0 ka.m0)} saarentipi paccaasaarentipi...pe0... tamena.m, bhikkhave, nirayapaalaa mahanta.m a"ngaarapabbata.m aaditta.m ^a^V1.0166^ea^ sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m aaropentipi oropentipi...pe0... tamena.m, bhikkhave, nirayapaalaa uddha.mpaada.m adhosira.m gahetvaa tattaaya lohakumbhiyaa pakkhipanti, aadittaaya sampajjalitaaya sajotibhuutaaya. so tattha phe.nuddehaka.m paccamaano sakimpi uddha.m gacchati, sakimpi adho gacchati, sakimpi tiriya.m gacchati. so tattha dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vediyati, na ca taava kaala.m karoti yaava na ta.m paapakamma.m byantiihoti. tamena.m, bhikkhave, nirayapaalaa mahaaniraye pakkhipanti. so kho pana, bhikkhave, mahaanirayo --
[21] ``catukka.n.no catudvaaro, vibhatto bhaagaso mito.
[22] ayopaakaarapariyanto, ayasaa pa.tikujjito..
[21] ``tassa ^a^P1.0142^ea^ ayomayaa bhuumi, jalitaa tejasaa yutaa.
[22] samantaa ^a^T1.0180^ea^ yojanasata.m, pharitvaa ti.t.thati sabbadaa''ti {pe0 va0 70-71, 240-241}..

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, yamassa ra~n~no etadahosi -- `ye kira, bho, loke paapakaani kammaani karonti te evaruupaa vividhaa kammakaara.naa kariiyanti. aho vataaha.m manussatta.m labheyya.m, tathaagato ca loke uppajjeyya araha.m sammaasambuddho, ta~ncaaha.m bhagavanta.m payirupaaseyya.m. so ca me bhagavaa dhamma.m deseyya, tassa caaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m aajaaneyya'nti. ta.m kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, na a~n~nassa sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa sutvaa eva.m vadaami, api ca kho, bhikkhave, yadeva me saama.m ~naata.m saama.m di.t.tha.m saama.m vidita.m tadevaaha.m vadaamii''ti.
[21] ``coditaa ^a^M1.0141^ea^ devaduutehi, ye pamajjanti maa.navaa.
[22] te diigharatta.m socanti, hiinakaayuupagaa naraa..
[21] ``ye ca kho devaduutehi, santo sappurisaa idha.
[22] coditaa nappamajjanti, ariyadhamme kudaacana.m..
[21] ``upaadaane ^a^V1.0167^ea^ bhaya.m disvaa, jaatimara.nasambhave.
[22] anupaadaa vimuccanti, jaatimara.nasa"nkhaye..
[21] ``te appamattaa {te khoppamattaa (sii0), te khemappattaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) ma0 ni0 3.271} sukhino {sukhitaa (sii0 syaa0)}, di.t.thadhammaabhinibbutaa.
[22] sabbaverabhayaatiitaa, sabbadukkha.m upaccagu''nti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thamiya.m, bhikkhave, pakkhassa catunna.m mahaaraajaana.m amaccaa paarisajjaa ima.m loka.m anuvicaranti -- `kacci bahuu manussaa manussesu matteyyaa petteyyaa saama~n~naa brahma~n~naa kule je.t.thaapacaayino uposatha.m ^a^T1.0181^ea^ upavasanti pa.tijaagaronti pu~n~naani karontii'ti. caatuddasi.m, bhikkhave, pakkhassa catunna.m mahaaraajaana.m puttaa ima.m loka.m anuvicaranti -- `kacci bahuu manussaa manussesu matteyyaa petteyyaa saama~n~naa brahma~n~naa kule je.t.thaapacaayino ^a^P1.0143^ea^ uposatha.m upavasanti pa.tijaagaronti pu~n~naani karontii'ti. tadahu, bhikkhave, uposathe pannarase cattaaro mahaaraajaano saama~n~neva ima.m loka.m anuvicaranti -- `kacci bahuu manussaa manussesu matteyyaa petteyyaa saama~n~naa brahma~n~naa kule je.t.thaapacaayino uposatha.m upavasanti pa.tijaagaronti pu~n~naani karontii'''ti.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, appakaa honti manussaa manussesu matteyyaa petteyyaa saama~n~naa brahma~n~naa kule je.t.thaapacaayino uposatha.m upavasanti pa.tijaagaronti pu~n~naani karonti. tamena.m, bhikkhave, cattaaro mahaaraajaano devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sudhammaaya sabhaaya sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m aarocenti -- `appakaa kho, maarisaa, manussaa manussesu matteyyaa petteyyaa saama~n~naa brahma~n~naa kule je.t.thaapacaayino uposatha.m upavasanti pa.tijaagaronti pu~n~naani karontii'ti. tena kho, bhikkhave ^a^M1.0142^ea^, devaa taavati.msaa anattamanaa honti -- `dibbaa vata, bho, kaayaa parihaayissanti, paripuurissanti asurakaayaa'''ti.

[03] ``sace pana, bhikkhave, bahuu honti manussaa manussesu matteyyaa petteyyaa saama~n~naa brahma~n~naa kule je.t.thaapacaayino uposatha.m upavasanti pa.tijaagaronti pu~n~naani karonti. tamena.m, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0168^ea^, cattaaro mahaaraajaano devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sudhammaaya sabhaaya sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m aarocenti -- `bahuu kho ^a^T1.0182^ea^, maarisaa, manussaa manussesu matteyyaa petteyyaa saama~n~naa brahma~n~naa kule je.t.thaapacaayino uposatha.m upavasanti pa.tijaagaronti pu~n~naani karontii'ti. tena, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa attamanaa honti -- `dibbaa vata, bho, kaayaa paripuurissanti, parihaayissanti asurakaayaa'''ti.
[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo deve taavati.mse anunayamaano taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``caatuddasi.m ^a^P1.0144^ea^ pa~ncadasi.m, yaa ca pakkhassa a.t.thamii.
[21] paa.tihaariyapakkha~nca, a.t.tha"ngasusamaagata.m.
[22] uposatha.m upavaseyya, yopissa {yopassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} maadiso naro''ti..

[03] ``saa kho panesaa, bhikkhave, sakkena devaanamindena gaathaa duggiitaa na sugiitaa dubbhaasitaa na subhaasitaa. ta.m kissa hetu? sakko hi, bhikkhave, devaanamindo aviitaraago aviitadoso aviitamoho.

[03] ``yo ca kho so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa brahmacariyo katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto, tassa kho eta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno {tassa kho eta.m bhikkhuno (sii0 syaa0), tassa kho eva.m bhikkhave bhikkhuno (ka0)} kalla.m vacanaaya --
[21] ``caatuddasi.m pa~ncadasi.m, yaa ca pakkhassa a.t.thamii.
[27] paa.tihaariyapakkha~nca, a.t.tha"ngasusamaagata.m.
[22] uposatha.m upavaseyya, yopissa maadiso naro''ti..
[03] ``ta.m ^a^M1.0143^ea^ kissa hetu? so hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu viitaraago viitadoso viitamoho''ti. sattama.m.
[03] 38^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutapubba.m ^a^V1.0169^ea^, bhikkhave, sakko devaanamindo deve taavati.mse anunayamaano taaya.m ^a^T1.0183^ea^ velaaya.m ima.m gaatha.m abhaasi --
[21] ``caatuddasi.m pa~ncadasi.m, yaa ca pakkhassa a.t.thamii.
[27] paa.tihaariyapakkha~nca, a.t.tha"ngasusamaagata.m.
[22] uposatha.m upavaseyya, yopissa maadiso naro''ti..

[03] ``saa kho panesaa, bhikkhave, sakkena devaanamindena gaathaa duggiitaa na sugiitaa dubbhaasitaa na subhaasitaa. ta.m kissa hetu? sakko hi, bhikkhave, devaanamindo aparimutto jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, aparimutto dukkhasmaati vadaami.

[21] ``caatuddasi.m pa~ncadasi.m, yaa ca pakkhassa a.t.thamii.
