[03] 39^b^.^eb^ ``sukhumaalo ^a^V1.0170^ea^ aha.m, bhikkhave, paramasukhumaalo accantasukhumaalo. mama suda.m, bhikkhave, pitu nivesane pokkhara.niyo kaaritaa honti. ekattha suda.m, bhikkhave, uppala.m vappati {pupphati (sii0 pii0)}, ekattha paduma.m, ekattha pu.n.dariika.m, yaavadeva mamatthaaya ^a^T1.0184^ea^. na kho panassaaha.m, bhikkhave, akaasika.m candana.m dhaaremi {kaasika.m candana.m dhaaremi (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0), akaasika.m dhaaremi (?)}. kaasika.m ^a^M1.0144^ea^, bhikkhave, su me ta.m ve.thana.m hoti, kaasikaa ka~ncukaa, kaasika.m nivaasana.m, kaasiko uttaraasa"ngo. rattindiva.m {rattidiva.m (ka0)} kho pana me su ta.m, bhikkhave, setacchatta.m dhaariiyati -- `maa na.m phusi siita.m vaa u.nha.m vaa ti.na.m vaa rajo vaa ussaavo vaa'''ti.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, tayo paasaadaa ahesu.m -- eko hemantiko, eko gimhiko, eko vassiko. so kho aha.m, bhikkhave, vassike paasaade vassike cattaaro maase nippurisehi tuuriyehi paricaarayamaano {paricaariyamaano (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} na he.t.thaapaasaada.m orohaami. yathaa kho pana, bhikkhave, a~n~nesa.m nivesane daasakammakaraporisassa ka.naajaka.m bhojana.m diiyati bila"ngadutiya.m, evamevassu me, bhikkhave, pitu nivesane daasakammakaraporisassa saalima.msodano diiyati.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, evaruupaaya iddhiyaa samannaagatassa evaruupena ca sukhumaalena etadahosi -- `assutavaa kho puthujjano attanaa jaraadhammo samaano jara.m anatiito para.m ji.n.na.m disvaa a.t.tiiyati haraayati jigucchati attaana.myeva atisitvaa, ahampi khomhi jaraadhammo jara.m anatiito. aha~nceva {aha~nce (?)} kho pana jaraadhammo samaano jara.m anatiito para.m ji.n.na.m disvaa a.t.tiiyeyya.m haraayeyya.m jiguccheyya.m ^a^P1.0146^ea^ na meta.m assa patiruupa'nti. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhato yo yobbane yobbanamado so sabbaso pahiiyi.

[03] ``assutavaa kho puthujjano attanaa byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhi.m anatiito para.m byaadhita.m disvaa ^a^T1.0185^ea^ a.t.tiiyati haraayati jigucchati attaana.myeva atisitvaa -- `ahampi khomhi byaadhidhammo byaadhi.m anatiito, aha~nceva kho pana byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhi.m anatiito para.m byaadhika.m disvaa a.t.tiiyeyya.m haraayeyya.m jiguccheyya.m, na meta.m assa patiruupa'nti. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhato yo aarogye aarogyamado so sabbaso pahiiyi.

[03] ``assutavaa ^a^V1.0171^ea^ kho puthujjano attanaa mara.nadhammo samaano mara.na.m anatiito para.m mata.m disvaa a.t.tiiyati haraayati jigucchati attaana.myeva atisitvaa -- `ahampi khomhi mara.nadhammo, mara.na.m anatiito, aha.m ceva kho pana ^a^M1.0145^ea^ mara.nadhammo samaano mara.na.m anatiito para.m mata.m disvaa a.t.tiiyeyya.m haraayeyya.m jiguccheyya.m, na meta.m assa patiruupa'nti. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhato yo jiivite jiivitamado so sabbaso pahiiyii''ti.

[03] ``tayome, bhikkhave, madaa. katame tayo? yobbanamado, aarogyamado, jiivitamado. yobbanamadamatto vaa, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati. so kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa, vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa, manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. aarogyamadamatto vaa, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano...pe0... jiivitamadamatto vaa, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano kaayena duccarita.m ^a^P1.0147^ea^ carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati. so kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa ^a^T1.0186^ea^, vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa, manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati.

[03] ``yobbanamadamatto vaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. aarogyamadamatto vaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu...pe0... jiivitamadamatto vaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattatii''ti.
[21] ``byaadhidhammaa jaraadhammaa, atho mara.nadhammino.
[22] yathaadhammaa {byaadhidhammo jaraadhammo, atho mara.nadhammiko. yathaa dhammo (ka0)} tathaasantaa, jigucchanti puthujjanaa..
[21] ``aha~nce ta.m jiguccheyya.m, eva.mdhammesu paa.nisu.
[22] na meta.m patiruupassa, mama eva.m vihaarino..
[21] ``soha.m eva.m viharanto, ~natvaa dhamma.m niruupadhi.m.
[22] aarogye yobbanasmi~nca, jiivitasmi~nca ye madaa..
[21] ``sabbe ^a^V1.0172^ea^ made abhibhosmi {atiitosmi (ka0)}, nekkhamme da.t.thu khemata.m.
[22] tassa me ahu ussaaho, nibbaana.m abhipassato..
[21] ``naaha.m bhabbo etarahi, kaamaani pa.tisevitu.m.
[22] anivatti bhavissaami, brahmacariyaparaaya.no''ti.. navama.m.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani ^a^M1.0146^ea^, bhikkhave, aadhipateyyaani. katamaani tii.ni? attaadhipateyya.m, lokaadhipateyya.m, dhammaadhipateyya.m. katama~nca, bhikkhave, attaadhipateyya.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho panaaha.m ciivarahetu agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. na pi.n.dapaatahetu, na senaasanahetu, na ^a^T1.0187^ea^ itibhavaabhavahetu agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. api ca khomhi oti.n.no jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto. appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaati. aha~nceva kho pana yaadisake ^a^P1.0148^ea^ {yaadisake vaa (sii0 pii0 ka0)} kaame ohaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito taadisake vaa {ca (ka0)} kaame pariyeseyya.m tato vaa {ca (ka0)} paapi.t.thatare, na meta.m patiruupa'nti. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aaraddha.m kho pana me viiriya.m bhavissati asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa, passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m ekagga'nti. so attaana.myeva adhipati.m karitvaa akusala.m pajahati, kusala.m bhaaveti, saavajja.m pajahati, anavajja.m bhaaveti, suddha.m attaana.m pariharati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, attaadhipateyya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, lokaadhipateyya.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho panaaha.m ciivarahetu agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. na pi.n.dapaatahetu, na senaasanahetu, na itibhavaabhavahetu agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. api ca khomhi oti.n.no jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto. appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. aha~nceva kho pana eva.m pabbajito ^a^V1.0173^ea^ samaano kaamavitakka.m vaa vitakkeyya.m, byaapaadavitakka.m vaa vitakkeyya.m, vihi.msaavitakka.m vaa vitakkeyya.m, mahaa kho panaaya.m ^a^T1.0188^ea^ lokasannivaaso. mahantasmi.m kho pana lokasannivaase santi sama.nabraahma.naa iddhimanto dibbacakkhukaa paracittaviduno. te duuratopi passanti, aasannaapi na dissanti, cetasaapi citta.m pajaananti {jaananti (ka0)}. tepi ma.m eva.m jaaneyyu.m -- `passatha, bho, ima.m kulaputta.m ^a^M1.0147^ea^ saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito samaano voki.n.no viharati paapakehi akusalehi dhammehii'ti. devataapi kho santi iddhimantiniyo dibbacakkhukaa paracittaviduniyo. taa duuratopi passanti, aasannaapi na dissanti, cetasaapi citta.m jaananti. taapi ma.m eva.m jaaneyyu.m -- `passatha, bho, ima.m kulaputta.m saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito samaano voki.n.no viharati paapakehi akusalehi dhammehii'ti. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aaraddha.m kho pana me viiriya.m bhavissati ^a^P1.0149^ea^ asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa, passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m ekagga'nti. so loka.myeva adhipati.m karitvaa akusala.m pajahati, kusala.m bhaaveti, saavajja.m pajahati, anavajja.m bhaaveti, suddha.m attaana.m pariharati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, lokaadhipateyya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dhammaadhipateyya.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `na kho panaaha.m ciivarahetu agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. na pi.n.dapaatahetu, na senaasanahetu, na itibhavaabhavahetu agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito. api ca khomhi oti.n.no jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, dukkhoti.n.no ^a^T1.0189^ea^ dukkhapareto. appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaati. svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhiiti. santi kho pana me sabrahmacaarii jaana.m passa.m viharanti. aha~nceva kho pana eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajito samaano kusiito vihareyya.m pamatto, na meta.m assa patiruupa'nti. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aaraddha.m kho pana me viiriya.m bhavissati asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa, passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m ekagga'nti. so dhamma.myeva adhipati.m karitvaa akusala.m pajahati, kusala.m bhaaveti, saavajja.m pajahati, anavajja.m bhaaveti, suddha.m attaana.m pariharati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammaadhipateyya.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni aadhipateyyaanii''ti.
[21] ``natthi ^a^V1.0174^ea^ loke raho naama, paapakamma.m pakubbato.
[22] attaa te purisa jaanaati, sacca.m vaa yadi vaa musaa..
[21] ``kalyaa.na.m ^a^M1.0148^ea^ vata bho sakkhi, attaana.m atima~n~nasi.
[22] yo santa.m attani paapa.m, attaana.m pariguuhasi..
[21] ``passanti ^a^P1.0150^ea^ devaa ca tathaagataa ca,
[27] lokasmi.m baala.m visama.m caranta.m.
[26] tasmaa hi attaadhipateyyako ca {attaadhipako sako care (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)},
[22] lokaadhipo ca nipako ca jhaayii..
[21] ``dhammaadhipo ca anudhammacaarii,
[27] na ^a^T1.0190^ea^ hiiyati saccaparakkamo muni.
[26] pasayha maara.m abhibhuyya antaka.m,
[27] yo ca phusii jaatikkhaya.m padhaanavaa.
[26] so taadiso lokaviduu sumedho,
[22] sabbesu dhammesu atammayo munii''ti.. dasama.m.
[06] devaduutavaggo catuttho.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] brahma aananda saariputto, nidaana.m hatthakena ca.
[22] duutaa duve ca raajaano, sukhumaalaadhipateyyena caati..

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ ``ti.n.na.m ^a^V1.0175^ea^, bhikkhave, sammukhiibhaavaa saddho kulaputto bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavati. katamesa.m ti.n.na.m? saddhaaya, bhikkhave, sammukhiibhaavaa saddho kulaputto bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavati. deyyadhammassa, bhikkhave, sammukhiibhaavaa saddho kulaputto bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavati. dakkhi.neyyaana.m, bhikkhave, sammukhiibhaavaa saddho kulaputto bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavati. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m sammukhiibhaavaa saddho kulaputto bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi ^a^M1.0149^ea^, bhikkhave, .thaanehi saddho pasanno veditabbo. katamehi tiihi? siilavantaana.m dassanakaamo hoti, saddhamma.m sotukaamo hoti ^a^T1.0191^ea^, vigatamalamaccherena cetasaa agaara.m ajjhaavasati muttacaago payatapaa.ni vossaggarato yaacayogo daanasa.mvibhaagarato. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi .thaanehi saddho pasanno veditabbo''.
[21] ``dassanakaamo siilavata.m, saddhamma.m sotumicchati.
[22] vinaye maccheramala.m, sa ve saddhoti vuccatii''ti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ ``tayo ^a^P1.0151^ea^, bhikkhave, atthavase sampassamaanena alameva paresa.m dhamma.m desetu.m. katame tayo? yo dhamma.m deseti so atthappa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammappa.tisa.mvedii ca. yo dhamma.m su.naati so atthappa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammappa.tisa.mvedii ca. yo ceva dhamma.m deseti yo ca dhamma.m ^a^V1.0176^ea^ su.naati ubho atthappa.tisa.mvedino ca honti dhammappa.tisa.mvedino ca. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo atthavase sampassamaanena alameva paresa.m dhamma.m desetu''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi, bhikkhave, .thaanehi kathaa pavattinii hoti. katamehi tiihi? yo dhamma.m deseti so atthappa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammappa.tisa.mvedii ca. yo dhamma.m su.naati so atthappa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammappa.tisa.mvedii ca. yo ceva dhamma.m deseti yo ca dhamma.m su.naati ubho atthappa.tisa.mvedino ca honti dhammappa.tisa.mvedino ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi .thaanehi kathaa pavattinii hotii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, pa.n.ditapa~n~nattaani sappurisapa~n~nattaani. katamaani tii.ni? daana.m, bhikkhave, pa.n.ditapa~n~natta.m sappurisapa~n~natta.m ^a^T1.0192^ea^. pabbajjaa, bhikkhave ^a^M1.0150^ea^, pa.n.ditapa~n~nattaa sappurisapa~n~nattaa. maataapituuna.m, bhikkhave, upa.t.thaana.m pa.n.ditapa~n~natta.m sappurisapa~n~natta.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni pa.n.ditapa~n~nattaani sappurisapa~n~nattaanii''ti.
[21] ``sabbhi daana.m upa~n~natta.m, ahi.msaa sa.myamo damo.
[22] maataapitu upa.t.thaana.m, santaana.m brahmacaarina.m..
[21] ``sata.m etaani .thaanaani, yaani sevetha pa.n.dito.
[22] ariyo dassanasampanno, sa loka.m bhajate siva''nti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ ``ya.m, bhikkhave, siilavanto pabbajitaa gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa upanissaaya viharanti. tattha manussaa tiihi .thaanehi bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavanti. katamehi tiihi? kaayena ^a^P1.0152^ea^, vaacaaya ^a^V1.0177^ea^, manasaa. ya.m, bhikkhave, siilavanto pabbajitaa gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa upanissaaya viharanti. tattha manussaa imehi tiihi .thaanehi bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavantii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, sa"nkhatassa sa"nkhatalakkha.naani. katamaani tii.ni? uppaado pa~n~naayati, vayo pa~n~naayati, .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayati. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni sa"nkhatassa sa"nkhatalakkha.naanii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, asa"nkhatassa asa"nkhatalakkha.naani. katamaani tii.ni? na uppaado pa~n~naayati, na vayo pa~n~naayati, na .thitassa a~n~nathatta.m pa~n~naayati. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni asa"nkhatassa asa"nkhatalakkha.naanii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ ``himavanta.m, bhikkhave, pabbataraaja.m nissaaya mahaasaalaa tiihi ^a^T1.0193^ea^ va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhanti. katamaahi tiihi? saakhaapattapalaasena va.d.dhanti, tacapapa.tikaaya va.d.dhanti ^a^M1.0151^ea^, pheggusaarena va.d.dhanti. himavanta.m, bhikkhave, pabbataraaja.m nissaaya mahaasaalaa imaahi tiihi va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhanti.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, saddha.m kulapati.m nissaaya anto jano tiihi va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhati. katamaahi tiihi? saddhaaya va.d.dhati, siilena va.d.dhati, pa~n~naaya va.d.dhati. saddha.m, bhikkhave, kulapati.m nissaaya anto jano imaahi tiihi va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhatii''ti.
[21] ``yathaapi pabbato selo, ara~n~nasmi.m brahaavane.
[22] ta.m rukkhaa upanissaaya, va.d.dhante te vanappatii..
[21] ``tatheva ^a^V1.0178^ea^ siilasampanna.m, saddha.m kulapati.m idha.
[27] upanissaaya va.d.dhanti, puttadaaraa ca bandhavaa.
[22] amaccaa ~naatisa"nghaa ca, ye cassa anujiivino..
[21] ``tyaassa ^a^P1.0153^ea^ siilavato siila.m, caaga.m sucaritaani ca.
[22] passamaanaanukubbanti, attamattha.m {ye bhavanti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vicakkha.naa..
[21] ``idha dhamma.m caritvaana, magga.m sugatigaamina.m.
[22] nandino devalokasmi.m, modanti kaamakaamino''ti.. navama.m.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi, bhikkhave, .thaanehi aatappa.m kara.niiya.m. katamehi tiihi? anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya aatappa.m kara.niiya.m ^a^T1.0194^ea^, anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya aatappa.m kara.niiya.m, uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m adhivaasanaaya aatappa.m kara.niiya.m. imehi tiihi, bhikkhave, .thaanehi aatappa.m kara.niiya.m.

[03] ``yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya aatappa.m karoti, anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya aatappa.m karoti, uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m adhivaasanaaya aatappa.m ^a^M1.0152^ea^ karoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aataapii nipako sato sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato mahaacoro sandhimpi chindati, nillopampi harati, ekaagaarikampi karoti, paripanthepi ti.t.thati. katamehi tiihi? idha, bhikkhave, mahaacoro ^a^V1.0179^ea^ visamanissito ca hoti, gahananissito ca hoti, balavanissito ca hoti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, mahaacoro visamanissito hoti? idha, bhikkhave, mahaacoro nadiividugga.m vaa nissito hoti pabbatavisama.m vaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, mahaacoro visamanissito hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, mahaacoro gahananissito hoti? idha, bhikkhave, mahaacoro ti.nagahana.m vaa nissito hoti, rukkhagahana.m ^a^P1.0154^ea^ vaa rodha.m {gedha.m (sii0 pii0)} vaa mahaavanasa.n.da.m vaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, mahaacoro gahananissito hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, mahaacoro balavanissito hoti? idha ^a^T1.0195^ea^, bhikkhave, mahaacoro raajaana.m vaa raajamahaamattaana.m vaa nissito hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `sace ma.m koci ki~nci vakkhati, ime me raajaano vaa raajamahaamattaa vaa pariyodhaaya attha.m bha.nissantii'ti. sace na.m koci ki~nci aaha, tyaassa raajaano vaa raajamahaamattaa vaa pariyodhaaya attha.m bha.nanti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, mahaacoro balavanissito hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, tiihi a"ngehi samannaagato mahaacoro sandhimpi chindati, nillopampi harati, ekaagaarikampi karoti, paripanthepi ti.t.thati.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tiihi a"ngehi samannaagato paapabhikkhu khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. katamehi tiihi? idha, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu visamanissito ca hoti gahananissito ca balavanissito ca.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu visamanissito hoti? idha, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu visamena kaayakammena samannaagato hoti, visamena vaciikammena ^a^M1.0153^ea^ samannaagato hoti, visamena manokammena samannaagato hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu visamanissito hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu gahananissito hoti? idha, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu micchaadi.t.thiko ^a^V1.0180^ea^ hoti, antaggaahikaaya di.t.thiyaa samannaagato hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu gahananissito hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu balavanissito hoti? idha, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu raajaana.m vaa raajamahaamattaana.m vaa nissito hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `sace ma.m koci ki~nci vakkhati, ime me raajaano ^a^T1.0196^ea^ vaa raajamahaamattaa vaa pariyodhaaya attha.m bha.nissantii'ti. sace na.m koci ki~nci aaha, tyaassa raajaano vaa raajamahaamattaa vaa pariyodhaaya attha.m bha.nanti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paapabhikkhu balavanissito hoti. imehi kho ^a^P1.0155^ea^, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato paapabhikkhu khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti. ekaadasama.m.
[06] cuu.lavaggo pa~ncamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] sammukhii .thaanatthavasa.m, pavatti pa.n.dita siilava.m.
[22] sa"nkhata.m pabbataatappa.m, mahaacorenekaadasaati {mahaacorena te dasaati (ka0)}..
[06] pa.thamo pa.n.naasako samatto.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T1.0197^ea^ ^a^V1.0181^ea^ ^a^M1.0154^ea^ kho dve braahma.naa ji.n.naa vuddhaa mahallakaa addhagataa vayoanuppattaa viisavassasatikaa jaatiyaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te braahma.naa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``mayamassu, bho gotama, braahma.naa ji.n.naa vuddhaa mahallakaa addhagataa vayoanuppattaa viisavassasatikaa jaatiyaa; te camhaa akatakalyaa.naa akatakusalaa akatabhiiruttaa.naa. ovadatu no bhava.m gotamo, anusaasatu no bhava.m gotamo ya.m amhaaka.m assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti.

[03] ``taggha tumhe, braahma.naa, ji.n.naa vuddhaa mahallakaa addhagataa vayoanuppattaa viisavassasatikaa jaatiyaa; te cattha akatakalyaa.naa akatakusalaa akatabhiiruttaa.naa. upaniiyati kho aya.m, braahma.naa, loko jaraaya byaadhinaa mara.nena. eva.m upaniiyamaane kho, braahma.naa, loke jaraaya byaadhinaa mara.nena, yo idha kaayena sa.myamo vaacaaya sa.myamo manasaa sa.myamo, ta.m tassa petassa taa.na~nca le.na~nca diipa~nca sara.na~nca paraaya.na~ncaa''ti.
[21] ``upaniiyati ^a^T1.0198^ea^ jiivitamappamaayu,
[27] jaruupaniitassa na santi taa.naa.
[26] eta.m bhaya.m mara.ne pekkhamaano,
[22] pu~n~naani kayiraatha sukhaavahaani..
[21] ``yodha ^a^V1.0182^ea^ kaayena sa.myamo, vaacaaya uda cetasaa.
[27] ta.m tassa petassa sukhaaya hoti,
[22] ya.m jiivamaano pakaroti pu~n~na''nti.. {sa.m0 ni0 1.100} pa.thama.m.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0155^ea^ ^a^P1.0156^ea^ kho dve braahma.naa ji.n.naa vuddhaa mahallakaa addhagataa vayoanuppattaa viisavassasatikaa jaatiyaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te braahma.naa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``mayamassu, bho gotama, braahma.naa ji.n.naa vuddhaa mahallakaa addhagataa vayoanuppattaa viisavassasatikaa jaatiyaa; te camhaa akatakalyaa.naa akatakusalaa akatabhiiruttaa.naa. ovadatu no bhava.m gotamo, anusaasatu no bhava.m gotamo ya.m amhaaka.m assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti.

[03] ``taggha tumhe, braahma.naa, ji.n.naa vuddhaa mahallakaa addhagataa vayoanuppattaa viisavassasatikaa jaatiyaa; te cattha akatakalyaa.naa akatakusalaa akatabhiiruttaa.naa. aaditto kho aya.m, braahma.naa, loko jaraaya byaadhinaa mara.nena. eva.m aaditte kho, braahma.naa, loke jaraaya byaadhinaa mara.nena, yo idha kaayena sa.myamo vaacaaya sa.myamo manasaa sa.myamo, ta.m ^a^T1.0199^ea^ tassa petassa taa.na~nca le.na~nca diipa~nca sara.na~nca paraaya.na~ncaa''ti.

[03] ``ye te, vaccha, evamaaha.msu -- `sama.no gotamo evamaaha -- mayhameva daana.m daatabba.m...pe0... naa~n~nesa.m saavakaana.m dinna.m mahapphala'nti na me te vuttavaadino. abbhaacikkhanti ca pana ma.m {ca pana ma.m te (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} asataa abhuutena. yo kho, vaccha, para.m daana.m dadanta.m vaareti so ti.n.na.m antaraayakaro hoti, ti.n.na.m paaripanthiko. katamesa.m ti.n.na.m? daayakassa pu~n~nantaraayakaro ^a^T1.0206^ea^ hoti, pa.tiggaahakaana.m laabhantaraayakaro hoti, pubbeva kho panassa attaa khato ca hoti upahato ca. yo kho, vaccha, para.m daana.m dadanta.m vaareti so imesa.m ti.n.na.m antaraayakaro hoti, ti.n.na.m paaripanthiko.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P1.0163^ea^ kho tika.n.no braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho tika.n.no ^a^T1.0208^ea^ braahma.no bhagavato sammukhaa tevijjaana.m suda.m braahma.naana.m va.n.na.m bhaasati -- ``evampi tevijjaa braahma.naa, itipi tevijjaa braahma.naa''ti.

[03] ``yathaa katha.m pana, braahma.na, braahma.naa braahma.na.m tevijja.m pa~n~naapentii''ti? ``idha, bho gotama, braahma.no ubhato sujaato hoti maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa, akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena, ajjhaayako, mantadharo, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m, padako, veyyaakara.no, lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayoti. eva.m kho, bho gotama, braahma.naa tevijja.m pa~n~naapentii''ti.

[03] ``a~n~nathaa kho, braahma.na, braahma.naa braahma.na.m tevijja.m pa~n~napenti, a~n~nathaa ca pana ariyassa vinaye tevijjo hotii''ti. ``yathaa katha.m pana, bho gotama, ariyassa vinaye tevijjo hoti? saadhu me bhava.m gotamo tathaa dhamma.m desetu yathaa ariyassa vinaye tevijjo hotii''ti. ``tena hi, braahma.na, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho tika.n.no braahma.no bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``idha ^a^V1.0191^ea^, braahma.na, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. piitiyaa ^a^M1.0164^ea^ ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti ya.m ta.m ariyaa ^a^T1.0209^ea^ aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m ^a^P1.0164^ea^ upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaariisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi, anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m. tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. ayamassa pa.thamaa vijjaa adhigataa hoti; avijjaa vihataa, vijjaa uppannaa; tamo vihato, aaloko uppanno yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m ^a^T1.0210^ea^ cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa...pe0... manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m ^a^V1.0192^ea^ vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa. ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa, vaciisucaritena samannaagataa, manosucaritena samannaagataa ^a^M1.0165^ea^ ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa ^a^P1.0165^ea^ sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati. ayamassa dutiyaa vijjaa adhigataa hoti; avijjaa vihataa, vijjaa uppannaa; tamo vihato, aaloko uppanno yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `ime aasavaa'ti ^a^T1.0211^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati; vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. ayamassa tatiyaa vijjaa adhigataa hoti; avijjaa vihataa, vijjaa uppannaa; tamo vihato, aaloko uppanno yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato''ti.
[21] ``anuccaavacasiilassa, nipakassa ca jhaayino.
[22] citta.m yassa vasiibhuuta.m, ekagga.m susamaahita.m..
[21] ``ta.m ve tamonuda.m dhiira.m, tevijja.m maccuhaayina.m.
[22] hita.m devamanussaana.m, aahu sabbappahaayina.m..
[21] ``tiihi vijjaahi sampanna.m, asammuu.lhavihaarina.m.
[22] buddha.m antimadehina.m {antimasaariira.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, ta.m namassanti gotama.m..
[21] {dha0 pa0 423; itivu0 99} ``pubbenivaasa.m ^a^V1.0193^ea^ ^a^M1.0166^ea^ yo vedii, saggaapaaya~nca passati.
[22] atho jaatikkhaya.m patto, abhi~n~naavosito muni..
