[03] 61^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V1.0196^ea^ kho sa"ngaaravo braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ^a^T1.0215^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho sa"ngaaravo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``mayamassu, bho gotama, braahma.naa naama. ya~n~na.m yajaamapi yajaapemapi. tatra, bho gotama, yo ceva yajati {yo ceva ya~n~na.m yajati (syaa0 ka.m0)} yo ca yajaapeti sabbe te anekasaariirika.m pu~n~nappa.tipada.m pa.tipannaa honti, yadida.m ya~n~naadhikara.na.m. yo panaaya.m, bho gotama, yassa vaa tassa vaa kulaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito ekamattaana.m dameti, ekamattaana.m sameti, ekamattaana.m parinibbaapeti, evamassaaya.m ekasaariirika.m pu~n~nappa.tipada.m pa.tipanno hoti, yadida.m pabbajjaadhikara.na''nti.

[01] ``tena hi, braahma.na, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami. yathaa te khameyya tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, idha tathaagato loke ^a^M1.0169^ea^ uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so evamaaha -- `ethaaya.m maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa yathaapa.tipanno aha.m anuttara.m brahmacariyogadha.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedemi; etha {eta.m (ka0)}, tumhepi tathaa pa.tipajjatha, yathaapa.tipannaa tumhepi anuttara.m brahmacariyogadha.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissathaa'ti. iti aya~nceva {saya.m ceva (ka0)} satthaa dhamma.m deseti, pare ca tathatthaaya ^a^P1.0169^ea^ pa.tipajjanti, taani kho pana honti anekaanipi sataani anekaanipi sahassaani anekaanipi satasahassaani.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, iccaaya.m eva.m sante ekasaariirikaa vaa pu~n~nappa.tipadaa hoti anekasaariirikaa vaa, yadida.m pabbajjaadhikara.na''nti? ``iccaayampi ^a^T1.0216^ea^ {iccaayante (ka0)}, bho gotama, eva.m sante anekasaariirikaa pu~n~nappa.tipadaa hoti, yadida.m pabbajjaadhikara.na''nti.

[03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa aanando sa"ngaarava.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``imaasa.m te, braahma.na, dvinna.m pa.tipadaana.m katamaa pa.tipadaa khamati appatthataraa ca appasamaarambhataraa ca mahapphalataraa ca ^a^V1.0197^ea^ mahaanisa.msataraa caa''ti? eva.m vutte sa"ngaaravo braahma.no aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``seyyathaapi bhava.m gotamo bhava.m caanando. ete me pujjaa, ete me paasa.msaa''ti.

[03] dutiyampi kho aayasmaa aanando sa"ngaarava.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``na kho tyaaha.m, braahma.na, eva.m pucchaami -- `ke vaa te pujjaa ke vaa te paasa.msaa'ti? eva.m kho tyaaha.m, braahma.na, pucchaami -- `imaasa.m te, braahma.na, dvinna.m pa.tipadaana.m katamaa pa.tipadaa khamati appatthataraa ca appasamaarambhataraa ca mahapphalataraa ca mahaanisa.msataraa caa'''ti? dutiyampi kho sa"ngaaravo braahma.no aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``seyyathaapi bhava.m gotamo bhava.m caanando. ete me pujjaa, ete me paasa.msaa''ti.

[03] tatiyampi kho aayasmaa aanando sa"ngaarava.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``na kho tyaaha.m, braahma.na, eva.m pucchaami -- `ke vaa te pujjaa ke vaa te paasa.msaa'ti? eva.m kho tyaaha.m, braahma.na, pucchaami -- `imaasa.m te, braahma.na, dvinna.m pa.tipadaana.m katamaa pa.tipadaa khamati appatthataraa ca appasamaarambhataraa ca mahapphalataraa ^a^M1.0170^ea^ ca mahaanisa.msataraa caa'''ti? tatiyampi kho sa"ngaaravo braahma.no aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``seyyathaapi bhava.m gotamo bhava.m caanando. ete me pujjaa, ete me ^a^T1.0217^ea^ paasa.msaa''ti.

[03] atha ^a^P1.0170^ea^ kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``yaava tatiyampi kho sa"ngaaravo braahma.no aanandena sahadhammika.m pa~nha.m pu.t.tho sa.msaadeti {ma0 ni0 1.337} no vissajjeti. ya.mnuunaaha.m parimoceyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa sa"ngaarava.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``kaa nvajja, braahma.na, raajantepure raajapurisaana.m {raajaparisaaya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m antaraakathaa udapaadii''ti? ``aya.m khvajja, bho gotama, raajantepure raajapurisaana.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m antaraakathaa udapaadi -- `pubbe suda.m appataraa ceva bhikkhuu ahesu.m bahutaraa ca uttari manussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassesu.m; etarahi pana bahutaraa ceva bhikkhuu appataraa ca uttari manussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassentii'ti. aya.m khvajja, bho gotama, raajantepure raajapurisaana.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m antaraakathaa udapaadii''ti.

[03] {pa.ti0 ma0 3.30; dii0 ni0 1.483} ``tii.ni kho imaani, braahma.na, paa.tihaariyaani. katamaani tii.ni? iddhipaa.tihaariya.m, aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m ^a^V1.0198^ea^, anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m. katama~nca, braahma.na, iddhipaa.tihaariya.m? idha, braahma.na, ekacco anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti -- `ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaano gacchati, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m karoti, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaane gacchati, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kamati, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimasati {paraamasati (dii0 ni0 1.484; pa.ti0 ma0 1.102} parimajjati, yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti'. ida.m vuccati, braahma.na, iddhipaa.tihaariya.m ^a^T1.0218^ea^.

[03] ``katama~nca, braahma.na, aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m? idha, braahma.na, ekacco nimittena aadisati -- `evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te citta'nti. so bahu.m cepi aadisati tatheva ta.m hoti, no a~n~nathaa.

[03] ``idha ^a^M1.0171^ea^ pana, braahma.na, ekacco na heva kho nimittena aadisati ^a^P1.0171^ea^, api ca kho manussaana.m vaa amanussaana.m vaa devataana.m vaa sadda.m sutvaa aadisati -- `evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te citta'nti. so bahu.m cepi aadisati tatheva ta.m hoti, no a~n~nathaa.

[03] ``idha pana, braahma.na, ekacco na heva kho nimittena aadisati napi manussaana.m vaa amanussaana.m vaa devataana.m vaa sadda.m sutvaa aadisati, api ca kho vitakkayato vicaarayato vitakkavipphaarasadda.m sutvaa aadisati -- `evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te citta'nti. so bahu.m cepi aadisati tatheva ta.m hoti, no a~n~nathaa.

[03] ``idha pana, braahma.na, ekacco na heva kho nimittena aadisati, napi manussaana.m vaa amanussaana.m vaa devataana.m vaa sadda.m sutvaa aadisati, napi vitakkayato vicaarayato vitakkavipphaarasadda.m sutvaa aadisati, api ca kho avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhi.m samaapannassa cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati -- `yathaa imassa bhoto manosa"nkhaaraa pa.nihitaa imassa ^a^V1.0199^ea^ cittassa anantaraa amu.m naama vitakka.m vitakkessatii'ti. so bahu.m cepi aadisati tatheva ta.m hoti, no a~n~nathaa. ida.m vuccati, braahma.na, aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, braahma.na, anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m? idha, braahma.na ^a^T1.0219^ea^, ekacco evamanusaasati -- `eva.m vitakketha, maa eva.m vitakkayittha; eva.m manasi karotha, maa eva.m manasaakattha; ida.m pajahatha, ida.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti. ida.m vuccati, braahma.na, anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m. imaani kho, braahma.na, tii.ni paa.tihaariyaani. imesa.m te, braahma.na, ti.n.na.m paa.tihaariyaana.m katama.m paa.tihaariya.m khamati abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~ncaa''ti?

[03] ``tatra, bho gotama, yadida.m {yamida.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} paa.tihaariya.m idhekacco anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti...pe0... yaava braahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti, ida.m, bho gotama, paa.tihaariya.m yova {yo ca (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} na.m karoti sova {soca ca (syaa0 ka.m pii0 ka0)} na.m pa.tisa.mvedeti, yova {yo ca (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} na.m karoti tasseva {tassameva (sii0 ka0), tassa ceva (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ta.m hoti. ida.m me, bho gotama, paa.tihaariya.m maayaasahadhammaruupa.m viya khaayati.

[03] ``yampida.m ^a^M1.0172^ea^, bho gotama, paa.tihaariya.m idhekacco nimittena aadisati -- `evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te citta'nti, so bahu.m cepi aadisati tatheva ta.m hoti, no a~n~nathaa. idha pana, bho gotama, ekacco na heva kho nimittena aadisati, api ca kho manussaana.m vaa amanussaana.m vaa devataana.m vaa sadda.m sutvaa aadisati...pe0... napi manussaana.m vaa amanussaana.m vaa devataana.m vaa sadda.m sutvaa aadisati, api ca kho vitakkayato vicaarayato vitakkavipphaarasadda.m sutvaa aadisati...pe0... napi vitakkayato vicaarayato vitakkavipphaarasadda.m sutvaa aadisati, api ca kho avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhi.m samaapannassa cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati -- `yathaa ^a^P1.0172^ea^ imassa bhoto manosa"nkhaaraa pa.nihitaa imassa cittassa anantaraa amha.m naama vitakka.m ^a^T1.0220^ea^ vitakkessatii'ti, so bahu.m cepi aadisati tatheva ta.m hoti, no a~n~nathaa. idampi, bho gotama, paa.tihaariya.m yova na.m karoti sova na.m pa.tisa.mvedeti, yova na.m karoti tasseva ta.m hoti. idampi me, bho gotama, paa.tihaariya.m maayaasahadhammaruupa.m viya khaayati.

[03] ``ya~nca kho ida.m, bho gotama, paa.tihaariya.m idhekacco eva.m anusaasati -- `eva.m vitakketha ^a^V1.0200^ea^, maa eva.m vitakkayittha; eva.m manasi karotha, maa eva.m manasaakattha; ida.m pajahatha, ida.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti. idameva, bho gotama, paa.tihaariya.m khamati imesa.m ti.n.na.m paa.tihaariyaana.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[01] ``acchariya.m, bho gotama, abbhuta.m, bho gotama! yaavasubhaasitamida.m bhotaa gotamena imehi ca maya.m tiihi paa.tihaariyehi samannaagata.m bhavanta.m gotama.m dhaarema. bhava~nhi gotamo anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti, bhava~nhi gotamo avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhi.m samaapannassa cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati -- `yathaa imassa bhoto manosa"nkhaaraa pa.nihitaa imassa cittassa anantaraa amu.m naama vitakka.m vitakkessatii'ti. bhava~nhi gotamo evamanusaasati -- `eva.m vitakketha, maa eva.m vitakkayittha; eva.m manasi karotha, maa eva.m manasaakattha; ida.m pajahatha, ida.m upasampajja viharathaa'''ti.

[03] ``addhaa ^a^M1.0173^ea^ kho tyaaha.m, braahma.na, aasajja upaniiya vaacaa bhaasitaa; api ca tyaaha.m byaakarissaami. aha~nhi, braahma.na, anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhomi...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattemi. aha~nhi ^a^T1.0221^ea^, braahma.na, avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhi.m samaapannassa cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaami -- `yathaa imassa bhoto manosa"nkhaaraa pa.nihitaa, imassa cittassa anantaraa amu.m naama vitakka.m vitakkessatii'ti. aha~nhi, braahma.na, evamanusaasaami -- `eva.m vitakketha, maa eva.m vitakkayittha; eva.m manasi karotha, maa eva.m manasaakattha; ida.m pajahatha, ida.m upasampajja viharathaa'''ti.

[03] ``atthi pana, bho gotama, a~n~no ekabhikkhupi yo imehi tiihi paa.tihaariyehi samannaagato, a~n~natra bhotaa gotamenaa''ti? ``na kho, braahma.na, eka.myeva sata.m na dve sataani na tii.ni sataani na cattaari sataani na pa~nca sataani, atha kho bhiyyova, ye {te (ka0) passa ma0 ni0 2.195} bhikkhuu imehi tiihi paa.tihaariyehi samannaagataa''ti. ``kaha.m pana, bho gotama, etarahi te bhikkhuu viharantii''ti? ``imasmi.myeva ^a^P1.0173^ea^ kho, braahma.na, bhikkhusa"nghe''ti.

[01] ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare ^a^V1.0201^ea^ vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti, evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. dasama.m.
[06] braahma.navaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] dve ^a^T1.0222^ea^ braahma.naa ca~n~nataro, paribbaajakena nibbuta.m.
[22] palokavaccho tika.n.no, so.ni sa"ngaaravena caati..

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani ^a^V1.0202^ea^ ^a^M1.0174^ea^, bhikkhave, titthaayatanaani yaani pa.n.ditehi samanuyu~njiyamaanaani {samanuggaahiyamaanaani (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} samanugaahiyamaanaani samanubhaasiyamaanaani parampi gantvaa akiriyaaya sa.n.thahanti. katamaani tii.ni? santi, bhikkhave, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa sabba.m ta.m pubbekatahetuu'ti. santi, bhikkhave, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa sabba.m ta.m issaranimmaanahetuu'ti. santi, bhikkhave, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa sabba.m ta.m ahetuappaccayaa'''ti.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa sabba.m ta.m pubbekatahetuu'ti, tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- `sacca.m kira tumhe aayasmanto eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa sabba.m ta.m pubbekatahetuu'ti ^a^T1.0223^ea^? te ca me {te ce me (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} eva.m pu.t.thaa `aamaa'ti {aamoti (sii0)} pa.tijaananti. tyaaha.m ^a^P1.0174^ea^ eva.m vadaami -- `tenahaayasmanto paa.naatipaatino bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, adinnaadaayino bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, abrahmacaarino bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, musaavaadino bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, pisu.navaacaa bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, pharusavaacaa bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, samphappalaapino bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, abhijjhaaluno bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, byaapannacittaa bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, micchaadi.t.thikaa bhavissanti pubbekatahetu'''.

[03] ``pubbekata.m kho pana, bhikkhave, saarato paccaagacchata.m na hoti chando vaa vaayaamo vaa ida.m vaa kara.niiya.m ida.m vaa akara.niiyanti. iti kara.niiyaakara.niiye kho pana saccato thetato ^a^V1.0203^ea^ anupalabbhiyamaane mu.t.thassatiina.m anaarakkhaana.m viharata.m na hoti paccatta.m sahadhammiko sama.navaado ^a^M1.0175^ea^. aya.m kho me, bhikkhave, tesu sama.nabraahma.nesu eva.mvaadiisu eva.mdi.t.thiisu pa.thamo sahadhammiko niggaho hoti.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa sabba.m ta.m issaranimmaanahetuu'ti, tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- `sacca.m kira tumhe aayasmanto eva.mvaadino evadi.t.thino -- ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa sabba.m ta.m issaranimmaanahetuu'ti? te ca me eva.m pu.t.thaa `aamaa'ti pa.tijaananti. tyaaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `tenahaayasmanto paa.naatipaatino bhavissanti ^a^T1.0224^ea^ issaranimmaanahetu, adinnaadaayino bhavissanti issaranimmaanahetu, abrahmacaarino bhavissanti issaranimmaanahetu, musaavaadino bhavissanti issaranimmaanahetu, pisu.navaacaa bhavissanti issaranimmaanahetu, pharusavaacaa bhavissanti issaranimmaanahetu, samphappalaapino bhavissanti issaranimmaanahetu, abhijjhaaluno bhavissanti issaranimmaanahetu, byaapannacittaa bhavissanti issaranimmaanahetu, micchaadi.t.thikaa bhavissanti issaranimmaanahetu'''.

[03] ``issaranimmaana.m kho pana, bhikkhave, saarato paccaagacchata.m na hoti chando vaa vaayaamo vaa ida.m vaa kara.niiya.m ida.m vaa akara.niiyanti. iti kara.niiyaakara.niiye kho pana saccato thetato anupalabbhiyamaane mu.t.thassatiina.m anaarakkhaana.m viharata.m na hoti paccatta.m sahadhammiko sama.navaado. aya.m kho me, bhikkhave, tesu sama.nabraahma.nesu eva.mvaadiisu eva.mdi.t.thiisu dutiyo sahadhammiko niggaho hoti.

[03] ``tatra ^a^P1.0175^ea^, bhikkhave, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ya.m ki.m caaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa sabba.m ta.m ahetuappaccayaa'ti, tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- `sacca.m kira tumhe aayasmanto eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- ya.m ki.m caaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa sabba.m ta.m ahetuappaccayaa'ti? te ca me eva.m pu.t.thaa `aamaa'ti pa.tijaananti ^a^V1.0204^ea^. tyaaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `tenahaayasmanto paa.naatipaatino bhavissanti ahetuappaccayaa...pe0... micchaadi.t.thikaa bhavissanti ahetuappaccayaa'''.

[03] ``ahetuappaccaya.m ^a^M1.0176^ea^ {ahetu.m (sii0), ahetu (syaa0 ka.m0), ahetuappaccayaa (pii0), ahetu.m appaccaya.m (ka0)} kho pana, bhikkhave, saarato paccaagacchata.m na hoti chando vaa vaayaamo vaa ida.m vaa kara.niiya.m ida.m vaa akara.niiyanti. iti kara.niiyaakara.niiye kho pana saccato thetato anupalabbhiyamaane mu.t.thassatiina.m anaarakkhaana.m viharata.m na hoti paccatta.m sahadhammiko sama.navaado. aya.m kho me, bhikkhave, tesu sama.nabraahma.nesu eva.mvaadiisu eva.mdi.t.thiisu tatiyo ^a^T1.0225^ea^ sahadhammiko niggaho hoti.
[03] ``imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni titthaayatanaani yaani pa.n.ditehi samanuyu~njiyamaanaani samanugaahiyamaanaani samanubhaasiyamaanaani parampi gantvaa akiriyaaya sa.n.thahanti.

[03] ``aya.m kho pana, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo desito aniggahito asa.mkili.t.tho anupavajjo appa.tiku.t.tho sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi. katamo ca, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo desito aniggahito asa.mkili.t.tho anupavajjo appa.tiku.t.tho sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi? imaa cha dhaatuyoti, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo desito aniggahito asa.mkili.t.tho anupavajjo appa.tiku.t.tho sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi. imaani cha phassaayatanaaniiti, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo desito aniggahito asa.mkili.t.tho anupavajjo appa.tiku.t.tho sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi. ime a.t.thaarasa manopavicaaraati, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo desito aniggahito asa.mkili.t.tho anupavajjo appa.tiku.t.tho sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi. imaani cattaari ariyasaccaaniiti, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo desito aniggahito asa.mkili.t.tho anupavajjo appa.tiku.t.tho sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi.

[03] ``imaa cha dhaatuyoti, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo desito aniggahito asa.mkili.t.tho anupavajjo appa.tiku.t.tho sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhiiti. iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? chayimaa, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0176^ea^, dhaatuyo -- pathaviidhaatu, aapodhaatu, tejodhaatu, vaayodhaatu, aakaasadhaatu, vi~n~naa.nadhaatu. imaa ^a^T1.0226^ea^ cha dhaatuyoti, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo desito aniggahito asa.mkili.t.tho ^a^V1.0205^ea^ anupavajjo appa.tiku.t.tho sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhiiti. iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ``imaani ^a^M1.0177^ea^ cha phassaayatanaaniiti, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo desito aniggahito asa.mkili.t.tho anupavajjo appa.tiku.t.tho sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhiiti. iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? chayimaani, bhikkhave, phassaayatanaani -- cakkhu phassaayatana.m, sota.m phassaayatana.m, ghaana.m phassaayatana.m, jivhaa phassaayatana.m, kaayo phassaayatana.m, mano phassaayatana.m. imaani cha phassaayatanaaniiti, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo desito aniggahito asa.mkili.t.tho anupavajjo appa.tiku.t.tho sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhiiti. iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ``ime a.t.thaarasa manopavicaaraati, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo desito aniggahito asa.mkili.t.tho anupavajjo appa.tiku.t.tho sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhiiti. iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa somanassa.t.thaaniya.m ruupa.m upavicarati domanassa.t.thaaniya.m ruupa.m upavicarati upekkhaa.t.thaaniya.m ruupa.m upavicarati, sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya somanassa.t.thaaniya.m dhamma.m upavicarati domanassa.t.thaaniya.m dhamma.m upavicarati upekkhaa.t.thaaniya.m dhamma.m upavicarati. ime a.t.thaarasa manopavicaaraati, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo desito aniggahito asa.mkili.t.tho anupavajjo appa.tiku.t.tho sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhiiti. iti ^a^T1.0227^ea^ ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ``imaani cattaari ariyasaccaaniiti, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo desito aniggahito asa.mkili.t.tho anupavajjo appa.tiku.t.tho sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhiiti. iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? channa.m, bhikkhave, dhaatuuna.m upaadaaya gabbhassaavakkanti hoti; okkantiyaa sati naamaruupa.m, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa. vediyamaanassa kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, ida.m dukkhanti pa~n~napemi, aya.m dukkhasamudayoti pa~n~napemi, aya.m dukkhanirodhoti pa~n~napemi, aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati pa~n~napemi.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m? jaatipi dukkhaa, jaraapi dukkhaa ^a^V1.0206^ea^, ( ) {(byaadhipi dukkho) (sii0 pii0 ka0) a.t.thakathaaya sa.msandetabba.m visuddhi0 2.537} mara.nampi dukkha.m ^a^P1.0177^ea^, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaapi dukkhaa, (appiyehi ^a^M1.0178^ea^ sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho,) {(natthi katthaci)} yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m. sa.mkhittena pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudaya.m {dukkhasamudayo (syaa0 ka.m0)} ariyasacca.m? avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudaya.m ariyasacca.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodha.m {dukkhanirodho (syaa0 ka.m0)} ariyasacca.m? avijjaaya tveva ^a^T1.0228^ea^ asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho, sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho, vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodho, naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho, sa.laayatananirodhaa phassanirodho, phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho, vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho, ta.nhaanirodhaa upaadaananirodho, upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho, jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa nirujjhanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodha.m ariyasacca.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m. `imaani cattaari ariyasaccaanii'ti, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo desito aniggahito asa.mkili.t.tho anupavajjo appa.tiku.t.tho sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhiiti. iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani ^a^P1.0178^ea^, bhikkhave, amaataaputtikaani bhayaaniiti assutavaa puthujjano bhaasati. katamaani tii.ni? hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m ^a^M1.0179^ea^ mahaaaggi.daaho vu.t.thaati. mahaaaggi.daahe ^a^V1.0207^ea^ kho pana, bhikkhave, vu.t.thite tena gaamaapi .dayhanti nigamaapi .dayhanti nagaraapi .dayhanti. gaamesupi .dayhamaanesu nigamesupi .dayhamaanesu nagaresupi .dayhamaanesu tattha maataapi putta.m nappa.tilabhati, puttopi maatara.m nappa.tilabhati ^a^T1.0229^ea^. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m amaataaputtika.m bhayanti assutavaa puthujjano bhaasati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo ya.m mahaamegho vu.t.thaati. mahaameghe kho pana, bhikkhave, vu.t.thite mahaaudakavaahako sa~njaayati. mahaaudakavaahake kho pana, bhikkhave, sa~njaayante tena gaamaapi vuyhanti nigamaapi vuyhanti nagaraapi vuyhanti. gaamesupi vuyhamaanesu nigamesupi vuyhamaanesu nagaresupi vuyhamaanesu tattha maataapi putta.m nappa.tilabhati, puttopi maatara.m nappa.tilabhati. ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m amaataaputtika.m bhayanti assutavaa puthujjano bhaasati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo ya.m bhaya.m hoti a.tavisa"nkopo, cakkasamaaru.lhaa jaanapadaa pariyaayanti. bhaye kho pana, bhikkhave, sati a.tavisa"nkope cakkasamaaru.lhesu jaanapadesu pariyaayantesu tattha maataapi putta.m nappa.tilabhati, puttopi maatara.m nappa.tilabhati. ida.m, bhikkhave, tatiya.m amaataaputtika.m bhayanti assutavaa puthujjano bhaasati. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni amaataaputtikaani bhayaaniiti assutavaa puthujjano bhaasati.

[03] ``taani kho panimaani {imaani kho (sii0), imaani kho pana (ka0)}, bhikkhave, tii.ni samaataaputtikaaniyeva bhayaani amaataaputtikaani bhayaaniiti assutavaa puthujjano bhaasati. katamaani tii.ni? hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m mahaaaggi.daaho vu.t.thaati. mahaaaggi.daahe kho pana, bhikkhave, vu.t.thite tena gaamaapi .dayhanti nigamaapi .dayhanti nagaraapi .dayhanti. gaamesupi .dayhamaanesu nigamesupi .dayhamaanesu nagaresupi .dayhamaanesu hoti so samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci maataapi putta.m ^a^T1.0230^ea^ ^a^P1.0179^ea^ pa.tilabhati, puttopi maatara.m pa.tilabhati. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m samaataaputtika.myeva bhaya.m amaataaputtika.m bhayanti assutavaa puthujjano bhaasati.

[03] ``puna ^a^M1.0180^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo ya.m mahaamegho vu.t.thaati. mahaameghe kho pana, bhikkhave, vu.t.thite mahaaudakavaahako sa~njaayati. mahaaudakavaahake kho pana, bhikkhave, sa~njaate ^a^V1.0208^ea^ tena gaamaapi vuyhanti nigamaapi vuyhanti nagaraapi vuyhanti. gaamesupi vuyhamaanesu nigamesupi vuyhamaanesu nagaresupi vuyhamaanesu hoti so samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci maataapi putta.m pa.tilabhati, puttopi maatara.m pa.tilabhati. ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m samaataaputtika.myeva bhaya.m amaataaputtika.m bhayanti assutavaa puthujjano bhaasati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo ya.m bhaya.m hoti a.tavisa"nkopo, cakkasamaaru.lhaa jaanapadaa pariyaayanti. bhaye kho pana, bhikkhave, sati a.tavisa"nkope cakkasamaaru.lhesu jaanapadesu pariyaayantesu hoti so samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci maataapi putta.m pa.tilabhati, puttopi maatara.m pa.tilabhati. ida.m, bhikkhave, tatiya.m samaataaputtika.myeva bhaya.m amaataaputtika.m bhayanti assutavaa puthujjano bhaasati. ``imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni samaataaputtikaaniyeva bhayaani amaataaputtikaani bhayaaniiti assutavaa puthujjano bhaasati''.

[03] ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, amaataaputtikaani bhayaani. katamaani tii.ni? jaraabhaya.m, byaadhibhaya.m, mara.nabhayanti. na, bhikkhave, maataa putta.m jiiramaana.m eva.m labhati -- `aha.m jiiraami, maa me putto jiirii'ti; putto vaa pana maatara.m jiiramaana.m na eva.m labhati -- `aha.m jiiraami, maa me ^a^T1.0231^ea^ maataa jiirii'''ti.

[03] ``na, bhikkhave, maataa putta.m byaadhiyamaana.m eva.m labhati -- `aha.m byaadhiyaami, maa me putto byaadhiyii'ti; putto vaa pana maatara.m byaadhiyamaana.m na eva.m labhati -- `aha.m byaadhiyaami, maa me maataa byaadhiyii'''ti.

[03] ``na, bhikkhave, maataa putta.m miiyamaana.m eva.m labhati -- `aha.m miiyaami, maa me putto miiyii'ti; putto vaa pana maatara.m miiyamaana.m na eva.m labhati -- `aha.m miiyaami, maa me maataa miiyii'ti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni amaataaputtikaani bhayaanii''ti.

[03] ``atthi ^a^P1.0180^ea^, bhikkhave, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa imesa~nca ti.n.na.m samaataaputtikaana.m bhayaana.m imesa~nca ti.n.na.m amaataaputtikaana.m bhayaana.m pahaanaaya samatikkamaaya sa.mvattati. katamo ca, bhikkhave, maggo katamaa ca pa.tipadaa ^a^M1.0181^ea^ imesa~nca ti.n.na.m samaataaputtikaana.m bhayaana.m imesa~nca ti.n.na.m ^a^V1.0209^ea^ amaataaputtikaana.m bhayaana.m pahaanaaya samatikkamaaya sa.mvattati? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkapo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa imesa~nca ti.n.na.m samaataaputtikaana.m bhayaana.m imesa~nca ti.n.na.m amaataaputtikaana.m bhayaana.m pahaanaaya samatikkamaaya sa.mvattatii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena venaagapura.m naama kosalaana.m braahma.nagaamo tadavasari. assosu.m kho venaagapurikaa braahma.nagahapatikaa -- ``sama.no khalu ^a^T1.0232^ea^, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito venaagapura.m anuppatto. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti {bhagavaa (sii0 syaa ka.m0 pii0) ida.m suttava.n.nanaaya a.t.thakathaaya sa.msandetabba.m paaraa0 1; dii0 ni0 1.255 passitabba.m}. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii''ti.

[03] atha kho venaagapurikaa braahma.nagahapatikaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa appekacce bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu, sammodaniiya.m katha.m ^a^P1.0181^ea^ saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce naamagotta.m saavetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce tu.nhiibhuutaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho venaagapuriko vacchagotto braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``acchariya.m ^a^M1.0182^ea^, bho gotama, abbhuta.m, bho gotama! yaava~ncida.m bhoto gotamassa vippasannaani indriyaani, parisuddho chaviva.n.no pariyodaato. seyyathaapi, bho gotama, saarada.m badarapa.n.du.m {ma.n.da.m (ka0)} parisuddha.m hoti pariyodaata.m; evameva.m bhoto gotamassa vippasannaani indriyaani parisuddho ^a^T1.0233^ea^ ^a^V1.0210^ea^ chaviva.n.no pariyodaato. seyyathaapi, bho gotama, taalapakka.m sampati bandhanaa pamutta.m {mutta.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)} parisuddha.m hoti pariyodaata.m; evameva.m bhoto gotamassa vippasannaani indriyaani parisuddho chaviva.n.no pariyodaato. seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nekkha.m {nikkha.m-itipi (ma0 ni0 3.168)} jambonada.m dakkhakammaaraputtasuparikammakata.m ukkaamukhe sukusalasampaha.t.tha.m pa.n.dukambale nikkhitta.m bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca; evameva.m bhoto gotamassa vippasannaani indriyaani parisuddho chaviva.n.no pariyodaato. yaani taani, bho gotama, uccaasayanamahaasayanaani, seyyathida.m -- aasandi palla"nko gonako cittako pa.tikaa pa.talikaa tuulikaa vikatikaa uddalomii ekantalomii ka.t.tissa.m koseyya.m kuttaka.m hatthatthara.m assatthara.m rathatthara.m ajinappave.nii kadalimigapavarapaccatthara.na.m {kaadalimigapavarapaccatthara.na.m (sii0)} sauttaracchada.m ubhatolohitakuupadhaana.m, evaruupaana.m nuuna bhava.m gotamo uccaasayanamahaasayanaana.m nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii''ti.

[03] ``yaani kho pana taani, braahma.na, uccaasayanamahaasayanaani, seyyathida.m -- aasandi palla"nko gonako cittako pa.tikaa pa.talikaa tuulikaa vikatikaa uddalomii ekantalomii ka.t.tissa.m koseyya.m kuttaka.m hatthatthara.m assatthara.m rathatthara.m ajinappave.nii kadalimigapavarapaccatthara.na.m sauttaracchada.m ubhatolohitakuupadhaana.m. dullabhaani taani pabbajitaana.m laddhaa ca pana {laddhaani ca (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), laddhaa ca (pii0)} na kappanti.

[03] ``tii.ni kho, imaani, braahma.na, uccaasayanamahaasayanaani, yesaaha.m etarahi nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. katamaani tii.ni? dibba.m ^a^P1.0182^ea^ uccaasayanamahaasayana.m, brahma.m uccaasayanamahaasayana.m, ariya.m uccaasayanamahaasayana.m. imaani kho, braahma.na, tii.ni uccaasayanamahaasayanaani, yesaaha.m etarahi nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii''ti.

[03] ``katama.m ^a^T1.0234^ea^ ^a^M1.0183^ea^ pana ta.m, bho gotama, dibba.m uccaasayanamahaasayana.m, yassa bhava.m gotamo etarahi nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii''ti? ``idhaaha.m, braahma.na, ya.m gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa upanissaaya viharaami, so pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya tameva gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya pavisaami. so pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto vananta~n~neva pavisaami {pacaarayaami (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}. so yadeva tattha honti ti.naani vaa pa.n.naani vaa taani ekajjha.m sa"ngharitvaa nisiidaami palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so vivicceva kaamehi ^a^V1.0211^ea^ vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami; vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami; piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharaami sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedemi, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami; sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. so ce aha.m, braahma.na, eva.mbhuuto ca"nkamaami, dibbo me eso tasmi.m samaye ca"nkamo hoti. so ce aha.m, braahma.na, eva.mbhuuto ti.t.thaami, dibba.m me eta.m tasmi.m samaye .thaana.m hoti. so ce aha.m, braahma.na, eva.mbhuuto nisiidaami, dibba.m me eta.m tasmi.m samaye ^a^T1.0235^ea^ aasana.m hoti. so ce aha.m, braahma.na, eva.mbhuuto seyya.m kappemi, dibba.m me eta.m tasmi.m samaye uccaasayanamahaasayana.m hoti. ida.m kho, braahma.na, dibba.m ^a^P1.0183^ea^ uccaasayanamahaasayana.m, yassaaha.m etarahi nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii''ti.
[03] ``acchariya.m, bho gotama, abbhuta.m, bho gotama! ko ca~n~no evaruupassa dibbassa uccaasayanamahaasayanassa nikaamalaabhii bhavissati akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, a~n~natra bhotaa gotamena!

[03] ``katama.m pana ta.m, bho gotama, brahma.m uccaasayanamahaasayana.m, yassa bhava.m gotamo etarahi nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii''ti? ``idhaaha.m, braahma.na, ya.m gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa upanissaaya viharaami, so pubba.nhasamaya.m ^a^M1.0184^ea^ nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya tameva gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya pavisaami. so pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto vananta~n~neva pavisaami. so yadeva tattha honti ti.naani vaa pa.n.naani vaa taani ekajjha.m sa"ngharitvaa nisiidaami palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharaami, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m, iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjhena {abyaapajjhena (sabbattha)} pharitvaa viharaami. karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharaami, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m ^a^V1.0212^ea^, tathaa catuttha.m {catutthi.m (sii0)}, iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya ^a^T1.0236^ea^ sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjhena pharitvaa viharaami. so ce aha.m, braahma.na, eva.mbhuuto ca"nkamaami, brahmaa me eso tasmi.m samaye ca"nkamo hoti. so ce aha.m, braahma.na, eva.mbhuuto ti.t.thaami...pe0... nisiidaami...pe0... seyya.m kappemi, brahma.m me eta.m tasmi.m samaye uccaasayanamahaasayana.m hoti. ida.m kho, braahma.na, brahma.m uccaasayanamahaasayana.m, yassaaha.m etarahi nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii''ti.

[03] ``acchariya.m ^a^P1.0184^ea^, bho gotama, abbhuta.m, bho gotama! ko ca~n~no evaruupassa brahmassa uccaasayanamahaasayanassa nikaamalaabhii bhavissati akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, a~n~natra bhotaa gotamena!

[03] ``katama.m pana ta.m, bho gotama, ariya.m uccaasayanamahaasayana.m, yassa bhava.m gotamo etarahi nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii''ti? ``idhaaha.m, braahma.na, ya.m gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa upanissaaya viharaami, so pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya tameva gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya pavisaami. so pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto vananta~n~neva pavisaami. so yadeva tattha honti ti.naani vaa pa.n.naani vaa taani ekajjha.m sa"ngharitvaa nisiidaami palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so eva.m jaanaami -- `raago me pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo; doso me pahiino ucchinnamuulo ^a^M1.0185^ea^ taalaavatthukato anabhaava"nkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo; moho me pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava"nkato ^a^T1.0237^ea^ aayati.m anuppaadadhammo'. so ce aha.m, braahma.na, eva.mbhuuto ca"nkamaami, ariyo me eso tasmi.m samaye ca"nkamo hoti. so ce aha.m, braahma.na, eva.mbhuuto ti.t.thaami...pe0... nisiidaami...pe0... seyya.m kappemi, ariya.m me eta.m tasmi.m samaye uccaasayanamahaasayana.m hoti. ida.m kho, braahma.na, ariya.m uccaasayanamahaasayana.m, yassaaha.m etarahi nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii''ti.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bho gotama, abbhuta.m, bho gotama! ko ca~n~no evaruupassa ariyassa uccaasayanamahaasayanassa ^a^V1.0213^ea^ nikaamalaamii bhavissati akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, a~n~natra bhotaa gotamena!

[03] ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti; evameva.m kho bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. ete maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m ^a^P1.0185^ea^ gacchaama dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasake no bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupete sara.na.m gate''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. tena kho pana samayena sarabho naama paribbaajako acirapakkanto hoti imasmaa dhammavinayaa. so raajagahe parisati {parisati.m (sii0 pii0)} eva.m vaaca.m bhaasati -- ``a~n~naato mayaa sama.naana.m sakyaputtikaana.m dhammo. a~n~naaya ca panaaha.m sama.naana.m sakyaputtikaana.m dhamma.m evaaha.m tasmaa dhammavinayaa apakkanto''ti. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m ^a^T1.0238^ea^ pi.n.daaya pavisi.msu. assosu.m kho te bhikkhuu sarabhassa paribbaajakassa raajagahe parisati eva.m vaaca.m bhaasamaanassa ^a^M1.0186^ea^ -- ``a~n~naato mayaa sama.naana.m sakyaputtikaana.m dhammo. a~n~naaya ca panaaha.m sama.naana.m sakyaputtikaana.m dhamma.m evaaha.m tasmaa dhammavinayaa apakkanto''ti.

[03] atha kho te bhikkhuu raajagahe pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``sarabho naama, bhante, paribbaajako acirapakkanto imasmaa dhammavinayaa. so raajagahe parisati eva.m vaaca.m bhaasati -- `a~n~naato mayaa sama.naana.m sakyaputtikaana.m dhammo. a~n~naaya ca panaaha.m sama.naana.m sakyaputtikaana.m dhamma.m evaaha.m tasmaa dhammavinayaa apakkanto'ti. saadhu bhante, bhagavaa yena sippinikaatiira.m {sappinikaatiira.m (sii0 pii0), sappiniyaa tiira.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} paribbaajakaaraamo ^a^V1.0214^ea^ yena sarabho paribbaajako tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena sippinikaatiira.m paribbaajakaaraamo yena sarabho paribbaajako tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi ^a^P1.0186^ea^. nisajja kho bhagavaa sarabha.m paribbaajaka.m etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, sarabha, eva.m vadesi -- `a~n~naato mayaa sama.naana.m sakyaputtikaana.m dhammo. a~n~naaya ca panaaha.m sama.naana.m sakyaputtikaana.m dhamma.m evaaha.m tasmaa dhammavinayaa apakkanto'''ti? eva.m vutte sarabho paribbaajako tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] dutiyampi kho, bhagavaa sarabha.m ^a^T1.0239^ea^ paribbaajaka.m etadavoca -- ``vadehi, sarabha, kinti te a~n~naato sama.naana.m sakyaputtikaana.m dhammo? sace te aparipuura.m bhavissati, aha.m paripuuressaami. sace pana te paripuura.m bhavissati, aha.m anumodissaamii''ti. dutiyampi kho sarabho paribbaajako tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] tatiyampi kho bhagavaa sarabha.m paribbaajaka.m etadavoca -- (``yo {mayaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} kho sarabha pa~n~naayati sama.naana.m sakyaputtikaana.m dhammo) {( ) sii0 potthake natthi} ``vadehi, sarabha, kinti te a~n~naato sama.naana.m sakyaputtikaana.m dhammo? sace te aparipuura.m ^a^M1.0187^ea^ bhavissati, aha.m paripuuressaami. sace pana te paripuura.m bhavissati, aha.m anumodissaamii''ti. tatiyampi kho sarabho paribbaajako tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] atha kho te paribbaajakaa sarabha.m paribbaajaka.m etadavocu.m -- ``yadeva kho tva.m, aavuso sarabha, sama.na.m gotama.m yaaceyyaasi tadeva te sama.no gotamo pavaareti. vadehaavuso sarabha, kinti te a~n~naato sama.naana.m sakyaputtikaana.m dhammo? sace te aparipuura.m bhavissati, sama.no gotamo paripuuressati. sace pana te paripuura.m bhavissati, sama.no gotamo anumodissatii''ti. eva.m vutte sarabho paribbaajako tu.nhiibhuuto ma"nkubhuuto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhaayanto appa.tibhaano nisiidi.
[03] atha ^a^V1.0215^ea^ kho bhagavaa sarabha.m paribbaajaka.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m ma"nkubhuuta.m pattakkhandha.m adhomukha.m pajjhaayanta.m appa.tibhaana.m viditvaa te paribbaajake etadavoca --

[03] ``yo kho ma.m, paribbaajakaa {paribbaajako (pii0 ka0)}, eva.m vadeyya -- `sammaasambuddhassa te pa.tijaanato ime dhammaa anabhisambuddhaa'ti, tamaha.m ^a^P1.0187^ea^ tattha ^a^T1.0240^ea^ saadhuka.m samanuyu~njeyya.m samanugaaheyya.m samanubhaaseyya.m. so vata mayaa saadhuka.m samanuyu~njiyamaano samanugaahiyamaano samanubhaasiyamaano a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m so ti.n.na.m .thaanaana.m naa~n~natara.m {a~n~natara.m (ka0)} .thaana.m nigaccheyya, a~n~nena vaa a~n~na.m pa.ticarissati, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaamessati, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukarissati, tu.nhiibhuuto ma"nkubhuuto {tu.nhiibhuuto vaa ma"nkubhuuto (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), tu.nhiibhuuto vaa ma"nkubhuuto vaa (pii0)} pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhaayanto appa.tibhaano nisiidissati, seyyathaapi sarabho paribbaajako.

[03] ``yo kho ma.m, paribbaajakaa, eva.m vadeyya -- `khii.naasavassa te pa.tijaanato ime aasavaa aparikkhii.naa'ti, tamaha.m tattha saadhuka.m samanuyu~njeyya.m samanugaaheyya.m samanubhaaseyya.m. so vata mayaa saadhuka.m samanuyu~njiyamaano samanugaahiyamaano samanubhaasiyamaano a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m so ti.n.na.m .thaanaana.m naa~n~natara.m .thaana.m nigaccheyya, a~n~nena vaa a~n~na.m pa.ticarissati, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaamessati, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca ^a^M1.0188^ea^ paatukarissati, tu.nhiibhuuto ma"nkubhuuto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhaayanto appa.tibhaano nisiidissati, seyyathaapi sarabho paribbaajako.

[03] ``yo kho ma.m, paribbaajakaa, eva.m vadeyya -- `yassa kho pana te atthaaya dhammo desito, so na niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaa'ti, tamaha.m tattha saadhuka.m samanuyu~njeyya.m samanugaaheyya.m samanubhaaseyya.m. so vata mayaa saadhuka.m samanuyu~njiyamaano samanugaahiyamaano samanubhaasiyamaano a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m so ti.n.na.m .thaanaana.m naa~n~natara.m .thaana.m nigaccheyya, a~n~nena vaa a~n~na.m pa.ticarissati, bahiddhaa katha.m ^a^T1.0241^ea^ apanaamessati, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukarissati, tu.nhiibhuuto ma"nkubhuuto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhaayanto appa.tibhaano nisiidissati, seyyathaapi sarabho paribbaajako''ti. atha kho bhagavaa sippinikaatiire paribbaajakaaraame tikkhattu.m siihanaada.m naditvaa vehaasa.m pakkaami.

[03] atha ^a^V1.0216^ea^ kho te paribbaajakaa acirapakkantassa bhagavato sarabha.m paribbaajaka.m samantato vaacaayasannitodakena {vaacaasattitodakena (sii0)} sa~njambharimaka.msu {sa~ncumbharimaka.msu (pii0, dii0 ni0 1.421) sa.m0 ni0 2.243 uparipaa.tho viya} -- ``seyyathaapi, aavuso sarabha, brahaara~n~ne jarasi"ngaalo `siihanaada.m nadissaamii'ti si"ngaalaka.myeva {segaalaka.myeva (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} nadati, bhera.n.daka.myeva nadati {bheda.n.daka.m (ka0)}; evameva.m kho tva.m, aavuso sarabha, a~n~natreva sama.nena gotamena `siihanaada.m nadissaamii'ti ^a^P1.0188^ea^ si"ngaalaka.myeva nadasi bhera.n.daka.myeva nadasi. seyyathaapi, aavuso sarabha, ambukasa~ncarii {ambakamaddarii (sii0)} `purisakaravita.m {phussakaravita.m (sii0), pussakaravita.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ravissaamii'ti ambukasa~ncariravita.myeva ravati; evameva.m kho tva.m, aavuso sarabha, a~n~natreva sama.nena gotamena `purisakaravita.m ravissaamii'ti, ambukasa~ncariravita.myeva ravasi. seyyathaapi, aavuso sarabha, usabho su~n~naaya gosaalaaya gambhiira.m naditabba.m ma~n~nati; evameva.m kho tva.m, aavuso sarabha, a~n~natreva sama.nena gotamena gambhiira.m naditabba.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho te paribbaajakaa sarabha.m paribbaajaka.m ^a^M1.0189^ea^ samantato vaacaayasannitodakena sa~njambharimaka.msuuti. catuttha.m.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena kesamutta.m {kesaputta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} naama kaalaamaana.m nigamo tadavasari. assosu.m kho kesamuttiyaa kaalaamaa -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa ^a^T1.0242^ea^ pabbajito kesamutta.m anuppatto. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa...pe0... saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii'''ti.

[03] atha kho kesamuttiyaa kaalaamaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa appekacce bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce naamagotta.m saavetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce tu.nhiibhuutaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te kesamuttiyaa kaalaamaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``santi, bhante, eke sama.nabraahma.naa kesamutta.m aagacchanti. te saka.myeva vaada.m diipenti jotenti, parappavaada.m pana khu.msenti vambhenti paribhavanti omakkhi.m {opapakkhi.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), omakkhika.m (ka0)} karonti. aparepi, bhante, eke ^a^V1.0217^ea^ sama.nabraahma.naa kesamutta.m aagacchanti ^a^P1.0189^ea^. tepi saka.myeva vaada.m diipenti jotenti, parappavaada.m pana khu.msenti vambhenti paribhavanti omakkhi.m karonti. tesa.m no, bhante ^a^T1.0243^ea^, amhaaka.m hoteva ka"nkhaa hoti vicikicchaa -- `ko su naama imesa.m bhavata.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m sacca.m aaha, ko musaa'''ti? ``ala~nhi vo, kaalaamaa, ka"nkhitu.m ala.m vicikicchitu.m. ka"nkhaniiyeva pana {ka"nkhaniiyeva ca pana (sa.myuttanikaaye)} vo .thaane vicikicchaa uppannaa''.

[03] ``etha tumhe, kaalaamaa, maa anussavena, maa paramparaaya, maa itikiraaya, maa pi.takasampadaanena, maa takkahetu, maa nayahetu, maa aakaaraparivitakkena ^a^M1.0190^ea^, maa di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa, maa bhabbaruupataaya, maa sama.no no garuuti. yadaa tumhe, kaalaamaa, attanaava jaaneyyaatha -- `ime dhammaa akusalaa, ime dhammaa saavajjaa, ime dhammaa vi~n~nugarahitaa, ime dhammaa samattaa samaadinnaa {samaadi.n.naa (ka0)} ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattantii'''ti, atha tumhe, kaalaamaa, pajaheyyaatha.
[01] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, kaalaamaa, lobho purisassa ajjhatta.m uppajjamaano uppajjati hitaaya vaa ahitaaya vaa''ti?
[03] ``ahitaaya, bhante''.

[01] ``luddho panaaya.m, kaalaamaa, purisapuggalo lobhena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto paa.nampi hanati, adinnampi aadiyati, paradaarampi gacchati, musaapi bha.nati, parampi tathattaaya {tadatthaaya (ka0)} samaadapeti, ya.m sa {ya.m tassa (ka0) anantarasutte pana ``ya.m' sa'' itveva sabbatthapi dissati} hoti diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaayaa''ti.
[03] ``eva.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, kaalaamaa, doso purisassa ajjhatta.m uppajjamaano uppajjati hitaaya vaa ahitaaya vaa''ti?
[03] ``ahitaaya, bhante''.

[01] ``du.t.tho panaaya.m, kaalaamaa, purisapuggalo dosena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto paa.nampi hanati ^a^V1.0218^ea^ {hanti (sii0 pii0)}, adinnampi aadiyati, paradaarampi gacchati, musaapi bha.nati, parampi tathattaaya samaadapeti, ya.m sa hoti diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaayaa''ti.
[03] ``eva.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, kaalaamaa, moho ^a^T1.0244^ea^ purisassa ajjhatta.m uppajjamaano uppajjati hitaaya vaa ahitaaya vaa''ti?
[03] ``ahitaaya, bhante''.

[01] ``muu.lho ^a^P1.0190^ea^ panaaya.m, kaalaamaa, purisapuggalo mohena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto paa.nampi hanati, adinnampi aadiyati, paradaarampi gacchati, musaapi bha.nati, parampi tathattaaya samaadapeti, ya.m sa hoti diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaayaa''ti.
[03] ``eva.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, kaalaamaa, ime dhammaa kusalaa vaa akusalaa vaa''ti?
[03] ``akusalaa, bhante''.
[01] ``saavajjaa vaa anavajjaa vaa''ti?
[03] ``saavajjaa, bhante''.
[01] ``vi~n~nugarahitaa vaa vi~n~nuppasatthaa vaa''ti?
[03] ``vi~n~nugarahitaa, bhante''.
[01] ``samattaa samaadinnaa ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattanti, no vaa? katha.m vaa {katha.m vaa vo (?)} ettha hotii''ti ^a^M1.0191^ea^?
[03] ``samattaa, bhante, samaadinnaa ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattantiiti. eva.m no ettha hotii''ti.

[03] ``iti kho, kaalaamaa, ya.m ta.m avocumhaa {avocumha (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) a0 ni0 4.193} -- `etha tumhe, kaalaamaa! maa anussavena, maa ^a^V1.0219^ea^ paramparaaya, maa itikiraaya, maa pi.takasampadaanena, maa takkahetu, maa nayahetu, maa aakaaraparivitakkena, maa di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa, maa bhabbaruupataaya, maa sama.no no garuuti. yadaa tumhe kaalaamaa attanaava jaaneyyaatha -- `ime dhammaa akusalaa, ime dhammaa saavajjaa, ime dhammaa vi~n~nugarahitaa, ime dhammaa samattaa samaadinnaa ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattantiiti, atha tumhe, kaalaamaa, pajaheyyaathaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m, idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ``etha tumhe, kaalaamaa, maa anussavena, maa paramparaaya, maa itikiraaya, maa pi.takasampadaanena, maa takkahetu, maa nayahetu, maa aakaaraparivitakkena, maa di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa, maa ^a^T1.0245^ea^ bhabbaruupataaya, maa sama.no no garuuti. yadaa tumhe, kaalaamaa, attanaava jaaneyyaatha -- `ime dhammaa kusalaa, ime dhammaa anavajjaa, ime dhammaa vi~n~nuppasatthaa, ime dhammaa samattaa samaadinnaa hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattantii'ti, atha tumhe, kaalaamaa, upasampajja vihareyyaatha.
[01] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, kaalaamaa, alobho purisassa ajjhatta.m uppajjamaano uppajjati hitaaya vaa ahitaaya vaa''ti?
[03] ``hitaaya, bhante''.

[01] ``aluddho panaaya.m, kaalaamaa, purisapuggalo lobhena anabhibhuuto apariyaadinnacitto neva paa.na.m hanati, na adinna.m aadiyati, na paradaara.m gacchati, na musaa bha.nati, na parampi tathattaaya samaadapeti ^a^P1.0191^ea^, ya.m sa hoti diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti.
[03] ``eva.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, kaalaamaa, adoso purisassa ajjhatta.m uppajjamaano uppajjati...pe0... amoho purisassa ajjhatta.m uppajjamaano uppajjati...pe0... hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti.
[03] ``eva.m bhante'' ^a^T1.0246^ea^.
[01] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, kaalaamaa, ime dhammaa kusalaa vaa akusalaa vaa''ti?
[03] ``kusalaa ^a^V1.0220^ea^, bhante''.
[01] ``saavajjaa vaa anavajjaa vaa''ti?
[03] ``anavajjaa, bhante''.
[01] ``vi~n~nugarahitaa vaa vi~n~nuppasatthaa vaa''ti?
[03] ``vi~n~nuppasatthaa, bhante''.
[01] ``samattaa samaadinnaa ^a^M1.0192^ea^ hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattanti no vaa? katha.m vaa ettha hotii''ti?
[03] ``samattaa, bhante, samaadinnaa hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattanti. eva.m no ettha hotii''ti.

[03] ``iti kho, kaalaamaa, ya.m ta.m avocumhaa -- `etha tumhe, kaalaamaa! maa anussavena, maa paramparaaya, maa itikiraaya, maa pi.takasampadaanena, maa takkahetu, maa nayahetu, maa aakaaraparivitakkena, maa di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa, maa bhabbaruupataaya, maa sama.no no garuuti. yadaa tumhe, kaalaamaa, attanaava jaaneyyaatha -- ime dhammaa kusalaa, ime dhammaa anavajjaa, ime dhammaa vi~n~nuppasatthaa, ime dhammaa samattaa samaadinnaa hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattantiiti, atha tumhe, kaalaamaa, upasampajja ^a^P1.0192^ea^ vihareyyaathaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ``sa kho so {yo kho (ka0)}, kaalaamaa, ariyasaavako eva.m vigataabhijjho vigatabyaapaado asammuu.lho sampajaano patissato {sato (ka0)} mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m, iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjhena pharitvaa viharati. karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m ^a^T1.0247^ea^, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m, iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjhena pharitvaa viharati.

[03] ``sa ^a^V1.0221^ea^ {sace (ka0)} kho so, kaalaamaa, ariyasaavako eva.m averacitto eva.m abyaapajjhacitto eva.m asa.mkili.t.thacitto eva.m visuddhacitto. tassa di.t.theva dhamme cattaaro assaasaa adhigataa honti. `sace kho pana atthi paro loko, atthi sukatadukka.taana.m {suka.tadukka.taana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, athaaha.m {.thaanamaha.m (sii0 pii0), .thaanameta.m yenaaha.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjissaamii'ti, ayamassa pa.thamo assaaso adhigato hoti.

[03] ```sace ^a^M1.0193^ea^ kho pana natthi paro loko, natthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, athaaha.m {idhaaha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} di.t.theva dhamme avera.m abyaapajjha.m aniigha.m sukhi.m {sukha.m (sii0), sukhii (syaa0 ka.m0)} attaana.m pariharaamii'ti, ayamassa dutiyo assaaso adhigato hoti.
[03] ```sace kho pana karoto kariiyati paapa.m, na kho panaaha.m kassaci paapa.m cetemi. akaronta.m kho pana ma.m paapakamma.m kuto dukkha.m phusissatii'ti, ayamassa tatiyo assaaso adhigato hoti.
