[03] ``sace ^a^V1.0230^ea^, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `tayome, aavuso, dhammaa. katame tayo? raago, doso, moho -- ime kho, aavuso, tayo dhammaa; imesa.m, aavuso, ti.n.na.m ^a^P1.0200^ea^ dhammaana.m ko viseso ko adhippayaaso ki.m naanaakara.na'nti? eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- `raago kho, aavuso, appasaavajjo dandhaviraagii, doso mahaasaavajjo khippaviraagii, moho mahaasaavajjo dandhaviraagii''' ti.

[03] ```ko panaavuso, hetu ko paccayo yena anuppanno vaa raago uppajjati uppanno vaa raago bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattatii'ti? `subhanimittantissa vacaniiya.m. tassa subhanimitta.m ayoniso manasi karoto anuppanno vaa raago uppajjati uppanno vaa raago bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattati. aya.m kho, aavuso, hetu aya.m paccayo yena anuppanno vaa raago uppajjati uppanno vaa raago bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattatii'''ti.

[03] ```ko panaavuso, hetu ko ^a^T1.0257^ea^ paccayo yena anuppanno vaa doso uppajjati uppanno vaa doso bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattatii'ti? `pa.tighanimitta.m tissa vacaniiya.m. tassa pa.tighanimitta.m ayoniso manasi karoto anuppanno vaa doso uppajjati uppanno vaa doso bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattati. aya.m kho, aavuso, hetu aya.m paccayo yena anuppanno vaa doso uppajjati uppanno vaa doso bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattatii'''ti.

[03] ```ko panaavuso, hetu ko paccayo yena anuppanno vaa moho uppajjati uppanno vaa moho bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattatii'ti? `ayoniso manasikaaro tissa vacaniiya.m. tassa ayoniso manasi karoto anuppanno vaa moho uppajjati uppanno vaa moho bhiyyobhaavaaya ^a^M1.0201^ea^ vepullaaya sa.mvattati. aya.m kho, aavuso, hetu aya.m paccayo yena anuppanno vaa moho uppajjati uppanno vaa moho bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya sa.mvattatii'''ti.

[03] ```ko panaavuso, hetu ko paccayo yena anuppanno ceva raago nuppajjati uppanno ca raago pahiiyatii'ti? `asubhanimittantissa vacaniiya.m. tassa asubhanimitta.m yoniso manasi karoto anuppanno ceva raago nuppajjati uppanno ^a^P1.0201^ea^ ca raago pahiiyati. aya.m kho, aavuso ^a^V1.0231^ea^, hetu aya.m paccayo yena anuppanno ceva raago nuppajjati uppanno ca raago ^a^T1.0258^ea^ pahiiyatii'''ti.

[03] ```ko panaavuso, hetu ko paccayo yena anuppanno ceva doso nuppajjati uppanno ca doso pahiiyatii'ti? `mettaa cetovimuttii tissa vacaniiya.m. tassa metta.m cetovimutti.m yoniso manasi karoto anuppanno ceva doso nuppajjati uppanno ca doso pahiiyati. aya.m kho, aavuso, hetu aya.m paccayo yena anuppanno ceva doso nuppajjati uppanno ca doso pahiiyatii'''ti.

[03] ```ko panaavuso, hetu ko paccayo yena anuppanno ceva moho nuppajjati uppanno ca moho pahiiyatii'ti? `yonisomanasikaaro tissa vacaniiya.m. tassa yoniso manasi karoto anuppanno ceva moho nuppajjati uppanno ca moho pahiiyati. aya.m kho, aavuso, hetu aya.m paccayo yena anuppanno vaa moho nuppajjati uppanno ca moho pahiiyatii'''ti. a.t.thama.m.
[03] 70^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani ^a^M1.0202^ea^, bhikkhave, akusalamuulaani. katamaani tii.ni? lobho akusalamuula.m, doso akusalamuula.m, moho akusalamuula.m.

[03] ``yadapi, bhikkhave, lobho tadapi akusalamuula.m {akusala.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}; yadapi luddho abhisa"nkharoti kaayena vaacaaya manasaa tadapi akusala.m {akusalamuula.m (ka0)}; yadapi luddho lobhena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto parassa asataa dukkha.m uppaadayati {upadahati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vadhena vaa bandhanena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya ^a^T1.0259^ea^ vaa pabbaajanaaya vaa balavamhi balattho itipi tadapi akusala.m {ida.m pana sabbatthapi evameva dissati}. itissame lobhajaa lobhanidaanaa lobhasamudayaa lobhapaccayaa aneke paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti.

[03] ``yadapi, bhikkhave, doso tadapi akusalamuula.m; yadapi du.t.tho abhisa"nkharoti kaayena vaacaaya manasaa tadapi akusala.m; yadapi du.t.tho dosena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto parassa asataa dukkha.m uppaadayati vadhena vaa bandhanena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa pabbaajanaaya vaa balavamhi ^a^V1.0232^ea^ balattho ^a^P1.0202^ea^ itipi tadapi akusala.m. itissame dosajaa dosanidaanaa dosasamudayaa dosapaccayaa aneke paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti.

[03] ``yadapi, bhikkhave, moho tadapi akusalamuula.m; yadapi muu.lho abhisa"nkharoti kaayena vaacaaya manasaa tadapi akusala.m; yadapi muu.lho mohena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto parassa asataa dukkha.m uppaadayati vadhena vaa bandhanena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa pabbaajanaaya vaa balavamhi balattho itipi tadapi akusala.m. itissame mohajaa mohanidaanaa mohasamudayaa mohapaccayaa aneke paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti. evaruupo caaya.m, bhikkhave, puggalo vuccati akaalavaadiitipi, abhuutavaadiitipi, anatthavaadiitipi, adhammavaadiitipi, avinayavaadiitipi.

[03] ``kasmaa ^a^M1.0203^ea^ caaya.m, bhikkhave, evaruupo puggalo vuccati akaalavaadiitipi, abhuutavaadiitipi, anatthavaadiitipi, adhammavaadiitipi, avinayavaadiitipi? tathaahaaya.m, bhikkhave, puggalo parassa asataa dukkha.m uppaadayati vadhena vaa bandhanena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa pabbaajanaaya vaa balavamhi balattho itipi. bhuutena kho pana vuccamaano avajaanaati, no pa.tijaanaati; abhuutena vuccamaano ^a^T1.0260^ea^ na aatappa.m karoti, tassa nibbe.thanaaya itipeta.m ataccha.m itipeta.m abhuutanti. tasmaa evaruupo puggalo vuccati akaalavaadiitipi, abhuutavaadiitipi, anatthavaadiitipi, adhammavaadiitipi, avinayavaadiitipi.

[03] ``evaruupo, bhikkhave, puggalo lobhajehi paapakehi akusalehi dhammehi abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto di.t.the ceva dhamme dukkha.m viharati, savighaata.m saupaayaasa.m sapari.laaha.m. kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa.

[03] ``dosajehi...pe0... mohajehi paapakehi akusalehi dhammehi abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto di.t.the ceva dhamme dukkha.m viharati, savighaata.m saupaayaasa.m sapari.laaha.m. kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, saalo vaa dhavo vaa phandano vaa tiihi maaluvaalataahi uddhasto pariyonaddho anaya.m aapajjati, byasana.m aapajjati, anayabyasana.m aapajjati; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, evaruupo puggalo lobhajehi paapakehi akusalehi dhammehi ^a^V1.0233^ea^ ^a^P1.0203^ea^ abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto di.t.the ceva dhamme dukkha.m viharati, savighaata.m saupaayaasa.m sapari.laaha.m. kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa.

[03] ``dosajehi...pe0... mohajehi paapakehi akusalehi dhammehi abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto di.t.the ceva dhamme dukkha.m viharati savighaata.m saupaayaasa.m sapari.laaha.m. kaayassa ca bhedaa para.m mara.naa duggati paa.tika"nkhaa. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni akusalamuulaaniiti.
[03] ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, kusalamuulaani. katamaani tii.ni? alobho kusalamuula.m, adoso kusalamuula.m, amoho kusalamuula.m.

[03] ``yadapi ^a^M1.0204^ea^, bhikkhave, alobho tadapi kusalamuula.m {kusala.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}; yadapi aluddho abhisa"nkharoti kaayena vaacaaya manasaa ^a^T1.0261^ea^ tadapi kusala.m {kusalamuula.m (ka0)}; yadapi aluddho lobhena anabhibhuuto apariyaadinnacitto na parassa asataa dukkha.m uppaadayati vadhena vaa bandhanena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa pabbaajanaaya vaa balavamhi balattho itipi tadapi kusala.m. itissame alobhajaa alobhanidaanaa alobhasamudayaa alobhapaccayaa aneke kusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti.

[03] ``yadapi, bhikkhave, adoso tadapi kusalamuula.m; yadapi adu.t.tho abhisa"nkharoti kaayena vaacaaya manasaa tadapi kusala.m; yadapi adu.t.tho dosena anabhibhuuto apariyaadinnacitto na parassa asataa dukkha.m uppaadayati vadhena vaa bandhanena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa pabbaajanaaya vaa balavamhi balattho itipi tadapi kusala.m. itissame adosajaa adosanidaanaa adosasamudayaa adosapaccayaa aneke kusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti.

[03] ``yadapi, bhikkhave, amoho tadapi kusalamuula.m; yadapi amuu.lho abhisa"nkharoti kaayena vaacaaya manasaa tadapi kusala.m; yadapi amuu.lho mohena anabhibhuuto apariyaadinnacitto na parassa asataa dukkha.m uppaadayati vadhena vaa bandhanena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa pabbaajanaaya vaa balavamhi balattho itipi tadapi kusala.m. itissame amohajaa amohanidaanaa ^a^P1.0204^ea^ amohasamudayaa amohapaccayaa aneke kusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti. evaruupo caaya.m ^a^V1.0234^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo vuccati kaalavaadiitipi, bhuutavaadiitipi, atthavaadiitipi, dhammavaadiitipi, vinayavaadiitipi.

[03] ``kasmaa caaya.m, bhikkhave, evaruupo puggalo vuccati kaalavaadiitipi, bhuutavaadiitipi, atthavaadiitipi, dhammavaadiitipi, vinayavaadiitipi? tathaahaaya.m, bhikkhave, puggalo na parassa asataa dukkha.m uppaadayati vadhena vaa bandhanena vaa jaaniyaa ^a^T1.0262^ea^ vaa garahaaya vaa pabbaajanaaya vaa balavamhi balattho itipi. bhuutena kho pana vuccamaano pa.tijaanaati no avajaanaati; abhuutena vuccamaano aatappa.m karoti tassa nibbe.thanaaya -- `itipeta.m ataccha.m, itipeta.m abhuuta'nti ^a^M1.0205^ea^. tasmaa evaruupo puggalo vuccati kaalavaadiitipi, atthavaadiitipi, dhammavaadiitipi, vinayavaadiitipi.

[03] ``evaruupassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa lobhajaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. di.t.theva dhamme sukha.m viharati avighaata.m anupaayaasa.m apari.laaha.m. di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayati.

[03] ``dosajaa...pe0... parinibbaayati. mohajaa...pe0... parinibbaayati. seyyathaapi bhikkhave, saalo vaa dhavo vaa phandano vaa tiihi maaluvaalataahi uddhasto pariyonaddho. atha puriso aagaccheyya kuddaala-pi.taka.m {kuddaalapi.taka.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} aadaaya. so ta.m maaluvaalata.m muule chindeyya, muule chetvaa palikha.neyya, palikha.nitvaa muulaani uddhareyya, antamaso usiiranaa.limattaanipi {usiiranaa.lamattaanipi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. so ta.m maaluvaalata.m kha.n.daakha.n.dika.m chindeyya, kha.n.daakha.n.dika.m chetvaa phaaleyya, phaaletvaa sakalika.m sakalika.m kareyya, sakalika.m sakalika.m karitvaa vaataatape visoseyya, vaataatape visosetvaa agginaa .daheyya, agginaa .dahitvaa masi.m ^a^P1.0205^ea^ kareyya, masi.m karitvaa mahaavaate vaa ophu.neyya nadiyaa vaa siighasotaaya pavaaheyya. evamassa {evamassu (sii0), evassu (ka0)} taa, bhikkhave, maaluvaalataa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa ^a^T1.0263^ea^ anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, evaruupassa puggalassa lobhajaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. di.t.theva dhamme sukha.m viharati avighaata.m anupaayaasa.m apari.laaha.m. di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayati.

[03] ``dosajaa ^a^V1.0235^ea^ ...pe0... mohajaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. di.t.theva dhamme sukha.m viharati avighaata.m anupaayaasa.m apari.laaha.m. di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayati. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni kusalamuulaanii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0206^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. atha kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa tadahuposathe yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho visaakha.m migaaramaatara.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``handa kuto nu tva.m, visaakhe, aagacchasi divaa divassaa''ti? ``uposathaaha.m, bhante, ajja upavasaamii''ti.

[03] ``tayo khome, visaakhe, uposathaa. katame tayo? gopaalakuposatho, niga.n.thuposatho, ariyuposatho. katha~nca, visaakhe, gopaalakuposatho hoti? seyyathaapi, visaakhe, gopaalako saayanhasamaye saamikaana.m gaavo niyyaatetvaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ajja kho gaavo amukasmi~nca amukasmi~nca padese cari.msu, amukasmi~nca amukasmi~nca padese paaniiyaani pivi.msu; sve daani gaavo amukasmi~nca amukasmi~nca padese carissanti, amukasmi~nca amukasmi~nca padese paaniiyaani pivissantii'ti; evameva.m ^a^T1.0264^ea^ kho, visaakhe, idhekacco uposathiko iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha.m khvajja ida~ncida~nca khaadaniiya.m khaadi.m, ida~ncida~nca bhojaniiya.m bhu~nji.m ^a^P1.0206^ea^; sve daanaaha.m ida~ncida~nca khaadaniiya.m khaadissaami, ida.m cida~nca bhojaniiya.m bhu~njissaamii'ti. so tena abhijjhaasahagatena cetasaa divasa.m atinaameti. eva.m kho visaakhe, gopaalakuposatho hoti. eva.m upavuttho kho, visaakhe, gopaalakuposatho na mahapphalo hoti na mahaanisa.mso na mahaajutiko na mahaavipphaaro.

[03] ``katha~nca, visaakhe, niga.n.thuposatho hoti? atthi, visaakhe, niga.n.thaa naama sama.najaatikaa. te saavaka.m eva.m samaadapenti -- `ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, ye puratthimaaya disaaya paa.naa para.m yojanasata.m tesu da.n.da.m nikkhipaahi; ye pacchimaaya disaaya paa.naa para.m yojanasata.m ^a^V1.0236^ea^ tesu da.n.da.m nikkhipaahi; ye uttaraaya disaaya paa.naa para.m yojanasata.m tesu da.n.da.m nikkhipaahi; ye dakkhi.naaya disaaya paa.naa para.m yojanasata.m tesu da.n.da.m nikkhipaahii'ti. iti ekaccaana.m paa.naana.m anuddayaaya anukampaaya samaadapenti, ekaccaana.m paa.naana.m naanuddayaaya naanukampaaya samaadapenti. te tadahuposathe saavaka.m eva.m samaadapenti -- `ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, sabbacelaani ^a^M1.0207^ea^ {sabbaveraani (ka0)} nikkhipitvaa eva.m vadehi -- naaha.m kvacani kassaci ki~ncanatasmi.m {ki~ncanatasmi (?) kiriyaapadameta.m yathaa ki~ncanatatthiiti}, na ca mama kvacani katthaci ki~ncanatatthii'ti. jaananti kho panassa maataapitaro -- `aya.m amhaaka.m putto'ti; sopi jaanaati -- `ime mayha.m maataapitaro'ti. jaanaati kho panassa puttadaaro ^a^T1.0265^ea^ -- `aya.m mayha.m bhattaa'ti; sopi jaanaati -- `aya.m mayha.m puttadaaro'ti. jaananti kho panassa daasakammakaraporisaa -- `aya.m amhaaka.m ayyo'ti; sopi jaanaati -- `ime mayha.m daasakammakaraporisaa'ti. iti yasmi.m samaye sacce samaadapetabbaa musaavaade tasmi.m samaye samaadapenti. ida.m tassa musaavaadasmi.m vadaami. so tassaa rattiyaa accayena bhoge adinna.myeva paribhu~njati. ida.m tassa adinnaadaanasmi.m vadaami. eva.m kho, visaakhe, niga.n.thuposatho hoti. eva.m upavuttho kho, visaakhe, niga.n.thuposatho na mahapphalo hoti na mahaanisa.mso na mahaajutiko na mahaavipphaaro.

[03] ``katha~nca, visaakhe, ariyuposatho hoti? upakkili.t.thassa ^a^P1.0207^ea^, visaakhe, cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti. katha~nca, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa {pariyodaapanaa (?)} hoti? idha, visaakhe, ariyasaavako tathaagata.m anussarati -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. tassa tathaagata.m anussarato citta.m pasiidati, paamojja.m uppajjati. ye cittassa upakkilesaa te pahiiyanti, seyyathaapi, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa siisassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa siisassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti? kakka~nca pa.ticca mattika~nca pa.ticca udaka~nca pa.ticca purisassa ca tajja.m vaayaama.m pa.ticca, eva.m kho, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa siisassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti. evameva.m kho ^a^T1.0266^ea^, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^V1.0237^ea^, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti? idha, visaakhe, ariyasaavako tathaagata.m anussarati -- `itipi so ^a^M1.0208^ea^ bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. tassa tathaagata.m anussarato citta.m pasiidati, paamojja.m uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesaa te pahiiyanti. aya.m vuccati, visaakhe -- `ariyasaavako brahmuposatha.m upavasati, brahmunaa saddhi.m sa.mvasati, brahma~ncassa {brahma~nca (ka0)} aarabbha citta.m pasiidati, paamojja.m uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesaa te pahiiyanti'. eva.m kho, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa ^a^T1.0267^ea^ upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti.

[03] ``upakkili.t.thassa, visaakhe, cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti. katha~nca, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti? idha, visaakhe, ariyasaavako dhamma.m anussarati -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'ti. tassa dhamma.m anussarato citta.m pasiidati, paamojja.m uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesaa te ^a^P1.0208^ea^ pahiiyanti, seyyathaapi, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa kaayassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa kaayassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti? sotti~nca pa.ticca, cu.n.na~nca pa.ticca, udaka~nca pa.ticca, purisassa ca tajja.m vaayaama.m pa.ticca. eva.m kho, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa kaayassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti. evameva.m kho, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti? idha, visaakhe, ariyasaavako dhamma.m anussarati -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'ti. tassa dhamma.m anussarato citta.m pasiidati, paamojja.m uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesaa te pahiiyanti. aya.m vuccati, visaakhe, `ariyasaavako dhammuposatha.m upavasati, dhammena saddhi.m sa.mvasati, dhamma~ncassa aarabbha citta.m pasiidati, paamojja.m uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesaa te pahiiyanti'. eva.m kho, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti.

[03] ``upakkili.t.thassa ^a^V1.0238^ea^ ^a^M1.0209^ea^, visaakhe, cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti. katha~nca, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti? idha, visaakhe, ariyasaavako sa"ngha.m anussarati -- `suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, ujuppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, ~naayappa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, saamiicippa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, yadida.m cattaari purisayugaani a.t.tha purisapuggalaa esa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa'ti. tassa sa"ngha.m anussarato citta.m pasiidati, paamojja.m uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesaa te pahiiyanti, seyyathaapi, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa vatthassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa vatthassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti? usma~nca ^a^P1.0209^ea^ {uusa~nca (syaa0 ka.m0 a.t.thakathaayampi paa.thantara.m, sa.m0 ni0 3.89 khemakasuttapaa.liyaapi sameti.) usuma~nca (sii0)} pa.ticca, khaara~nca pa.ticca, gomaya~nca ^a^T1.0268^ea^ pa.ticca, udaka~nca pa.ticca, purisassa ca tajja.m vaayaama.m pa.ticca. eva.m kho, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa vatthassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti. evameva.m kho, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti? idha, visaakhe, ariyasaavako sa"ngha.m anussarati -- `suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa'ti. tassa sa"ngha.m anussarato citta.m pasiidati, paamojja.m uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesaa te pahiiyanti. aya.m vuccati, visaakhe, `ariyasaavako sa"nghuposatha.m upavasati, sa"nghena saddhi.m sa.mvasati, sa"ngha~ncassa aarabbha citta.m pasiidati, paamojja.m uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesaa te pahiiyanti'. eva.m kho, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti.

[03] ``upakkili.t.thassa, visaakhe, cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti. katha~nca, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti? idha, visaakhe, ariyasaavako attano siilaani anussarati akha.n.daani ^a^M1.0210^ea^ acchiddaani asabalaani akammaasaani bhujissaani vi~n~nuppasatthaani aparaama.t.thaani samaadhisa.mvattanikaani. tassa siila.m anussarato citta.m pasiidati, paamojja.m uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesaa te pahiiyanti, seyyathaapi, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa aadaasassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^V1.0239^ea^, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa aadaasassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti? tela~nca pa.ticca ^a^T1.0269^ea^, chaarika~nca pa.ticca, vaala.n.dupaka~nca pa.ticca, purisassa ca tajja.m vaayaama.m pa.ticca. eva.m kho, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa aadaasassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti. evameva.m kho, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti? idha ^a^P1.0210^ea^, visaakhe, ariyasaavako attano siilaani anussarati akha.n.daani...pe0... samaadhisa.mvattanikaani. tassa siila.m anussarato citta.m pasiidati, paamojja.m uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesaa te pahiiyanti. aya.m vuccati, visaakhe, `ariyasaavako siiluposatha.m upavasati, siilena saddhi.m sa.mvasati, siila~ncassa aarabbha citta.m pasiidati, paamojja.m uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesaa te pahiiyanti'. eva.m kho, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti.

[03] ``upakkili.t.thassa, visaakhe, cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti. katha~nca, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti? idha visaakhe, ariyasaavako devataa anussarati -- `santi devaa caatumahaaraajikaa {caatummahaaraajikaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, santi devaa taavati.msaa, santi devaa yaamaa, santi devaa tusitaa, santi devaa nimmaanaratino, santi devaa paranimmitavasavattino, santi devaa brahmakaayikaa, santi devaa tatuttari {tatuttari.m (sii0 pii0)}. yathaaruupaaya saddhaaya samannaagataa taa devataa ito cutaa tatthupapannaa {tatthuppannaa (sii0 pii0)}, mayhampi tathaaruupaa saddhaa sa.mvijjati. yathaaruupena siilena samannaagataa taa devataa ito cutaa tatthupapannaa, mayhampi tathaaruupa.m siila.m ^a^T1.0270^ea^ sa.mvijjati. yathaaruupena sutena samannaagataa taa devataa ito cutaa tatthupapannaa, mayhampi tathaaruupa.m suta.m sa.mvijjati. yathaaruupena caagena samannaagataa taa devataa ito cutaa tatthupapannaa, mayhampi tathaaruupo caago sa.mvijjati. yathaaruupaaya pa~n~naaya ^a^M1.0211^ea^ samannaagataa taa devataa ito cutaa tatthupapannaa, mayhampi tathaaruupaa pa~n~naa sa.mvijjatii'ti. tassa attano ca taasa~nca devataana.m saddha~nca siila~nca suta~nca caaga~nca pa~n~na~nca anussarato citta.m pasiidati, paamojja.m uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesaa te pahiiyanti, seyyathaapi, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa jaataruupassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^V1.0240^ea^, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa jaataruupassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti? ukka~nca pa.ticca, lo.na~nca pa.ticca, geruka~nca pa.ticca, naa.likasa.n.daasa~nca {naa.lika~nca pa.ticca sa.n.daasa~nca (pii0 ka0)} pa.ticca, purisassa ca tajja.m vaayaama.m pa.ticca. eva.m kho, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa jaataruupassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti. evameva.m kho, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^P1.0211^ea^, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti? idha, visaakhe, ariyasaavako devataa anussarati -- `santi devaa caatumahaaraajikaa, santi devaa taavati.msaa...pe0... santi devaa tatuttari. yathaaruupaaya saddhaaya samannaagataa taa devataa ito cutaa tatthupapannaa, mayhampi tathaaruupaa saddhaa sa.mvijjati. yathaaruupena siilena...pe0... sutena...pe0... caagena...pe0... pa~n~naaya samannaagataa taa devataa ito cutaa ^a^T1.0271^ea^ tatthupapannaa, mayhampi tathaaruupaa pa~n~naa sa.mvijjatii'ti. tassa attano ca taasa~nca devataana.m saddha~nca siila~nca suta~nca caaga~nca pa~n~na~nca anussarato citta.m pasiidati, paamojja.m uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesaa te pahiiyanti. aya.m vuccati, visaakhe, `ariyasaavako devatuposatha.m upavasati, devataahi saddhi.m sa.mvasati, devataa aarabbha citta.m pasiidati, paamojja.m uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesaa te pahiiyanti'. eva.m kho, visaakhe, upakkili.t.thassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanaa hoti.

[03] ``sa kho so, visaakhe, ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yaavajiiva.m arahanto paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirataa nihitada.n.daa nihitasatthaa lajjii dayaapannaa sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharanti; ahampajja ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato nihitada.n.do nihitasattho lajjii dayaapanno sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii ^a^M1.0212^ea^ viharaami. iminaapi {iminaapaha.m (sii0) a0 ni0 8.41} a"ngena arahata.m anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.

[03] ``yaavajiiva.m arahanto adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirataa dinnaadaayii dinnapaa.tika"nkhii, athenena sucibhuutena attanaa viharanti; ahampajja ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato dinnaadaayii dinnapaa.tika"nkhii, athenena sucibhuutena attanaa ^a^V1.0241^ea^ viharaami. iminaapi a"ngena arahata.m anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.

[03] ``yaavajiiva.m arahanto abrahmacariya.m pahaaya brahmacaarii aaraacaarii {anaacaarii (pii0)} virataa methunaa gaamadhammaa; ahampajja ^a^T1.0272^ea^ ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m abrahmacariya.m pahaaya brahmacaarii aaraacaarii virato methunaa gaamadhammaa. iminaapi a"ngena arahata.m anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.

[03] ``yaavajiiva.m ^a^P1.0212^ea^ arahanto musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirataa saccavaadii saccasandhaa thetaa paccayikaa avisa.mvaadakaa lokassa; ahampajja ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato saccavaadii saccasandho theto paccayiko avisa.mvaadako lokassa. iminaapi a"ngena arahata.m anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.

[03] ``yaavajiiva.m arahanto suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m pahaaya suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirataa; ahampajja ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaana.m pahaaya suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato. iminaapi a"ngena arahata.m anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.

[03] ``yaavajiiva.m arahanto ekabhattikaa rattuuparataa virataa vikaalabhojanaa; ahampajja ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m ekabhattiko rattuuparato virato vikaalabhojanaa. iminaapi a"ngena arahata.m anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.

[03] ``yaavajiiva.m arahanto naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanamaalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaanaa pa.tivirataa; ahampajja ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanamaalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato ^a^M1.0213^ea^. iminaapi a"ngena arahata.m anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.

[03] ``yaavajiiva.m arahanto uccaasayanamahaasayana.m pahaaya uccaasayanamahaasayanaa pa.tivirataa niicaseyya.m ^a^T1.0273^ea^ ^a^V1.0242^ea^ kappenti ma~ncake vaa ti.nasanthaarake vaa; ahampajja ima~nca ratti.m ima~nca divasa.m uccaasayanamahaasayana.m pahaaya uccaasayanamahaasayanaa pa.tivirato niicaseyya.m kappemi ma~ncake vaa ti.nasanthaarake vaa. iminaapi a"ngena arahata.m anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatii''ti.
[03] ``eva.m kho, visaakhe, ariyuposatho hoti. eva.m upavuttho kho, visaakhe, ariyuposatho mahapphalo hoti mahaanisa.mso mahaajutiko mahaavipphaaro''.

[03] ``kiivamahapphalo hoti kiivamahaanisa.mso kiivamahaajutiko kiivamahaavipphaaro''? ``seyyathaapi, visaakhe, yo imesa.m so.lasanna.m mahaajanapadaana.m pahuutarattaratanaana.m {pahuutasattaratanaana.m (ka0 sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) .tiikaaya.m dassitapaa.liyeva. a0 ni0 8.42} issariyaadhipacca.m rajja.m kaareyya ^a^P1.0213^ea^, seyyathida.m -- a"ngaana.m, magadhaana.m, kaasiina.m, kosalaana.m, vajjiina.m, mallaana.m, cetiina.m, va"ngaana.m, kuruuna.m, pa~ncaalaana.m, macchaana.m {maccaana.m (ka0)}, suurasenaana.m, assakaana.m, avantiina.m, gandhaaraana.m, kambojaana.m, a.t.tha"ngasamannaagatassa uposathassa eta.m {eka.m (ka0)} kala.m naagghati so.lasi.m. ta.m kissa hetu? kapa.na.m, visaakhe, maanusaka.m rajja.m dibba.m sukha.m upanidhaaya''.

[01] ``yaani, visaakhe, maanusakaani pa~n~naasa vassaani, caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m eso eko rattindivo {rattidivo (ka0)}. taaya rattiyaa ti.msarattiyo maaso. tena maasena dvaadasamaasiyo sa.mvaccharo. tena sa.mvaccharena dibbaani pa~nca vassasataani caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, visaakhe, vijjati ya.m idhekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m uposatha.m upavasitvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m ^a^T1.0274^ea^ sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ida.m kho paneta.m, visaakhe, sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `kapa.na.m maanusaka.m rajja.m dibba.m sukha.m upanidhaaya'''.

[03] ``ya.m ^a^M1.0214^ea^, visaakhe, maanusaka.m vassasata.m, taavati.msaana.m devaana.m eso eko rattindivo. taaya rattiyaa ti.msarattiyo maaso. tena maasena dvaadasamaasiyo sa.mvaccharo. tena sa.mvaccharena dibba.m vassasahassa.m taavati.msaana.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, visaakhe, vijjati ya.m idhekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m uposatha.m upavasitvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa ^a^V1.0243^ea^ taavati.msaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ida.m kho paneta.m, visaakhe, sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `kapa.na.m maanusaka.m rajja.m dibba.m sukha.m upanidhaaya'''.

[03] ``yaani, visaakhe, maanusakaani dve vassasataani, yaamaana.m devaana.m eso eko rattindivo. taaya rattiyaa ti.msarattiyo maaso. tena maasena dvaadasamaasiyo sa.mvaccharo. tena sa.mvaccharena dibbaani dve vassasahassaani yaamaana.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, visaakhe, vijjati ya.m idhekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m uposatha.m upavasitvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa yaamaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ida.m kho paneta.m, visaakhe, sandhaaya ^a^P1.0214^ea^ bhaasita.m -- `kapa.na.m maanusaka.m rajja.m dibba.m sukha.m upanidhaaya'''.

[03] ``yaani, visaakhe, maanusakaani cattaari vassasataani, tusitaana.m devaana.m eso eko rattindivo. taaya rattiyaa ti.msarattiyo maaso. tena maasena dvaadasamaasiyo sa.mvaccharo. tena sa.mvaccharena dibbaani cattaari vassasahassaani tusitaana.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m. .thaana.m kho ^a^T1.0275^ea^ paneta.m, visaakhe, vijjati ya.m idhekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m uposatha.m upavasitvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa tusitaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ida.m kho paneta.m, visaakhe, sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `kapa.na.m maanusaka.m rajja.m dibba.m sukha.m upanidhaaya'''.

[03] ``yaani, visaakhe, maanusakaani a.t.tha vassasataani, nimmaanaratiina.m devaana.m eso eko rattindivo. taaya rattiyaa ti.msarattiyo maaso. tena maasena dvaadasamaasiyo sa.mvaccharo. tena sa.mvaccharena dibbaani a.t.tha vassasahassaani nimmaanaratiina.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, visaakhe, vijjati ya.m idhekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m uposatha.m upavasitvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa nimmaanaratiina.m devaana.m sahabyata.m ^a^M1.0215^ea^ upapajjeyya. ida.m kho paneta.m, visaakhe, sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `kapa.na.m maanusaka.m rajja.m dibba.m sukha.m upanidhaaya'''.

[03] ``yaani, visaakhe, maanusakaani so.lasa vassasataani, paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m eso eko rattindivo. taaya rattiyaa ti.msarattiyo maaso. tena maasena dvaadasamaasiyo sa.mvaccharo. tena sa.mvaccharena dibbaani so.lasa vassasahassaani paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, visaakhe, vijjati ya.m idhekacco itthii vaa puriso vaa a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m ^a^V1.0244^ea^ uposatha.m upavasitvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjeyya. ida.m kho paneta.m, visaakhe, sandhaaya bhaasita.m -- `kapa.na.m maanusaka.m rajja.m dibba.m sukha.m upanidhaayaa'''ti.
[21] ``paa.na.m ^a^T2.0276^ea^ na ha~n~ne {na haane (sii0 pii0), na hane (ka0)} na cadinnamaadiye,
[27] musaa na bhaase na ca majjapo siyaa.
[26] abrahmacariyaa ^a^P1.0215^ea^ virameyya methunaa,
[22] ratti.m na bhu~njeyya vikaalabhojana.m..
[21] ``maala.m na dhaare na ca gandhamaacare,
[27] ma~nce chamaaya.m va sayetha santhate.
[26] eta~nhi a.t.tha"ngikamaahuposatha.m,
[22] buddhena dukkhantagunaa pakaasita.m..
[21] ``cando ca suuriyo ca ubho sudassanaa,
[27] obhaasaya.m anupariyanti yaavataa.
[26] tamonudaa te pana antalikkhagaa,
[22] nabhe pabhaasanti disaavirocanaa..
[21] ``etasmi.m ya.m vijjati antare dhana.m,
[27] muttaa ma.ni ve.luriya~nca bhaddaka.m.
[26] si"ngii suva.n.na.m atha vaapi ka~ncana.m,
[22] ya.m jaataruupa.m ha.takanti vuccati..
[21] ``a.t.tha"ngupetassa ^a^M1.0216^ea^ uposathassa,
[27] kalampi te naanubhavanti so.lasi.m.
[26] candappabhaa taaraga.naa ca sabbe..
[21] ``tasmaa ^a^V1.0245^ea^ hi naarii ca naro ca siilavaa,
[27] a.t.tha"ngupeta.m ^a^T2.0277^ea^ upavassuposatha.m.
[26] pu~n~naani katvaana sukhudrayaani,
[22] aninditaa saggamupenti .thaana''nti.. dasama.m.
[06] mahaavaggo sattamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] titthabhaya~nca venaago, sarabho kesamuttiyaa.
[22] saa.lho caapi kathaavatthu, titthiyamuuluposathoti..

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V1.0246^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho channo paribbaajako yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho channo paribbaajako aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``tumhepi, aavuso aananda, raagassa pahaana.m pa~n~naapetha, dosassa pahaana.m pa~n~naapetha, mohassa pahaana.m pa~n~naapethaati. maya.m kho, aavuso, raagassa pahaana.m pa~n~naapema, dosassa pahaana.m ^a^P1.0216^ea^ pa~n~naapema, mohassa pahaana.m pa~n~napemaa''ti.

[03] ``ki.m pana tumhe, aavuso, raage aadiinava.m disvaa raagassa pahaana.m pa~n~naapetha, ki.m dose aadiinava.m disvaa dosassa pahaana.m pa~n~naapetha, ki.m mohe aadiinava.m disvaa mohassa pahaana.m ^a^T1.0278^ea^ pa~n~naapethaa''ti?

[03] ``ratto ^a^M1.0217^ea^ kho, aavuso, raagena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto attabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, parabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, cetasikampi dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; raage pahiine nevattabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, na parabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, na cetasika.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. ratto kho, aavuso, raagena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati; raage pahiine neva kaayena duccarita.m carati, na vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, na manasaa duccarita.m carati. ratto kho, aavuso, raagena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto attatthampi yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, paratthampi yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, ubhayatthampi yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati; raage pahiine attatthampi yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, paratthampi yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ubhayatthampi ^a^V1.0247^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. raago kho, aavuso, andhakara.no acakkhukara.no a~n~naa.nakara.no pa~n~naanirodhiko vighaatapakkhiko anibbaanasa.mvattaniko.

[03] ``du.t.tho kho, aavuso, dosena...pe0... muu.lho kho, aavuso, mohena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto attabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, parabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, cetasikampi dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti; mohe pahiine nevattabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, na parabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, na cetasika.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. muu.lho kho, aavuso, mohena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m ^a^T1.0279^ea^ carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati; mohe pahiine neva kaayena duccarita.m carati, na vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, na manasaa duccarita.m carati. muu.lho kho, aavuso, mohena abhibhuuto pariyaadinnacitto attatthampi yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, paratthampi yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, ubhayatthampi yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati; mohe pahiine ^a^P1.0217^ea^ attatthampi yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, paratthampi yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ubhayatthampi yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. moho kho, aavuso, andhakara.no acakkhukara.no a~n~naa.nakara.no pa~n~naanirodhiko vighaatapakkhiko anibbaanasa.mvattaniko. ida.m kho maya.m, aavuso, raage aadiinava.m disvaa raagassa pahaana.m ^a^M1.0218^ea^ pa~n~naapema. ida.m dose aadiinava.m disvaa dosassa pahaana.m pa~n~naapema. ida.m mohe aadiinava.m disvaa mohassa pahaana.m pa~n~naapemaa''ti.

[03] ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa etassa raagassa dosassa mohassa pahaanaayaa''ti? ``atthaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa etassa raagassa dosassa mohassa pahaanaayaa''ti. ``katamo panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa etassa raagassa dosassa mohassa pahaanaayaa''ti? ``ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, aavuso, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa etassa raagassa dosassa mohassa pahaanaayaa''ti. ``bhaddako kho, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa etassa raagassa dosassa mohassa pahaanaaya. ala~nca panaavuso aananda, appamaadaayaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T1.0280^ea^ ^a^V1.0248^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa aanando kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. atha kho a~n~nataro aajiivakasaavako gahapati yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so aajiivakasaavako gahapati aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca --

[03] ``kesa.m no, bhante aananda, dhammo svaakkhaato? ke loke suppa.tipannaa? ke loke sukataa''ti {sugataati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}? ``tena hi, gahapati, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami, yathaa te khameyya tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gahapati, ye raagassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desenti, dosassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desenti, mohassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desenti, tesa.m dhammo svaakkhaato no vaa? katha.m vaa te ettha hotii''ti? ``ye ^a^P1.0218^ea^, bhante, raagassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desenti, dosassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desenti, mohassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desenti, tesa.m dhammo svaakkhaato. eva.m me ettha hotii''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gahapati, ye raagassa pahaanaaya pa.tipannaa, dosassa pahaanaaya pa.tipannaa, mohassa pahaanaaya pa.tipannaa, te loke suppa.tipannaa ^a^M1.0219^ea^ no vaa? katha.m vaa te ettha hotii''ti? ``ye, bhante, raagassa pahaanaaya pa.tipannaa, dosassa pahaanaaya pa.tipannaa, mohassa pahaanaaya pa.tipannaa, te loke suppa.tipannaa. eva.m me ettha hotii''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gahapati, yesa.m raago pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo, yesa.m doso pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava"nkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo, yesa.m moho pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo, te loke sukataa no vaa? katha.m vaa te ettha hotii''ti? ``yesa.m, bhante, raago pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo, yesa.m doso pahiino...pe0... yesa.m moho pahiino ^a^T1.0281^ea^ ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo, te loke sukataa. eva.m me ettha hotii''ti.

[03] ``iti ^a^V1.0249^ea^ kho, gahapati, tayaaveta.m {tayaa ceta.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)} byaakata.m -- `ye, bhante, raagassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desenti, dosassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desenti, mohassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desenti, tesa.m dhammo svaakkhaato'ti. tayaaveta.m byaakata.m -- `ye, bhante, raagassa pahaanaaya pa.tipannaa, dosassa pahaanaaya pa.tipannaa, mohassa pahaanaaya pa.tipannaa, te loke suppa.tipannaa'ti. tayaaveta.m byaakata.m -- `yesa.m, bhante, raago pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava"nkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo, yesa.m doso pahiino...pe0... yesa.m moho pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava"nkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo, te loke sukataa'''ti.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! na ceva naama sadhammukka.msanaa bhavissati, na ca paradhammaapasaadanaa {na paradhammaapasaadanaa (sii0 pii0), na paradhammavambhanaa (ma0 ni0 2.236)}. aayataneva {aayatane ca (ma0 ni0 2.236)} dhammadesanaa, attho ca vutto, attaa ca anupaniito. tumhe, bhante aananda, raagassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desetha, dosassa...pe0... mohassa pahanaaya dhamma.m ^a^P1.0219^ea^ desetha. tumhaaka.m, bhante aananda, dhammo svaakkhaato. tumhe, bhante aananda, raagassa pahaanaaya ^a^M1.0220^ea^ pa.tipannaa, dosassa...pe0... mohassa ^a^T1.0282^ea^ pahaanaaya pa.tipannaa. tumhe, bhante, loke suppa.tipannaa. tumhaaka.m, bhante aananda, raago pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava"nkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo, tumhaaka.m doso pahiino...pe0... tumhaaka.m moho pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava"nkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. tumhe loke sukataa.

[03] ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante! seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti; evameva.m ayyena aanandena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante aananda, ta.m bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m ayyo aanando dhaaretu, ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa gilaanaavu.t.thito {gilaanavu.t.thito (saddaniiti)} hoti aciravu.t.thito gela~n~naa. atha ^a^V1.0250^ea^ kho mahaanaamo sakko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mahaanaamo sakko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``diigharattaaha.m, bhante, bhagavataa eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami -- `samaahitassa ~naa.na.m, no asamaahitassaa'ti. samaadhi nu kho, bhante, pubbe, pacchaa ~naa.na.m; udaahu ~naa.na.m pubbe, pacchaa samaadhii''ti? atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``bhagavaa kho gilaanavu.t.thito aciravu.t.thito gela~n~naa ^a^T1.0283^ea^. aya~nca mahaanaamo sakko bhagavanta.m atigambhiira.m pa~nha.m pucchati. ya.mnuunaaha.m mahaanaama.m sakka.m ekamanta.m apanetvaa dhamma.m deseyya''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando mahaanaama.m sakka.m baahaaya.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m apanetvaa mahaanaama.m sakka.m etadavoca -- ``sekhampi kho, mahaanaama, siila.m vutta.m bhagavataa, asekhampi siila.m vutta.m bhagavataa; sekhopi samaadhi vutto bhagavataa ^a^P1.0220^ea^, asekhopi samaadhi vutto bhagavataa; sekhaapi pa~n~naa vuttaa bhagavataa, asekhaapi pa~n~naa vuttaa bhagavataa. katama~nca, mahaanaama ^a^M1.0221^ea^, sekha.m siila.m? idha, mahaanaama, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. ida.m vuccati, mahaanaama, sekha.m siila.m''.
[03] ``katamo ca, mahaanaama, sekho samaadhi? idha, mahaanaama, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, mahaanaama, sekho samaadhi.

[03] ``katamaa ca, mahaanaama, sekhaa pa~n~naa? idha, mahaanaama, bhikkhu ida.m dukkhanti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... ^a^V1.0251^ea^ aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. aya.m vuccati, mahaanaama, sekhaa pa~n~naa.

[03] ``sa kho so, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako eva.m siilasampanno eva.m samaadhisampanno eva.m pa~n~naasampanno aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. eva.m kho, mahaanaama, sekhampi siila.m vutta.m bhagavataa, asekhampi siila.m vutta.m bhagavataa; sekhopi samaadhi vutto bhagavataa, asekhopi samaadhi vutto bhagavataa; sekhaapi pa~n~naa vuttaa bhagavataa, asekhaapi pa~n~naa vuttaa bhagavataa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T1.0284^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa aanando vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho abhayo ca licchavi pa.n.ditakumaarako ca licchavi yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho abhayo licchavi aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``niga.n.tho, bhante, naa.taputto {naathaputto (sii0 pii0)} sabba~n~nuu sabbadassaavii aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanaati -- `carato ca me ti.t.thato ca suttassa ca jaagarassa ca satata.m samita.m ~naa.nadassana.m paccupa.t.thita'nti. so puraa.naana.m kammaana.m tapasaa byantiibhaava.m pa~n~napeti navaana.m kammaana.m akara.naa setughaata.m ^a^P1.0221^ea^. iti kammakkhayaa dukkhakkhayo, dukkhakkhayaa vedanaakkhayo, vedanaakkhayaa sabba.m dukkha.m nijji.n.na.m bhavissati -- evametissaa sandi.t.thikaaya nijjaraaya ^a^M1.0222^ea^ visuddhiyaa samatikkamo hoti. idha, bhante, bhagavaa kimaahaa''ti?

[03] ``tisso kho imaa, abhaya, nijjaraa visuddhiyo tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sammadakkhaataa sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya. katamaa tisso? idha, abhaya, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. so nava~nca kamma.m na karoti, puraa.na~nca kamma.m phussa phussa byantiikaroti. sandi.t.thikaa nijjaraa akaalikaa ehipassikaa opaneyyikaa paccatta.m veditabbaa vi~n~nuuhiiti.

[03] ``sa ^a^V1.0252^ea^ kho so, abhaya, bhikkhu eva.m siilasampanno vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja ^a^T1.0285^ea^ viharati. so nava~nca kamma.m na karoti, puraa.na~nca kamma.m phussa phussa byantiikaroti. sandi.t.thikaa nijjaraa akaalikaa ehipassikaa opaneyyikaa paccatta.m veditabbaa vi~n~nuuhiiti.

[03] ``sa kho so, abhaya, bhikkhu eva.m samaadhisampanno {eva.m siilasampanno eva.m samaadhisampanno (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. so nava~nca kamma.m na karoti, puraa.na~nca kamma.m phussa phussa byantiikaroti. sandi.t.thikaa nijjaraa akaalikaa ehipassikaa opaneyyikaa paccatta.m veditabbaa vi~n~nuuhiiti. imaa kho, abhaya, tisso nijjaraa visuddhiyo tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena sammadakkhaataa sattaana.m visuddhiyaa sokaparidevaana.m samatikkamaaya dukkhadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaaya ~naayassa adhigamaaya nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte pa.n.ditakumaarako licchavi abhaya.m licchavi.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m pana tva.m, samma abhaya, aayasmato aanandassa subhaasita.m subhaasitato naabbhanumodasii''ti? ``kyaaha.m, samma pa.n.ditakumaaraka, aayasmato aanandassa subhaasita.m subhaasitato ^a^P1.0222^ea^ naabbhanumodissaami! muddhaapi tassa vipateyya yo aayasmato aanandassa subhaasita.m subhaasitato naabbhanumodeyyaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0223^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^V1.0253^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m aananda.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``ye, aananda, anukampeyyaatha ye ca sotabba.m ma~n~neyyu.m mittaa vaa amaccaa vaa ~naatii vaa ^a^T1.0286^ea^ saalohitaa vaa te vo, aananda, tiisu .thaanesu samaadapetabbaa {samaadaapetabbaa (?)} nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa. katamesu tiisu? buddhe aveccappasaade samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi; satthaa devamanussaana.m, buddho bhagavaa'ti, dhamme aveccappasaade samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'ti, sa"nghe aveccappasaade samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa -- `suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho ujuppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho ~naayappa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho saamiicippa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, yadida.m cattaari purisayugaani a.t.tha purisapuggalaa esa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa'''ti.

[03] ``siyaa, aananda, catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m a~n~nathatta.m -- pathaviidhaatuyaa aapodhaatuyaa tejodhaatuyaa vaayodhaatuyaa, na tveva buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagatassa ariyasaavakassa siyaa a~n~nathatta.m tatrida.m a~n~nathatta.m. so vataananda, buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato ariyasaavako niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa pettivisaya.m vaa upapajjissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``siyaa ^a^P1.0223^ea^, aananda, catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m a~n~nathatta.m -- pathaviidhaatuyaa aapodhaatuyaa tejodhaatuyaa vaayodhaatuyaa, na tveva dhamme...pe0... na tveva sa"nghe aveccappasaadena ^a^T1.0287^ea^ samannaagatassa ariyasaavakassa siyaa a~n~nathatta.m tatrida.m a~n~nathatta.m. so vataananda, sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagato ^a^M1.0224^ea^ ariyasaavako niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa pettivisaya.m vaa upapajjissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``ye, aananda, anukampeyyaatha ye ca sotabba.m ma~n~neyyu.m mittaa vaa amaccaa vaa ~naatii vaa ^a^V1.0254^ea^ saalohitaa vaa te vo, aananda, imesu tiisu .thaanesu samaadapetabbaa nivesetabbaa pati.t.thaapetabbaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``bhavo, bhavoti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, bhavo hotii''ti?

[03] ``kaamadhaatuvepakka~nca, aananda, kamma.m naabhavissa, api nu kho kaamabhavo pa~n~naayethaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``iti kho, aananda, kamma.m khetta.m, vi~n~naa.na.m biija.m, ta.nhaa sneho {sineho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. avijjaaniivara.naana.m sattaana.m ta.nhaasa.myojanaana.m hiinaaya dhaatuyaa vi~n~naa.na.m pati.t.thita.m eva.m aayati.m {aayati (sii0)} punabbhavaabhinibbatti hoti. ( ) {(eva.m kho aananda bhavo hotiiti) (ka0) dutiyasutte pana ida.m paa.thanaanatta.m natthi}

[01] ``majjhimo cepi, kassapa, bhikkhu hoti...pe0... navo cepi, kassapa, bhikkhu hoti na sikkhaakaamo na sikkhaasamaadaanassa va.n.navaadii, ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu na sikkhaakaamaa te ca na sikkhaaya samaadapeti, ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu sikkhaakaamaa tesa~nca na va.n.na.m bha.nati bhuuta.m taccha.m kaalena, evaruupassaaha.m, kassapa, navassa bhikkhuno na va.n.na.m bha.naami. ta.m kissa hetu? satthaa hissa va.n.na.m bha.natiiti a~n~ne na.m bhikkhuu bhajeyyu.m, ye na.m bhajeyyu.m ^a^P1.0239^ea^ tyaassa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjeyyu.m, yyaassa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjeyyu.m tesa.m ta.m assa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaayaati. tasmaaha.m, kassapa, evaruupassa navassa bhikkhuno na va.n.na.m bha.naami.

[03] ``thero ^a^M1.0241^ea^ cepi, kassapa, bhikkhu hoti sikkhaakaamo sikkhaasamaadaanassa va.n.navaadii, ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu na sikkhaakaamaa te ca sikkhaaya samaadapeti, ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu sikkhaakaamaa tesa~nca va.n.na.m bha.nati ^a^T1.0308^ea^ bhuuta.m taccha.m kaalena, evaruupassaaha.m, kassapa, therassa bhikkhuno va.n.na.m bha.naami. ta.m kissa hetu? satthaa hissa va.n.na.m bha.natiiti a~n~ne na.m bhikkhuu bhajeyyu.m, ye na.m bhajeyyu.m tyaassa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjeyyu.m, yyaassa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjeyyu.m tesa.m ta.m assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaati. tasmaaha.m, kassapa, evaruupassa therassa bhikkhuno va.n.na.m bha.naami.

[03] ``majjhimo cepi, kassapa, bhikkhu hoti sikkhaakaamo...pe0... navo cepi, kassapa, bhikkhu hoti sikkhaakaamo sikkhaasamaadaanassa va.n.navaadii, ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu na sikkhaakaamaa te ca sikkhaaya samaadapeti, ye ca~n~ne bhikkhuu sikkhaakaamaa tesa~nca va.n.na.m bha.nati bhuuta.m taccha.m kaalena, evaruupassaaha.m, kassapa, navassa bhikkhuno va.n.na.m bha.naami. ta.m kissa hetu? satthaa hissa va.n.na.m bha.natiiti a~n~ne na.m bhikkhuu bhajeyyu.m, ye na.m bhajeyyu.m tyaassa ^a^V1.0272^ea^ di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjeyyu.m, yyaassa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjeyyu.m tesa.m ta.m assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaati. tasmaaha.m, kassapa, evaruupassa navassa bhikkhuno va.n.na.m bha.naamii''ti. ekaadasama.m.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani ^a^V1.0273^ea^ ^a^T1.0309^ea^, bhikkhave, kassakassa gahapatissa accaayikaani kara.niiyaani. katamaani tii.ni? idha, bhikkhave, kassako gahapati siigha.m siigha.m khetta.m suka.t.tha.m karoti sumatikata.m. siigha.m siigha.m khetta.m suka.t.tha.m karitvaa ^a^M1.0242^ea^ sumatikata.m siigha.m siigha.m biijaani pati.t.thaapeti. siigha.m siigha.m biijaani pati.t.thaapetvaa siigha.m siigha.m udaka.m abhinetipi ^a^P1.0240^ea^ apanetipi. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni kassakassa gahapatissa accaayikaani kara.niiyaani. tassa kho ta.m, bhikkhave, kassakassa gahapatissa natthi saa iddhi vaa aanubhaavo vaa -- `ajjeva me dha~n~naani jaayantu, sveva gabbhiini hontu, uttarasveva paccantuu'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo ya.m tassa kassakassa gahapatissa taani dha~n~naani utupari.naamiini jaayantipi gabbhiinipi honti paccantipi.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tii.nimaani bhikkhussa accaayikaani kara.niiyaani. katamaani tii.ni? adhisiilasikkhaasamaadaana.m, adhicittasikkhaasamaadaana.m, adhipa~n~naasikkhaasamaadaana.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni bhikkhussa accaayikaani kara.niiyaani. tassa kho ta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno natthi saa iddhi vaa anubhaavo vaa -- `ajjeva me anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimuccatu sve vaa uttarasve vaa'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo ya.m tassa bhikkhuno adhisiilampi sikkhato adhicittampi sikkhato adhipa~n~nampi sikkhato anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimuccati.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `tibbo no chando bhavissati adhisiilasikkhaasamaadaane, tibbo chando bhavissati adhicittasikkhaasamaadaane ^a^T1.0310^ea^, tibbo chando bhavissati adhipa~n~naasikkhaasamaadaane'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. pa.thama.m.
[03] 94^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani ^a^V1.0274^ea^, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa pavivekaani pa~n~naapenti. katamaani tii.ni? ciivarapaviveka.m, pi.n.dapaatapaviveka.m, senaasanapaviveka.m.

[03] ``tatrida.m, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa ciivarapavivekasmi.m pa~n~naapenti, saa.naanipi dhaarenti, masaa.naanipi dhaarenti, chavadussaanipi dhaarenti, pa.msukuulaanipi dhaarenti, tirii.taanipi dhaarenti, ajinampi dhaarenti, ajinakkhipampi dhaarenti, kusaciirampi dhaarenti, vaakaciirampi dhaarenti, phalakaciirampi dhaarenti, kesakambalampi dhaarenti, vaalakambalampi dhaarenti ^a^P1.0241^ea^, uluukapakkhikampi ^a^M1.0243^ea^ dhaarenti. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa ciivarapavivekasmi.m pa~n~naapenti.

[03] ``tatrida.m, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa pi.n.dapaatapavivekasmi.m pa~n~naapenti. saakabhakkhaapi honti, saamaakabhakkhaapi honti, niivaarabhakkhaapi honti, daddulabhakkhaapi honti, ha.tabhakkhaapi honti, ka.nabhakkhaapi honti, aacaamabhakkhaapi honti, pi~n~naakabhakkhaapi honti, ti.nabhakkhaapi honti, gomayabhakkhaapi honti, vanamuulaphalaahaaraa yaapenti pavattaphalabhojii. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa pi.n.dapaatapavivekasmi.m pa~n~naapenti.

[03] ``tatrida.m, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa senaasanapavivekasmi.m pa~n~naapenti ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m susaana.m {rukkhamuula.m bhusaagaara.m susaana.m (ka0)} vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m bhusaagaara.m {su~n~naagaara.m (ka0)}. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa senaasanapavivekasmi.m pa~n~naapenti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni ^a^T1.0311^ea^ a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa pavivekaani pa~n~naapenti.

[03] ``tii.ni kho panimaani, bhikkhave, imasmi.m dhammavinaye bhikkhuno pavivekaani. katamaani tii.ni? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa ca hoti, dussiilya~ncassa pahiina.m hoti, tena ca vivitto hoti; sammaadi.t.thiko ca hoti, micchaadi.t.thi cassa pahiinaa hoti, taaya ca vivitto hoti; khii.naasavo ca hoti, aasavaa cassa pahiinaa honti, tehi ca vivitto hoti ^a^V1.0275^ea^. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, dussiilya~ncassa pahiina.m hoti, tena ca vivitto hoti; sammaadi.t.thiko ca hoti, micchaadi.t.thi cassa pahiinaa hoti, taaya ca vivitto hoti; khii.naasavo ca hoti, aasavaa cassa pahiinaa honti, tehi ca vivitto hoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu aggappatto saarappatto suddho saare pati.t.thito'''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kassakassa gahapatissa sampanna.m saalikkhetta.m. tamena.m kassako gahapati siigha.m siigha.m {siighasiigha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} lavaapeyya. siigha.m siigha.m lavaapetvaa siigha.m siigha.m sa"ngharaapeyya. siigha.m siigha.m sa"ngharaapetvaa siigha.m siigha.m ^a^M1.0244^ea^ ubbahaapeyya ^a^P1.0242^ea^ {ubbaahaapeyya (syaa0 ka.m0)}. siigha.m siigha.m ubbahaapetvaa siigha.m siigha.m pu~nja.m kaaraapeyya. siigha.m siigha.m pu~nja.m kaaraapetvaa siigha.m siigha.m maddaapeyya. siigha.m siigha.m maddaapetvaa siigha.m siigha.m palaalaani uddharaapeyya. siigha.m siigha.m palaalaani uddharaapetvaa siigha.m siigha.m bhusika.m uddharaapeyya. siigha.m siigha.m bhusika.m uddharaapetvaa siigha.m siigha.m opunaapeyya. siigha.m siigha.m opunaapetvaa siigha.m siigha.m atiharaapeyya. siigha.m siigha.m atiharaapetvaa siigha.m ^a^T1.0312^ea^ siigha.m ko.t.taapeyya. siigha.m siigha.m ko.t.taapetvaa siigha.m siigha.m thusaani uddharaapeyya. evamassu {evassu (ka0)} taani, bhikkhave, kassakassa gahapatissa dha~n~naani aggappattaani saarappattaani suddhaani saare pati.t.thitaani.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yato bhikkhu siilavaa ca hoti, dussiilya~ncassa pahiina.m hoti, tena ca vivitto hoti; sammaadi.t.thiko ca hoti, micchaadi.t.thi cassa pahiinaa hoti, taaya ca vivitto hoti; khii.naasavo ca hoti, aasavaa cassa pahiinaa honti, tehi ca vivitto hoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu aggappatto saarappatto suddho saare pati.t.thito'''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalaahake deve aadicco nabha.m abbhussakkamaano {abbhussukkamaano (sii0 pii0)} sabba.m aakaasagata.m tamagata.m abhivihacca bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yato ariyasaavakassa viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m uppajjati {udapaadi (sabbattha)}, saha ^a^V1.0276^ea^ dassanuppaadaa, bhikkhave, ariyasaavakassa tii.ni sa.myojanaani pahiiyanti -- sakkaayadi.t.thi, vicikicchaa, siilabbataparaamaaso.

[03] ``athaapara.m dviihi dhammehi niyyaati abhijjhaaya ca byaapaadena ca. so vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. tasmi.m ce, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasaavako kaala.m kareyya, natthi ta.m {tassa (ka0)} sa.myojana.m yena ^a^M1.0245^ea^ sa.myojanena sa.myutto ariyasaavako puna ima.m {punayima.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} loka.m aagaccheyyaa''ti. tatiya.m.
[03] 96^b^.^eb^ ``tisso ^a^T1.0313^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, parisaa. katamaa tisso? aggavatii parisaa, vaggaa parisaa, samaggaa parisaa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^P1.0243^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, aggavatii parisaa? idha, bhikkhave, yassa.m parisaaya.m theraa bhikkhuu na baahulikaa honti na saathalikaa, okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa, viiriya.m aarabhanti appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya, tesa.m pacchimaa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati. saapi hoti na baahulikaa na saathalikaa okkamane nikkhittadhuraa paviveke pubba"ngamaa, viiriya.m aarabhati appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, aggavatii parisaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, vaggaa parisaa? idha, bhikkhave, yassa.m parisaaya.m bhikkhuu bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharanti, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, vaggaa parisaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, samaggaa parisaa? idha, bhikkhave, yassa.m parisaaya.m bhikkhuu samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharanti, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, samaggaa parisaa.

[03] ``yasmi.m ^a^V1.0277^ea^, bhikkhave, samaye bhikkhuu samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharanti, bahu.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu tasmi.m samaye pu~n~na.m pasavanti. brahma.m, bhikkhave, vihaara.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuu viharanti, yadida.m muditaaya cetovimuttiyaa. pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vediyati, sukhino citta.m ^a^T1.0314^ea^ samaadhiyati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, uparipabbate thullaphusitake deve vassante ta.m udaka.m yathaaninna.m pavattamaana.m pabbatakandarapadarasaakhaa paripuureti, pabbatakandarapadarasaakhaa paripuuraa kusobbhe {kussumbhe (sii0 pii0), kusumbhe (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} paripuurenti, kusobbhaa paripuuraa mahaasobbhe ^a^M1.0246^ea^ paripuurenti, mahaasobbhaa paripuuraa kunnadiyo paripuurenti, kunnadiyo paripuuraa mahaanadiyo paripuurenti, mahaanadiyo paripuuraa samudda.m {samuddasaagare (ka0)} paripuurenti.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yasmi.m samaye bhikkhuu samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi ^a^P1.0244^ea^ sampassantaa viharanti, bahu.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu tasmi.m samaye pu~n~na.m pasavanti. brahma.m, bhikkhave, vihaara.m tasmi.m samaye bhikkhuu viharanti, yadida.m muditaaya cetovimuttiyaa. pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vediyati, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso parisaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 97^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro {bhaddo (ka0)} assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkhya.m {sa"nkha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} gacchati. katamehi tiihi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo va.n.nasampanno ca hoti balasampanno ca javasampanno ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkhya.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m ^a^V1.0278^ea^ lokassa. katamehi tiihi ^a^T1.0315^ea^? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu va.n.nasampanno ca hoti balasampanno ca javasampanno ca.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu va.n.nasampanno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu va.n.nasampanno hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu balasampanno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya kusalaana.m dhammaana.m ^a^M1.0247^ea^ upasampadaaya thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu balasampanno hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu javasampanno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `aya.m ^a^P1.0245^ea^ dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu javasampanno hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkhaya.m gacchati. katamehi tiihi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo va.n.nasampanno ca hoti balasampanno ca javasampanno ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho ^a^T1.0316^ea^ hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkhya.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi tiihi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu va.n.nasampanno ca hoti balasampanno ca javasampanno ca.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^V1.0279^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu va.n.nasampanno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu va.n.nasampanno hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu balasampanno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu balasampanno hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu javasampanno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti tattha parinibbaayii ^a^M1.0248^ea^ anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu javasampanno hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkhaya.m gacchati. katamehi tiihi? idha ^a^P1.0246^ea^, bhikkhave, ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo va.n.nasampanno ca hoti balasampanno ca javasampanno ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho ^a^T1.0317^ea^ hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkhya.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi tiihi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu va.n.nasampanno ca hoti balasampanno ca javasampanno ca.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu va.n.nasampanno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti ^a^V1.0280^ea^, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu va.n.nasampanno hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu balasampanno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu balasampanno hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu javasampanno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu javasampanno hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ ``navopi ^a^M1.0249^ea^, bhikkhave, potthako dubba.n.no ca hoti dukkhasamphasso ca appaggho ca; majjhimopi, bhikkhave, potthako dubba.n.no ca hoti dukkhasamphasso ca appaggho ca; ji.n.nopi, bhikkhave, potthako dubba.n.no ca hoti dukkhasamphasso ca appaggho ca. ji.n.nampi, bhikkhave, potthaka.m ukkhaliparimajjana.m vaa karonti sa"nkaarakuu.te ^a^T1.0318^ea^ vaa na.m {ta.m (sii0), .thaane (ka0)} cha.d.denti.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, navo cepi bhikkhu hoti dussiilo paapadhammo. idamassa dubba.n.nataaya vadaami. seyyathaapi ^a^P1.0247^ea^ so, bhikkhave, potthako dubba.n.no tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. ye kho panassa sevanti bhajanti payirupaasanti di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjanti, tesa.m ta.m hoti diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. idamassa dukkhasamphassataaya vadaami. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, potthako dukkhasamphasso tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. yesa.m kho pana so {yesa.m kho pana (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), yesa.m so (ka0) pu0 pa0 116 passitabba.m} pa.tigga.nhaati ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m, tesa.m ta.m na mahapphala.m hoti na mahaanisa.msa.m. idamassa appagghataaya vadaami ^a^V1.0281^ea^. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, potthako appaggho tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. majjhimo cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti...pe0... thero cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti dussiilo paapadhammo, idamassa dubba.n.nataaya vadaami. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, potthako dubba.n.no tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. ye kho panassa sevanti bhajanti payirupaasanti di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjanti, tesa.m ta.m hoti diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. idamassa dukkhasamphassataaya vadaami. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, potthako dukkhasamphasso tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. yesa.m kho pana so pa.tigga.nhaati ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m, tesa.m ta.m na mahapphala.m hoti na mahaanisa.msa.m. idamassa appagghataaya vadaami. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, potthako appaggho ^a^T1.0319^ea^ tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``evaruupo caaya.m, bhikkhave, thero bhikkhu sa"nghamajjhe bha.nati. tamena.m bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- `ki.m nu kho tuyha.m baalassa abyattassa bha.nitena, tvampi naama bha.nitabba.m ma~n~nasii'ti! so kupito anattamano tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m nicchaareti ^a^M1.0250^ea^ yathaaruupaaya vaacaaya sa"ngho ta.m ukkhipati, sa"nkaarakuu.teva na.m potthaka.m.

[03] ``navampi, bhikkhave, kaasika.m vattha.m va.n.navanta~nceva hoti sukhasamphassa~nca mahaggha~nca; majjhimampi, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0248^ea^, kaasika.m vattha.m va.n.navanta~nceva hoti sukhasamphassa~nca mahaggha~nca; ji.n.nampi, bhikkhave, kaasika.m vattha.m va.n.navanta~nceva hoti sukhasamphassa~nca mahaggha~nca. ji.n.nampi, bhikkhave, kaasika.m vattha.m ratanapalive.thana.m vaa karoti gandhakara.n.dake vaa na.m pakkhipanti.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, navo cepi bhikkhu hoti siilavaa kalyaa.nadhammo, idamassa suva.n.nataaya vadaami. seyyathaapi ta.m, bhikkhave, kaasika.m vattha.m va.n.navanta.m tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. ye kho panassa sevanti bhajanti payirupaasanti di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjanti, tesa.m ta.m hoti diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. idamassa sukhasamphassataaya vadaami. seyyathaapi ta.m, bhikkhave, kaasika.m vattha.m sukhasamphassa.m tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. yesa.m kho pana so pa.tigga.nhaati ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m ^a^V1.0282^ea^, tesa.m ta.m mahapphala.m hoti mahaanisa.msa.m. idamassa mahagghataaya vadaami. seyyathaapi ta.m, bhikkhave, kaasika.m vattha.m mahaggha.m tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. majjhimo ^a^T1.0320^ea^ cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti...pe0... thero cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hoti...pe0... puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``evaruupo caaya.m, bhikkhave, thero bhikkhu sa"nghamajjhe bha.nati ^a^P1.0249^ea^. tamena.m bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu -- `appasaddaa aayasmanto hotha, thero bhikkhu dhamma~nca vinaya~nca bha.natii'ti. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `kaasikavatthuupamaa bhavissaama, na potthakuupamaa'ti {kaasika.m vattha.m tathuupamaaha.m bhavissaami, na potthakuupamaahanti (ka0)}. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ ``yo {yo kho (syaa0 ka.m0), yo ca kho (ka0)}, bhikkhave, eva.m vadeyya -- `yathaa yathaaya.m puriso kamma.m karoti tathaa tathaa ta.m pa.tisa.mvediyatii'ti, eva.m santa.m, bhikkhave, brahmacariyavaaso na hoti, okaaso na pa~n~naayati sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaaya ^a^M1.0251^ea^. yo ca kho, bhikkhave, eva.m vadeyya -- `yathaa yathaa vedaniiya.m aya.m puriso kamma.m karoti tathaa tathaassa vipaaka.m pa.tisa.mvediyatii'ti, eva.m santa.m, bhikkhave, brahmacariyavaaso hoti, okaaso pa~n~naayati sammaa dukkhassa ^a^T1.0321^ea^ antakiriyaaya. idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa appamattakampi paapakamma.m {paapa.m kamma.m (sii0 pii0)} kata.m tamena.m niraya.m upaneti. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa taadisa.myeva appamattaka.m paapakamma.m kata.m di.t.thadhammavedaniiya.m hoti, naa'.nupi khaayati, ki.m bahudeva.

[03] ``katha.mruupassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa appamattakampi paapakamma.m kata.m tamena.m niraya.m upaneti? idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhaavitakaayo hoti abhaavitasiilo abhaavitacitto abhaavitapa~n~no paritto appaatumo appadukkhavihaarii. evaruupassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa appamattakampi paapakamma.m kata.m tamena.m niraya.m upaneti.

[03] ``katha.mruupassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa taadisa.myeva appamattaka.m paapakamma.m kata.m di.t.thadhammavedaniiya.m hoti, naa'.nupi khaayati, ki.m bahudeva? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo bhaavitakaayo ^a^V1.0283^ea^ hoti bhaavitasiilo bhaavitacitto bhaavitapa~n~no aparitto mahatto {mahattaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} appamaa.navihaarii. evaruupassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa taadisa.myeva appamattaka.m paapakamma.m kata.m di.t.thadhammavedaniiya.m hoti, naa.nupi khaayati, ki.m bahudeva.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^P1.0250^ea^, bhikkhave, puriso lo.nakapalla.m {lo.naphala.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} paritte udakamallake {udakakapallake (ka0)} pakkhipeyya. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu ta.m paritta.m udaka.m {udakamallake udaka.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} amunaa lo.nakapallena lo.na.m assa apeyya''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``adu~nhi, bhante, paritta.m udakakapallake udaka.m, ta.m amunaa lo.nakapallena lo.na.m assa apeyya''nti. ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso ^a^T1.0322^ea^ lo.nakapallaka.m ga"ngaaya nadiyaa pakkhipeyya. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu saa ga"ngaa nadii amunaa lo.nakapallena lo.na.m assa apeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``asu hi, bhante, ga"ngaaya nadiyaa mahaa udakakkhandho so amunaa lo.nakapallena lo.no na assa apeyyo''ti {lo.na.m nevassa apeyyanti (sii0), na lo.no assa apeyyoti (pii0)}.
