[03] ``katha.mruupassa ^a^V1.0286^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalassa taadisa.myeva appamattaka.m paapakamma.m kata.m di.t.thadhammavedaniiya.m hoti, naa.nupi khaayati, ki.m bahudeva? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo bhaavitakaayo hoti bhaavitasiilo bhaavitacitto bhaavitapa~n~no aparitto mahatto appamaa.navihaarii. evaruupassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa taadisa.myeva appamattaka.m paapakamma.m kata.m di.t.thadhammavedaniiya.m hoti, naa.nupi khaayati, ki.m bahudeva.

[03] ``yo, bhikkhave, eva.m vadeyya -- `yathaa yathaaya.m puriso kamma.m karoti tathaa tathaa ta.m pa.tisa.mvedetii'ti, eva.m santa.m, bhikkhave, brahmacariyavaaso na hoti, okaaso na pa~n~naayati sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaaya. yo ca kho, bhikkhave, eva.m vadeyya -- `yathaa yathaa vedaniiya.m aya.m puriso kamma.m karoti tathaa tathaa tassa vipaaka.m pa.tisa.mvedetii'ti, eva.m santa.m, bhikkhave, brahmacariyavaaso hoti, okaaso pa~n~naayati sammaa dukkhassa antakiriyaayaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ ``santi ^a^M1.0255^ea^, bhikkhave, jaataruupassa o.laarikaa upakkilesaa pa.msuvaalukaa ^a^T1.0325^ea^ {pa.msuvaalikaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sakkharaka.thalaa. tamena.m pa.msudhovako vaa pa.msudhovakantevaasii vaa do.niya.m aakiritvaa dhovati sandhovati niddhovati. tasmi.m pahiine tasmi.m byantiikate santi jaataruupassa majjhimasahagataa upakkilesaa sukhumasakkharaa thuulavaalukaa {thuulavaalikaa (sii0 pii0), thullavaalikaa (syaa0 ka.m0)}. tamena.m pa.msudhovako vaa pa.msudhovakantevaasii vaa dhovati sandhovati niddhovati. tasmi.m pahiine tasmi.m byantiikate santi jaataruupassa sukhumasahagataa upakkilesaa sukhumavaalukaa kaa.lajallikaa. tamena.m pa.msudhovako vaa pa.msudhovakantevaasii vaa dhovati sandhovati niddhovati. tasmi.m pahiine tasmi.m byantiikate athaapara.m suva.n.nasikataavasissanti {suva.n.najaataruupakaavasissanti (ka0)}. tamena.m suva.n.nakaaro vaa suva.n.nakaarantevaasii vaa jaataruupa.m muusaaya.m pakkhipitvaa dhamati sandhamati niddhamati ^a^P1.0254^ea^. ta.m hoti jaataruupa.m dhanta.m sandhanta.m {adhanta.m asandhanta.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} niddhanta.m aniddhantakasaava.m {aniddhanta.m anihita.m aninniitakasaava.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, na ceva mudu hoti na ca kammaniya.m, na ca pabhassara.m pabha"ngu ca, na ca sammaa upeti kammaaya. hoti so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m suva.n.nakaaro vaa suva.n.nakaarantevaasii vaa ta.m jaataruupa.m dhamati sandhamati niddhamati. ta.m hoti jaataruupa.m dhanta.m sandhanta.m niddhanta.m niddhantakasaava.m {nihita.m ninniitakasaava.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, mudu ca hoti kammaniya~nca pabhassara~nca, na ca pabha"ngu, sammaa ^a^V1.0287^ea^ upeti kammaaya. yassaa yassaa ca pilandhanavikatiyaa aaka"nkhati -- yadi pa.t.tikaaya {muddikaaya (a0 ni0 5.23}, yadi ku.n.dalaaya, yadi giiveyyake {giiveyyakena (ka0), giiveyyakaaya (?)}, yadi suva.n.namaalaaya -- ta~ncassa attha.m anubhoti.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, santi adhicittamanuyuttassa bhikkhuno o.laarikaa upakkilesaa kaayaduccarita.m vaciiduccarita.m manoduccarita.m, tamena.m sacetaso bhikkhu dabbajaatiko pajahati vinodeti ^a^T1.0326^ea^ byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti. tasmi.m pahiine tasmi.m byantiikate santi adhicittamanuyuttassa bhikkhuno majjhimasahagataa upakkilesaa kaamavitakko byaapaadavitakko vihi.msaavitakko, tamena.m sacetaso bhikkhu dabbajaatiko pajahati vinodeti byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti. tasmi.m ^a^M1.0256^ea^ pahiine tasmi.m byantiikate santi adhicittamanuyuttassa bhikkhuno sukhumasahagataa upakkilesaa ~naativitakko janapadavitakko anava~n~nattipa.tisa.myutto vitakko, tamena.m sacetaso bhikkhu dabbajaatiko pajahati vinodeti byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti. tasmi.m pahiine tasmi.m byantiikate athaapara.m dhammavitakkaavasissati {dhammavitakkovasissati (ka0)}. so hoti samaadhi na ceva santo na ca pa.niito nappa.tippassaddhaladdho na ekodibhaavaadhigato sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaaritagato {sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaaritavato (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaarivaavato (ka0), sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaariyaadhigato (?) a0 ni0 9.37; dii0 ni0 3.355} hoti. so, bhikkhave, samayo ya.m ta.m citta.m ajjhatta.myeva santi.t.thati sannisiidati ekodi hoti {ekodibhaava.m gacchati (sii0), ekodibhaavo hoti (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0), ekodihoti (pii0)} samaadhiyati. so hoti samaadhi santo pa.niito pa.tippassaddhiladdho ekodibhaavaadhigato na sasa"nkhaaraniggayhavaaritagato. yassa yassa ca abhi~n~naa sacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m abhininnaameti ^a^P1.0255^ea^ abhi~n~naa sacchikiriyaaya tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati satiaayatane.

[03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhaveyya.m -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa assa.m, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko assa.m; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaano gaccheyya.m, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m kareyya.m, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaane {abhijjamaano (sii0 pii0 ka0)} gaccheyya.m, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kameyya.m ^a^T1.0327^ea^, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimaseyya.m parimajjeyya.m; yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati satiaayatane.

[03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde ^a^V1.0288^ea^ su.neyya.m dibbe ca maanuse ca ye duure santike caa'ti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati satiaayatane.

[03] ``so ^a^M1.0257^ea^ sace aaka"nkhati -- `parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaaneyya.m -- saraaga.m vaa citta.m saraaga.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m viitaraaga.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m; sadosa.m vaa citta.m sadosa.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, viitadosa.m vaa citta.m viitadosa.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m; samoha.m vaa citta.m samoha.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, viitamoha.m vaa citta.m viitamoha.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m; sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m sa.mkhitta.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m vikkhitta.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m; mahaggata.m vaa citta.m mahaggata.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, amahaggata.m vaa citta.m amahaggata.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m; sauttara.m vaa citta.m sauttara.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, anuttara.m vaa citta.m anuttara.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m; samaahita.m vaa citta.m samaahita.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, asamaahita.m vaa citta.m asamaahita.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m; vimutta.m vaa citta.m vimutta.m cittanti pajaaneyya.m, avimutta.m vaa citta.m avimutta.m cittanti pajaaneyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati satiaayatane.

[03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati ^a^T1.0328^ea^ -- `anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussareyya.m, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo ^a^P1.0256^ea^ eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapannoti, iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussareyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati satiaayatane.

[03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passeyya.m cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaaneyya.m -- ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa ^a^V1.0289^ea^ manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa ^a^M1.0258^ea^, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa; ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa ^a^T1.0329^ea^ para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaati, iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passeyya.m cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaaneyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati satiaayatane.

[03] ``so sace aaka"nkhati -- `aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati satiaayatane''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ ``adhicittamanuyuttena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa tii.ni nimittaani kaalena kaala.m manasi kaatabbaani -- kaalena kaala.m samaadhinimitta.m manasi kaatabba.m, kaalena kaala.m paggahanimitta.m manasi kaatabba.m, kaalena kaala.m upekkhaanimitta.m manasi kaatabba.m. sace, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu ekanta.m samaadhinimitta.myeva manasi kareyya, .thaana.m ta.m citta.m kosajjaaya sa.mvatteyya. sace, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu ekanta.m paggahanimitta.myeva manasi kareyya, .thaana.m ta.m citta.m uddhaccaaya sa.mvatteyya. sace, bhikkhave ^a^P1.0257^ea^, adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu ekanta.m upekkhaanimitta.myeva manasi kareyya, .thaana.m ta.m citta.m na sammaa samaadhiyeyya aasavaana.m khayaaya. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu kaalena kaala.m samaadhinimitta.m manasi karoti, kaalena kaala.m paggahanimitta.m manasi karoti, kaalena kaala.m upekkhaanimitta.m manasi karoti, ta.m hoti citta.m mudu~nca kammaniya~nca pabhassara~nca, na ca ^a^T1.0330^ea^ pabha"ngu, sammaa samaadhiyati aasavaana.m khayaaya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, suva.n.nakaaro vaa suva.n.nakaarantevaasii vaa ukka.m bandheyya {bandhati... aalimpati (visuddhi0 1.181 ta.m.tiikaaya.m ca) ma0 ni0 a.t.tha0 1.76; ma0 ni0 3.360 ta.ma.t.thakathaa.tiikaasu ca passitabba.m}, ukka.m ^a^V1.0290^ea^ bandhitvaa ukkaamukha.m aalimpeyya, ukkaamukha.m aalimpetvaa sa.n.daasena ^a^M1.0259^ea^ jaataruupa.m gahetvaa ukkaamukhe pakkhipeyya {pakkhipati (visuddhi0 1.181)}, ukkaamukhe pakkhipitvaa kaalena kaala.m abhidhamati, kaalena kaala.m udakena paripphoseti, kaalena kaala.m ajjhupekkhati. sace, bhikkhave, suva.n.nakaaro vaa suva.n.nakaarantevaasii vaa ta.m jaataruupa.m ekanta.m abhidhameyya, .thaana.m ta.m jaataruupa.m .daheyya. sace, bhikkhave, suva.n.nakaaro vaa suva.n.nakaarantevaasii vaa ta.m jaataruupa.m ekanta.m udakena paripphoseyya, .thaana.m ta.m jaataruupa.m nibbaapeyya {nibbaayeyya (sii0)}. sace, bhikkhave, suva.n.nakaaro vaa suva.n.nakaarantevaasii vaa ta.m jaataruupa.m ekanta.m ajjhupekkheyya, .thaana.m ta.m jaataruupa.m na sammaa paripaaka.m gaccheyya. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, suva.n.nakaaro vaa suva.n.nakaarantevaasii vaa ta.m jaataruupa.m kaalena kaala.m abhidhamati, kaalena kaala.m udakena paripphoseti, kaalena kaala.m ajjhupekkhati, ta.m hoti jaataruupa.m mudu~nca kammaniya~nca pabhassara~nca, na ca pabha"ngu, sammaa upeti kammaaya. yassaa yassaa ca pilandhanavikatiyaa aaka"nkhati -- yadi pa.t.tikaaya, yadi ku.n.dalaaya, yadi giiveyyake, yadi suva.n.namaalaaya -- ta~ncassa attha.m anubhoti.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyuttena bhikkhunaa tii.ni nimittaani kaalena kaala.m manasi kaatabbaani -- kaalena kaala.m samaadhinimitta.m manasi kaatabba.m, kaalena kaala.m paggahanimitta.m manasi kaatabba.m, kaalena kaala.m upekkhaanimitta.m manasi kaatabba.m. sace, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyutto ^a^T1.0331^ea^ bhikkhu ekanta.m samaadhinimitta.myeva manasi kareyya ^a^P1.0258^ea^, .thaana.m ta.m citta.m kosajjaaya sa.mvatteyya. sace, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu ekanta.m paggahanimitta.myeva manasi kareyya, .thaana.m ta.m citta.m uddhaccaaya sa.mvatteyya. sace, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu ekanta.m upekkhaanimitta.myeva manasi kareyya, .thaana.m ta.m citta.m na sammaa samaadhiyeyya aasavaana.m khayaaya. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, adhicittamanuyutto bhikkhu kaalena kaala.m samaadhinimitta.m manasi karoti, kaalena kaala.m paggahanimitta.m manasi karoti, kaalena kaala.m upekkhaanimitta.m manasi karoti, ta.m hoti citta.m mudu~nca kammaniya~nca pabhassara~nca, na ca pabha"ngu, sammaa samaadhiyati aasavaana.m khayaaya. yassa yassa ca abhi~n~naasacchikara.niiyassa dhammassa citta.m abhininnaameti abhi~n~naasacchikiriyaaya, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati satiaayatane.

[03] ``so ^a^M1.0260^ea^ sace aaka"nkhati -- `anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhaveyya.m...pe0... (cha abhi~n~naa vitthaaretabbaa) ^a^V1.0291^ea^ aasavaana.m khayaa...pe0... sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyya'nti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbata.m paapu.naati sati satiaayatane''ti. ekaadasama.m.
[06] lo.nakapallavaggo {lo.naphalavaggo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pa~ncamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] accaayika.m paviveka.m, sarado parisaa tayo.
[22] aajaaniiyaa potthako ca, lo.na.m dhovati nimittaaniiti..
[06] dutiyo pa.n.naasako samatto.

[03] 104^b^.^eb^ ``pubbeva ^a^T1.0332^ea^ ^a^V1.0292^ea^ ^a^M1.0261^ea^ me, bhikkhave, sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi -- `ko nu kho loke assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na'nti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `ya.m kho loka.m {loke (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m, aya.m loke assaado. ya.m loko {loke (pii0 ka0)} anicco dukkho vipari.naamadhammo, aya.m loke aadiinavo. yo loke chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, ida.m loke nissara.na'nti {lokanissara.na.m (a.t.tha0) ``loke nissara.na''nti padena sa.msanditabba.m}. yaavakiiva~ncaaha.m, bhikkhave, eva.m lokassa assaada~nca assaadato ^a^P1.0259^ea^ aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m naabbha~n~naasi.m, neva taavaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti {abhisambuddho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} pacca~n~naasi.m. yato ca khvaaha.m {kho aha.m (sii0 pii0), khoha.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, bhikkhave, eva.m lokassa assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, athaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti pacca~n~naasi.m. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `akuppaa me vimutti {cetovimutti (sii0 pii0 ka0)}, ayamantimaa jaati, natthi daani punabbhavo'''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 105^b^.^eb^ ``lokassaaha.m ^a^T1.0333^ea^, bhikkhave, assaadapariyesana.m acari.m. yo loke assaado tadajjhagama.m. yaavatako loke assaado, pa~n~naaya me so sudi.t.tho. lokassaaha.m, bhikkhave, aadiinavapariyesana.m acari.m ^a^M1.0262^ea^. yo loke aadiinavo tadajjhagama.m. yaavatako loke aadiinavo, pa~n~naaya ^a^V1.0293^ea^ me so sudi.t.tho. lokassaaha.m, bhikkhave, nissara.napariyesana.m acari.m. ya.m loke nissara.na.m tadajjhagama.m. yaavataka.m loke nissara.na.m, pa~n~naaya me ta.m sudi.t.tha.m. yaavakiiva~ncaaha.m, bhikkhave, lokassa assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m naabbha~n~naasi.m, neva taavaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti pacca~n~naasi.m. yato ca khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, lokassa assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, athaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti pacca~n~naasi.m. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `akuppaa me vimutti, ayamantimaa jaati, natthi daani punabbhavo'''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ ``no ^a^P1.0260^ea^ ceda.m {no ceta.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0) sa.m0 ni0 3.28 passitabba.m}, bhikkhave, loke assaado abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa loke saarajjeyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi loke assaado, tasmaa sattaa loke saarajjanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, loke aadiinavo ^a^T1.0334^ea^ abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa loke nibbindeyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi loke aadiinavo, tasmaa sattaa loke nibbindanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, loke nissara.na.m abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa lokamhaa {loke (ka0)} nissareyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi loke nissara.na.m, tasmaa sattaa lokamhaa nissaranti. yaavakiiva~nca, bhikkhave, sattaa lokassa assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m naabbha~n~naasu.m {naabbha~n~na.msu (sa.m0 ni0 3.28}, neva taava, bhikkhave, sattaa sadevakaa lokaa samaarakaa sabrahmakaa sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya nissa.taa visa.myuttaa vippamuttaa {vippayuttaa (ka0)} vimariyaadiikatena {vimariyaadikatena (sii0 pii0 ka0)} cetasaa vihari.msu. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, sattaa lokassa ^a^M1.0263^ea^ assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasu.m, atha, bhikkhave, sattaa sadevakaa lokaa samaarakaa sabrahmakaa sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya nissa.taa visa.myuttaa vippamuttaa vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa viharantii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ ``ye ^a^V1.0294^ea^ keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa lokassa assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, na me te {na te (ka0)}, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu vaa sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu vaa braahma.nasammataa, na ca pana te aayasmanto saama~n~nattha.m vaa brahma~n~nattha.m vaa di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti. ye ca kho keci ^a^T1.0335^ea^, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa lokassa assaada~nca assaadato aadiinava~nca aadiinavato nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, te kho, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu vaa sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu vaa braahma.nasammataa, te ca panaayasmanto saama~n~nattha~nca brahma~n~nattha~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti {viharissanti (sii0 pii0)}. catuttha.m.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ ``ru.n.namida.m ^a^P1.0261^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yadida.m giita.m. ummattakamida.m, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yadida.m nacca.m. komaarakamida.m, bhikkhave, ariyassa vinaye yadida.m ativela.m dantavida.msakahasita.m {dantavida.msaka.m hasita.m (sii0 pii0)}. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, setughaato giite, setughaato nacce, ala.m vo dhammappamoditaana.m sata.m sita.m sitamattaayaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 109^b^.^eb^ ``ti.n.na.m, bhikkhave, pa.tisevanaaya natthi titti. katamesa.m ti.n.na.m? soppassa, bhikkhave, pa.tisevanaaya natthi titti. suraamerayapaanassa, bhikkhave, pa.tisevanaaya ^a^M1.0264^ea^ natthi titti. methunadhammasamaapattiyaa, bhikkhave, pa.tisevanaaya natthi titti. imesa.m, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m pa.tisevanaaya natthi tittii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V1.0295^ea^ kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``citte, gahapati, arakkhite kaayakammampi arakkhita.m hoti, vaciikammampi arakkhita.m hoti ^a^T1.0336^ea^, manokammampi arakkhita.m hoti. tassa arakkhitakaayakammantassa arakkhitavaciikammantassa arakkhitamanokammantassa kaayakammampi avassuta.m hoti, vaciikammampi avassuta.m hoti, manokammampi avassuta.m hoti. tassa avassutakaayakammantassa avassutavaciikammantassa avassutamanokammantassa kaayakammampi puutika.m hoti, vaciikammampi puutika.m hoti, manokammampi puutika.m hoti. tassa puutikaayakammantassa puutivaciikammantassa puutimanokammantassa na bhaddaka.m mara.na.m hoti, na bhaddikaa kaala"nkiriyaa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, gahapati, kuu.taagaare ducchanne kuu.tampi arakkhita.m hoti, gopaanasiyopi arakkhitaa honti, bhittipi arakkhitaa hoti; kuu.tampi avassuta.m hoti, gopaanasiyopi avassutaa honti, bhittipi avassutaa hoti; kuu.tampi puutika.m hoti, gopaanasiyopi puutikaa honti, bhittipi puutikaa hoti.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, gahapati, citte ^a^P1.0262^ea^ arakkhite kaayakammampi arakkhita.m hoti, vaciikammampi arakkhita.m hoti, manokammampi arakkhita.m hoti. tassa arakkhitakaayakammantassa arakkhitavaciikammantassa arakkhitamanokammantassa kaayakammampi avassuta.m hoti, vaciikammampi avassuta.m hoti, manokammampi avassuta.m hoti. tassa avassutakaayakammantassa avassutavaciikammantassa avassutamanokammantassa kaayakammampi puutika.m hoti, vaciikammampi puutika.m hoti, manokammampi puutika.m hoti. tassa puutikaayakammantassa puutivaciikammantassa puutimanokammantassa na bhaddaka.m mara.na.m hoti, na bhaddikaa kaala"nkiriyaa.

[03] ``citte ^a^M1.0265^ea^, gahapati, rakkhite kaayakammampi rakkhita.m hoti, vaciikammampi rakkhita.m hoti, manokammampi rakkhita.m hoti. tassa rakkhitakaayakammantassa rakkhitavaciikammantassa rakkhitamanokammantassa kaayakammampi anavassuta.m hoti, vaciikammampi anavassuta.m hoti, manokammampi anavassuta.m ^a^V1.0296^ea^ hoti. tassa anavassutakaayakammantassa anavassutavaciikammantassa anavassutamanokammantassa kaayakammampi apuutika.m hoti, vaciikammampi apuutika.m hoti, manokammampi apuutika.m hoti. tassa apuutikaayakammantassa apuutivaciikammantassa apuutimanokammantassa bhaddaka.m mara.na.m hoti, bhaddikaa kaala"nkiriyaa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, gahapati ^a^T1.0337^ea^, kuu.taagaare succhanne kuu.tampi rakkhita.m hoti, gopaanasiyopi rakkhitaa honti, bhittipi rakkhitaa hoti; kuu.tampi anavassuta.m hoti, gopaanasiyopi anavassutaa honti, bhittipi anavassutaa hoti; kuu.tampi apuutika.m hoti, gopaanasiyopi apuutikaa honti, bhittipi apuutikaa hoti.

[01] evameva.m kho, gahapati, citte rakkhite kaayakammampi rakkhita.m hoti, vaciikammampi rakkhita.m hoti, manokammampi rakkhita.m hoti. tassa rakkhitakaayakammantassa rakkhitavaciikammantassa rakkhitamanokammantassa kaayakammampi anavassuta.m hoti, vaciikammampi anavassuta.m hoti, manokammampi anavassuta.m hoti. tassa anavassutakaayakammantassa anavassutavaciikammantassa anavassutamanokammantassa kaayakammampi apuutika.m hoti, vaciikammampi apuutika.m hoti, manokammampi apuutika.m hoti. tassa apuutikaayakammantassa apuutivaciikammantassa apuutimanokammantassa bhaddaka.m mara.na.m hoti, bhaddikaa kaala"nkiriyaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``citte, gahapati, byaapanne kaayakammampi byaapanna.m hoti, vaciikammampi byaapanna.m hoti, manokammampi byaapanna.m hoti. tassa byaapannakaayakammantassa byaapannavaciikammantassa byaapannamanokammantassa na bhaddaka.m mara.na.m hoti, na bhaddikaa kaala"nkiriyaa. seyyathaapi, gahapati, kuu.taagaare ducchanne kuu.tampi byaapanna.m hoti, gopaanasiyopi byaapannaa honti, bhittipi byaapannaa ^a^M1.0266^ea^ hoti; evameva.m kho, gahapati, citte byaapanne kaayakammampi byaapanna.m hoti, vaciikammampi byaapanna.m hoti, manokammampi byaapanna.m hoti. tassa byaapannakaayakammantassa byaapannavaciikammantassa byaapannamanokammantassa na bhaddaka.m mara.na.m hoti, na bhaddikaa kaala"nkiriyaa.

[03] ``citte ^a^V1.0297^ea^, gahapati, abyaapanne kaayakammampi abyaapanna.m hoti, vaciikammampi abyaapanna.m hoti, manokammampi abyaapanna.m hoti. tassa abyaapannakaayakammantassa abyaapannavaciikammantassa abyaapannamanokammantassa bhaddaka.m mara.na.m hoti, bhaddikaa kaala"nkiriyaa. seyyathaapi, gahapati, kuu.taagaare succhanne kuu.tampi abyaapanna.m hoti, gopaanasiyopi ^a^P1.0263^ea^ abyaapannaa honti, bhittipi abyaapannaa hoti; evameva.m kho, gahapati, citte abyaapanne kaayakammampi abyaapanna.m hoti, vaciikammampi abyaapanna.m hoti, manokammampi abyaapanna.m hoti. tassa abyaapannakaayakammantassa...pe0... abyaapannamanokammantassa bhaddaka.m mara.na.m hoti, bhaddikaa ^a^T1.0338^ea^ kaala"nkiriyaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, nidaanaani kammaana.m samudayaaya. katamaani tii.ni? lobho nidaana.m kammaana.m samudayaaya, doso nidaana.m kammaana.m samudayaaya, moho nidaana.m kammaana.m samudayaaya. ya.m, bhikkhave, lobhapakata.m kamma.m lobhaja.m lobhanidaana.m lobhasamudaya.m, ta.m kamma.m akusala.m ta.m kamma.m saavajja.m ta.m kamma.m dukkhavipaaka.m, ta.m kamma.m kammasamudayaaya sa.mvattati, na ta.m kamma.m kammanirodhaaya sa.mvattati. ya.m, bhikkhave, dosapakata.m kamma.m dosaja.m dosanidaana.m dosasamudaya.m, ta.m kamma.m akusala.m ta.m kamma.m saavajja.m ta.m kamma.m dukkhavipaaka.m, ta.m kamma.m kammasamudayaaya sa.mvattati, na ta.m kamma.m kammanirodhaaya sa.mvattati. ya.m, bhikkhave, mohapakata.m kamma.m mohaja.m mohanidaana.m mohasamudaya.m, ta.m kamma.m akusala.m ta.m kamma.m saavajja.m ta.m kamma.m dukkhavipaaka.m, ta.m kamma.m kammasamudayaaya sa.mvattati, na ta.m kamma.m kammanirodhaaya sa.mvattati. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni nidaanaani kammaana.m samudayaaya.

[03] ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, nidaanaani kammaana.m samudayaaya. katamaani tii.ni? alobho nidaana.m kammaana.m samudayaaya, adoso nidaana.m kammaana.m samudayaaya, amoho nidaana.m kammaana.m samudayaaya. ya.m, bhikkhave, alobhapakata.m kamma.m alobhaja.m alobhanidaana.m alobhasamudaya.m, ta.m ^a^M1.0267^ea^ kamma.m kusala.m ta.m ^a^T1.0339^ea^ kamma.m anavajja.m ta.m kamma.m sukhavipaaka.m, ta.m kamma.m kammanirodhaaya sa.mvattati, na ta.m kamma.m kammasamudayaaya sa.mvattati. ya.m, bhikkhave, adosapakata.m kamma.m adosaja.m adosanidaana.m adosasamudaya.m, ta.m kamma.m kusala.m ta.m kamma.m anavajja.m ta.m kamma.m sukhavipaaka.m, ta.m ^a^V1.0298^ea^ kamma.m kammanirodhaaya sa.mvattati, na ta.m kamma.m kammasamudayaaya sa.mvattati. ya.m, bhikkhave, amohapakata.m kamma.m amohaja.m amohanidaana.m amohasamudaya.m, ta.m kamma.m kusala.m ta.m kamma.m anavajja.m ta.m kamma.m sukhavipaaka.m, ta.m kamma.m kammanirodhaaya sa.mvattati, na ta.m kamma.m kammasamudayaaya sa.mvattati. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni nidaanaani kammaana.m samudayaayaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani ^a^P1.0264^ea^, bhikkhave, nidaanaani kammaana.m samudayaaya. katamaani tii.ni? atiite, bhikkhave, chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando jaayati; anaagate, bhikkhave, chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando jaayati; paccuppanne, bhikkhave, chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando jaayati. katha~nca, bhikkhave, atiite chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando jaayati? atiite, bhikkhave, chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha cetasaa anuvitakketi anuvicaareti. tassa atiite chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha cetasaa anuvitakkayato anuvicaarayato chando jaayati. chandajaato tehi dhammehi sa.myutto hoti. etamaha.m, bhikkhave, sa.myojana.m vadaami yo cetaso saaraago. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, atiite chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando jaayati.

[01] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, anaagate chandaraaga.t.thaaniye ^a^T1.0340^ea^ dhamme aarabbha chando jaayati? anaagate, bhikkhave, chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha cetasaa anuvitakketi anuvicaareti. tassa anaagate chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha cetasaa anuvitakkayato anuvicaarayato chando jaayati. chandajaato tehi dhammehi sa.myutto hoti. etamaha.m, bhikkhave, sa.myojana.m vadaami yo cetaso saaraago. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, anaagate chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando jaayati.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando jaayati? paccuppanne, bhikkhave, chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha cetasaa anuvitakketi ^a^M1.0268^ea^ anuvicaareti. tassa paccuppanne chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha cetasaa anuvitakkayato anuvicaarayato chando jaayati. chandajaato tehi dhammehi sa.myutto hoti. etamaha.m, bhikkhave, sa.myojana.m vadaami yo cetaso ^a^V1.0299^ea^ saaraago. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando jaayati. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni nidaanaani kammaana.m samudayaaya.

[01] ``tii.nimaani ^a^P1.0265^ea^, bhikkhave, nidaanaani kammaana.m samudayaaya. katamaani tii.ni? atiite, bhikkhave, chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando na jaayati; anaagate bhikkhave, chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando na jaayati; paccuppanne, bhikkhave, chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando na jaayati. katha~nca, bhikkhave, atiite chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando na jaayati? atiitaana.m, bhikkhave, chandaraaga.t.thaaniyaana.m dhammaana.m aayati.m vipaaka.m pajaanaati. aayati.m vipaaka.m viditvaa tadabhinivatteti. tadabhinivattetvaa {tadabhinivajjeti, tadabhinivajjetvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} cetasaa abhinivijjhitvaa {abhiviraajetvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pa~n~naaya ativijjha {abhinivijjha (ka0)} passati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, atiite chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando na jaayati.

[01] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, anaagate chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando na jaayati? anaagataana.m, bhikkhave, chandaraaga.t.thaaniyaana.m dhammaana.m aayati.m vipaaka.m pajaanaati. aayati.m vipaaka.m viditvaa tadabhinivatteti. tadabhinivattetvaa cetasaa abhinivijjhitvaa pa~n~naaya ativijjha passati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, anaagate chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando na jaayati.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando na jaayati? paccuppannaana.m, bhikkhave, chandaraaga.t.thaaniyaana.m dhammaana.m aayati.m vipaaka.m pajaanaati, aayati.m vipaaka.m ^a^T1.0341^ea^ viditvaa tadabhinivatteti, tadabhinivattetvaa cetasaa abhinivijjhitvaa pa~n~naaya ativijjha passati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandaraaga.t.thaaniye dhamme aarabbha chando na jaayati. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni nidaanaani kammaana.m samudayaayaa''ti. dasama.m.
[06] sambodhavaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] pubbeva ^a^M1.0269^ea^ duve assaadaa, sama.no ru.n.napa~ncama.m.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ ``tayome ^a^V1.0300^ea^ ^a^T1.0342^ea^, bhikkhave, aapaayikaa nerayikaa idamappahaaya. katame tayo? yo ^a^P1.0266^ea^ ca abrahmacaarii brahmacaaripa.ti~n~no, yo ca suddha.m brahmacariya.m caranta.m amuulakena {abhuutena (ka0)} abrahmacariyena anuddha.mseti, yo caaya.m eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- `natthi kaamesu doso'ti, so taaya kaamesu paatabyata.m aapajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo aapaayikaa nerayikaa idamappahaayaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ ``ti.n.na.m, bhikkhave, paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m. katamesa.m ti.n.na.m? tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi.m, tathaagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desetaa puggalo dullabho lokasmi.m, kata~n~nuu katavedii puggalo dullabho lokasmi.m. imesa.m kho, bhikkhave, ti.n.na.m paatubhaavo dullabho lokasmi''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? suppameyyo, duppameyyo, appameyyo. katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo suppameyyo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo uddhato hoti unna.lo capalo mukharo viki.n.navaaco mu.t.thassati asampajaano asamaahito vibbhantacitto paakatindriyo. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo suppameyyo.

[01] ``katamo ^a^V1.0301^ea^ ^a^M1.0270^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, puggalo duppameyyo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo anuddhato hoti anunna.lo acapalo amukharo aviki.n.navaaco upa.t.thitassati sampajaano samaahito ekaggacitto sa.mvutindriyo. aya.m ^a^T1.0343^ea^ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo duppameyyo.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo appameyyo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araha.m hoti khii.naasavo. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo appameyyo. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ ``tayome ^a^P1.0267^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so tadassaadeti ta.m nikaameti tena ca vitti.m aapajjati, tatra .thito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihaarii aparihiino kaala.m kurumaano aakaasaana~ncaayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. aakaasaana~ncaayatanuupagaana.m, bhikkhave, devaana.m viisati kappasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m. tattha puthujjano yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa nirayampi gacchati tiracchaanayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati. bhagavato pana saavako tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa tasmi.myeva bhave parinibbaayati. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, viseso aya.m adhippayaaso ida.m naanaakara.na.m sutavato ariyasaavakassa assutavataa puthujjanena, yadida.m gatiyaa upapattiyaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so tadassaadeti ta.m ^a^T1.0344^ea^ nikaameti tena ca vitti.m aapajjati, tatra .thito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihaarii aparihiino kaala.m kurumaano vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanuupagaana.m, bhikkhave, devaana.m cattaariisa.m kappasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m. tattha ^a^M1.0271^ea^ puthujjano ^a^V1.0302^ea^ yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa nirayampi gacchati tiracchaanayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati. bhagavato pana saavako tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa tasmi.myeva bhave parinibbaayati. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, viseso aya.m adhippayaaso ida.m naanaakara.na.m ^a^P1.0268^ea^ sutavato ariyasaavakassa assutavataa puthujjanena, yadida.m gatiyaa upapattiyaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so tadassaadeti ta.m nikaameti tena ca vitti.m aapajjati, tatra .thito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihaarii aparihiino kaala.m kurumaano aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupagaana.m, bhikkhave, devaana.m sa.t.thi kappasahassaani aayuppamaa.na.m. tattha puthujjano yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa nirayampi gacchati tiracchaanayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati. bhagavato pana saavako tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa tasmi.myeva bhave parinibbaayati. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, viseso ^a^T1.0345^ea^, aya.m adhippayaaso ida.m naanaakara.na.m sutavato ariyasaavakassa assutavataa puthujjanena, yadida.m gatiyaa upapattiyaa. `ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi'''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, vipattiyo. katamaa tisso? siilavipatti, cittavipatti, di.t.thivipatti. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, siilavipatti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti, musaavaadii hoti, pisu.navaaco hoti, pharusavaaco hoti, samphappalaapii hoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, siilavipatti.
[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, cittavipatti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco abhijjhaalu hoti byaapannacitto. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, cittavipatti.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^V1.0303^ea^ ^a^M1.0272^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, di.t.thivipatti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchaadi.t.thiko hoti vipariitadassano -- `natthi dinna.m, natthi yi.t.tha.m, natthi huta.m, natthi sukatadukka.taana.m ^a^P1.0269^ea^, kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, natthi aya.m loko, natthi paro loko, natthi maataa, natthi pitaa, natthi sattaa opapaatikaa, natthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, di.t.thivipatti. siilavipattihetu vaa, bhikkhave, sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti; cittavipattihetu vaa, bhikkhave, sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti; di.t.thivipattihetu vaa, bhikkhave, sattaa ^a^T1.0346^ea^ kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti. imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso vipattiyoti.

[03] ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, sampadaa. katamaa tisso? siilasampadaa, cittasampadaa, di.t.thisampadaa. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, siilasampadaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, siilasampadaa.
[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, cittasampadaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco anabhijjhaalu hoti abyaapannacitto. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, cittasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, di.t.thisampadaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammaadi.t.thiko hoti avipariitadassano -- `atthi dinna.m, atthi yi.t.tha.m, atthi huta.m, atthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, atthi aya.m loko, atthi paro loko, atthi maataa, atthi pitaa, atthi sattaa opapaatikaa, atthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, di.t.thisampadaa. siilasampadaahetu ^a^P1.0270^ea^ vaa, bhikkhave, sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjanti; cittasampadaahetu vaa, bhikkhave, sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m ^a^V1.0304^ea^ loka.m upapajjanti ^a^M1.0273^ea^; di.t.thisampadaahetu vaa, bhikkhave, sattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m ^a^T1.0347^ea^ loka.m upapajjanti. imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso sampadaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, vipattiyo. katamaa tisso? siilavipatti, cittavipatti, di.t.thivipatti. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, siilavipatti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco paa.naatipaatii hoti...pe0... samphappalaapii hoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, siilavipatti.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, vipattiyo. katamaa tisso? kammantavipatti, aajiivavipatti, di.t.thivipatti. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, kammantavipatti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco paa.naatipaatii hoti...pe0... samphappalaapii hoti ^a^T1.0349^ea^. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, kammantavipatti.
[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, aajiivavipatti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchaaaajiivo hoti, micchaaaajiivena jiivika.m {jiivita.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} kappeti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, aajiivavipatti.

[03] 121^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, soceyyaani. katamaani tii.ni? kaayasoceyya.m, vaciisoceyya.m, manosoceyya.m. katama~nca, bhikkhave, kaayasoceyya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato ^a^T1.0350^ea^ hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, kaayasoceyya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, vaciisoceyya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti. ida.m vuccati bhikkhave, vaciisoceyya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, manosoceyya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco anabhijjhaalu hoti abyaapannacitto sammaadi.t.thiko. ida.m ^a^P1.0272^ea^ vuccati, bhikkhave, manosoceyya.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni soceyyaanii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, soceyyaani. katamaani tii.ni? kaayasoceyya.m, vaciisoceyya.m, manosoceyya.m. katama~nca, bhikkhave, kaayasoceyya.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paa.naatipaataa ^a^V1.0307^ea^ pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, abrahmacariyaa pa.tivirato hoti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, kaayasoceyya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, vaciisoceyya.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, vaciisoceyya.m.

[01] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, manosoceyya.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m kaamacchanda.m -- `atthi me ajjhatta.m kaamacchando'ti pajaanaati; asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m kaamacchanda.m -- `natthi me ajjhatta.m kaamacchando'ti pajaanaati; yathaa ca anuppannassa kaamacchandassa ^a^M1.0276^ea^ uppaado hoti, ta~nca pajaanaati; yathaa ca uppannassa kaamacchandassa pahaana.m hoti ^a^T1.0351^ea^, ta~nca pajaanaati; yathaa ca pahiinassa kaamacchandassa aayati.m anuppaado hoti, ta~nca pajaanaati; santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m byaapaada.m -- `atthi me ajjhatta.m byaapaado'ti pajaanaati; asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m byaapaada.m -- `natthi me ajjhatta.m byaapaado'ti pajaanaati; yathaa ca anuppannassa byaapaadassa uppaado hoti, ta~nca pajaanaati; yathaa ca uppannassa byaapaadassa pahaana.m hoti, ta~nca pajaanaati; yathaa ca pahiinassa byaapaadassa aayati.m anuppaado hoti, ta~nca pajaanaati; santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m thinamiddha.m -- `atthi me ajjhatta.m thinamiddha'nti pajaanaati; asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m thinamiddha.m -- `natthi me ajjhatta.m thinamiddha'nti pajaanaati; yathaa ca anuppannassa thinamiddhassa uppaado hoti, ta~nca pajaanaati; yathaa ca uppannassa thinamiddhassa pahaana.m hoti, ta~nca pajaanaati; yathaa ca pahiinassa thinamiddhassa aayati.m anuppaado hoti, ta~nca pajaanaati; santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m uddhaccakukkucca.m -- `atthi me ajjhatta.m uddhaccakukkucca'nti pajaanaati; asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m ^a^P1.0273^ea^ uddhaccakukkucca.m -- `natthi me ajjhatta.m uddhaccakukkucca'nti pajaanaati; yathaa ca anuppannassa uddhaccakukkuccassa uppaado hoti, ta~nca pajaanaati; yathaa ca uppannassa uddhaccakukkuccassa pahaana.m hoti, ta~nca pajaanaati; yathaa ca pahiinassa uddhaccakukkuccassa aayati.m anuppaado hoti, ta~nca pajaanaati; santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m vicikiccha.m -- `atthi me ajjhatta.m vicikicchaa'ti pajaanaati; asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m vicikiccha.m -- `natthi me ajjhatta.m ^a^T1.0352^ea^ vicikicchaa'ti pajaanaati; yathaa ca anuppannaaya vicikicchaaya uppaado hoti, ta~nca pajaanaati; yathaa ca uppannaaya vicikicchaaya pahaana.m hoti, ta~nca ^a^V1.0308^ea^ pajaanaati; yathaa ca pahiinaaya vicikicchaaya aayati.m anuppaado hoti, ta~nca pajaanaati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, manosoceyya.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni soceyyaaniiti.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V1.0309^ea^ ^a^P1.0274^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa kusinaaraaya.m viharati balihara.ne vanasa.n.de. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa upanissaaya viharati. tamena.m gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa upasa"nkamitvaa svaatanaaya bhattena nimanteti ^a^M1.0278^ea^. aaka"nkhamaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu adhivaaseti. so tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena tassa gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamati; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidati. tamena.m so gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappeti sampavaareti.

[01] ``tassa eva.m hoti -- `saadhu vata myaaya.m gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappeti sampavaaretii'ti. evampissa hoti -- `aho vata maaya.m gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa aayatimpi evaruupena pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappeyya ^a^T1.0354^ea^ sampavaareyyaa'ti! so ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m gathito {gadhito (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} mucchito ajjhosanno {ajjhaapanno (sii0 ka0) ajjhopanno (.tiikaa)} anaadiinavadassaavii anissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati. so tattha kaamavitakkampi vitakketi, byaapaadavitakkampi vitakketi, vihi.msaavitakkampi vitakketi. evaruupassaaha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dinna.m na mahapphalanti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? pamatto hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu viharati.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa upanissaaya viharati. tamena.m gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa upasa"nkamitvaa svaatanaaya bhattena nimanteti. aaka"nkhamaano, bhikkhave, bhikkhu adhivaaseti. so tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa ^a^V1.0310^ea^ pattaciivaramaadaaya yena tassa gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamati; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidati. tamena.m so gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappeti sampavaareti.

[01] ``tassa na eva.m hoti -- `saadhu vata myaaya.m gahapati vaa ^a^P1.0275^ea^ gahapatiputto vaa pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappeti sampavaaretii'ti. evampissa na hoti -- `aho vata maaya.m gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa aayatimpi evaruupena pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappeyya sampavaareyyaa'ti! so ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m agathito amucchito anajjhosanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati. so tattha nekkhammavitakkampi ^a^M1.0279^ea^ vitakketi, abyaapaadavitakkampi vitakketi, avihi.msaavitakkampi vitakketi. evaruupassaaha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dinna.m mahapphalanti ^a^T1.0355^ea^ vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? appamatto hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu viharatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ ``yassa.m, bhikkhave, disaaya.m bhikkhuu bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharanti, manasi kaatumpi me esaa, bhikkhave, disaa na phaasu hoti, pageva gantu.m! ni.t.thamettha gacchaami -- `addhaa te aayasmanto tayo dhamme pajahi.msu, tayo dhamme bahulamaka.msu {bahuliimaka.msu (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. katame tayo dhamme pajahi.msu? nekkhammavitakka.m, abyaapaadavitakka.m, avihi.msaavitakka.m -- ime tayo dhamme pajahi.msu. katame tayo dhamme bahulamaka.msu? kaamavitakka.m, byaapaadavitakka.m, vihi.msaavitakka.m -- ime tayo dhamme bahulamaka.msu'. yassa.m, bhikkhave, disaaya.m bhikkhuu bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharanti, manasi kaatumpi me esaa, bhikkhave, disaa na phaasu hoti, pageva gantu.m! ni.t.thamettha gacchaami -- `addhaa te aayasmanto ime tayo dhamme pajahi.msu, ime tayo dhamme bahulamaka.msu'''.

[03] ``yassa.m pana, bhikkhave, disaaya.m bhikkhuu samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharanti, gantumpi me esaa, bhikkhave, disaa phaasu hoti, pageva manasi kaatu.m! ni.t.thamettha gacchaami -- `addhaa te aayasmanto tayo dhamme ^a^V1.0311^ea^ pajahi.msu, tayo dhamme bahulamaka.msu. katame tayo dhamme pajahi.msu? kaamavitakka.m ^a^P1.0276^ea^, byaapaadavitakka.m, vihi.msaavitakka.m -- ime tayo dhamme pajahi.msu. katame tayo dhamme bahulamaka.msu? nekkhammavitakka.m, abyaapaadavitakka.m, avihi.msaavitakka.m -- ime tayo dhamme bahulamaka.msu'. yassa.m ^a^T1.0356^ea^, bhikkhave, disaaya.m bhikkhuu samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharanti, gantumpi me esaa, bhikkhave, disaa phaasu hoti, pageva manasi kaatu.m! ni.t.thamettha gacchaami -- `addhaa te aayasmanto ime tayo dhamme pajahi.msu, ime tayo dhamme bahulamaka.msuu'''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M1.0280^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati gotamake cetiye. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``abhi~n~naayaaha.m, bhikkhave, dhamma.m desemi, no anabhi~n~naaya. sanidaanaaha.m, bhikkhave, dhamma.m desemi, no anidaana.m. sappaa.tihaariyaaha.m, bhikkhave, dhamma.m desemi, no appaa.tihaariya.m. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya dhamma.m desayato no anabhi~n~naaya, sanidaana.m dhamma.m desayato no anidaana.m, sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desayato no appaa.tihaariya.m, kara.niiyo ovaado, kara.niiyaa anusaasanii. ala~nca pana vo, bhikkhave, tu.t.thiyaa, ala.m attamanataaya, ala.m somanassaaya -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato dhammo, suppa.tipanno sa"ngho'''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti. imasmi~nca pana veyyaakara.nasmi.m bha~n~namaane sahassii lokadhaatu akampitthaati. tatiya.m.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m caramaano yena kapilavatthu tadavasari. assosi kho mahaanaamo sakko -- ``bhagavaa kira kapilavatthu.m ^a^T1.0357^ea^ anuppatto''ti. atha kho mahaanaamo ^a^V1.0312^ea^ sakko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thita.m kho mahaanaama.m sakka.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``gaccha, mahaanaama, kapilavatthusmi.m, tathaaruupa.m aavasatha.m jaana yatthajja maya.m ekaratti.m vihareyyaamaa''ti. ``eva.m ^a^P1.0277^ea^, bhante''ti kho mahaanaamo sakko bhagavato pa.tissutvaa kapilavatthu.m pavisitvaa kevalakappa.m kapilavatthu.m anvaahi.n.danto {aahi.n.danto (syaa0 ka.m0)} naaddasa kapilavatthusmi.m tathaaruupa.m aavasatha.m yatthajja bhagavaa ekaratti.m vihareyya.

[03] atha kho mahaanaamo sakko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``natthi, bhante, kapilavatthusmi.m tathaaruupo aavasatho ^a^M1.0281^ea^ yatthajja bhagavaa ekaratti.m vihareyya. aya.m, bhante, bhara.n.du kaalaamo bhagavato puraa.nasabrahmacaarii. tassajja bhagavaa assame ekaratti.m viharatuu''ti. ``gaccha, mahaanaama, santhara.m pa~n~napehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho mahaanaamo sakko bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yena bhara.n.dussa kaalaamassa assamo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa santhara.m pa~n~naapetvaa udaka.m .thapetvaa paadaana.m dhovanaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``santhato, bhante, santhaaro, udaka.m .thapita.m paadaana.m dhovanaaya. yassadaani, bhante, bhagavaa kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa yena bhara.n.dussa kaalaamassa assamo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa paade pakkhaalesi. atha kho mahaanaamassa sakkassa etadahosi -- ``akaalo kho ajja bhagavanta.m payirupaasitu.m. kilanto ^a^T1.0358^ea^ bhagavaa. sve daanaaha.m bhagavanta.m payirupaasissaamii''ti bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho mahaanaamo sakko tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho mahaanaama.m sakka.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``tayo khome, mahaanaama, satthaaro santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? idha, mahaanaama, ekacco satthaa kaamaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~naapeti; na ruupaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~naapeti, na vedanaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~naapeti. idha pana, mahaanaama, ekacco satthaa kaamaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~naapeti ^a^V1.0313^ea^, ruupaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~naapeti; na vedanaana.m ^a^P1.0278^ea^ pari~n~na.m pa~n~naapeti. idha pana, mahaanaama, ekacco satthaa kaamaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~naapeti, ruupaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~naapeti, vedanaana.m pari~n~na.m pa~n~naapeti. ime kho, mahaanaama, tayo satthaaro santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. `imesa.m, mahaanaama, ti.n.na.m satthaaraana.m ekaa ni.t.thaa udaahu puthu ni.t.thaa'''ti?

[03] eva.m vutte bhara.n.du kaalaamo mahaanaama.m sakka.m etadavoca -- ``ekaati, mahaanaama, vadehii''ti. eva.m vutte bhagavaa mahaanaama.m sakka.m etadavoca -- ``naanaati, mahaanaama, vadehii''ti. dutiyampi kho bhara.n.du kaalaamo mahaanaama.m sakka.m etadavoca -- ``ekaati, mahaanaama, vadehii''ti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa mahaanaama.m sakka.m etadavoca -- ``naanaati, mahaanaama, vadehii''ti. tatiyampi kho bhara.n.du kaalaamo mahaanaama.m sakka.m etadavoca -- ``ekaati, mahaanaama ^a^M1.0282^ea^, vadehii''ti. tatiyampi kho bhagavaa mahaanaama.m sakka.m ^a^T1.0359^ea^ etadavoca -- ``naanaati, mahaanaama, vadehii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhara.n.du kaalaamassa etadahosi -- ``mahesakkhassa vatamhi mahaanaamassa sakkassa sammukhaa sama.nena gotamena yaavatatiya.m apasaadito. ya.mnuunaaha.m kapilavatthumhaa pakkameyya''nti. atha kho bhara.n.du kaalaamo kapilavatthumhaa pakkaami. ya.m kapilavatthumhaa pakkaami tathaa pakkantova ahosi na puna paccaagacchiiti. catuttha.m.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho hatthako devaputto abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa -- ``bhagavato purato .thassaamii''ti osiidatimeva sa.msiidatimeva {osiidati ceva sa.msiidati ca (sii0 pii0), osiidati sa.msiidati (syaa0 ka.m0)}, na sakkoti sa.n.thaatu.m. seyyathaapi naama sappi vaa tela.m vaa vaalukaaya aasitta.m osiidatimeva sa.msiidatimeva, na sa.n.thaati; evameva.m hatthako devaputto -- ``bhagavato purato .thassaamii''ti osiidatimeva sa.msiidatimeva, na sakkoti sa.n.thaatu.m.

[03] atha ^a^P1.0279^ea^ kho bhagavaa hatthaka.m devaputta.m etadavoca -- ``o.laarika.m, hatthaka, attabhaava.m abhinimminaahii''ti ^a^V1.0314^ea^. ``eva.m, bhante''ti, kho hatthako devaputto bhagavato pa.tissutvaa o.laarika.m attabhaava.m abhinimminitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thita.m kho hatthaka.m devaputta.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``ye te, hatthaka, dhammaa pubbe manussabhuutassa pavattino ahesu.m, api nu te te dhammaa etarahi pavattino''ti? ``ye ca me, bhante, dhammaa pubbe manussabhuutassa pavattino ahesu.m, te ca me dhammaa etarahi pavattino; ye ca me, bhante, dhammaa pubbe manussabhuutassa ^a^T1.0360^ea^ nappavattino ahesu.m, te ca me dhammaa etarahi pavattino. seyyathaapi, bhante, bhagavaa etarahi aaki.n.no viharati bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniihi upaasakehi upaasikaahi raajuuhi ^a^M1.0283^ea^ raajamahaamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasaavakehi; evameva.m kho aha.m, bhante, aaki.n.no viharaami devaputtehi. duuratopi, bhante, devaputtaa aagacchanti hatthakassa devaputtassa santike `dhamma.m sossaamaa'ti. ti.n.naaha.m, bhante, dhammaana.m atitto appa.tivaano kaala"nkato. katamesa.m ti.n.na.m? bhagavato aha.m, bhante, dassanassa atitto appa.tivaano kaala"nkato; saddhammasavanassaaha.m, bhante, atitto appa.tivaano kaala"nkato; sa"nghassaaha.m, bhante, upa.t.thaanassa atitto appa.tivaano kaala"nkato. imesa.m kho aha.m, bhante, ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m atitto appa.tivaano kaala"nkato''ti.
[21] ``naaha.m bhagavato dassanassa, tittimajjhagaa {titti tittisambhava.m (ka0)} kudaacana.m.
[22] sa"nghassa upa.t.thaanassa, saddhammasavanassa ca..
[21] ``adhisiila.m sikkhamaano, saddhammasavane rato.
[22] ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m atitto, hatthako aviha.m gato''ti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m viharati isipatane migadaaye. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya baaraa.nasi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. addasaa ^a^P1.0280^ea^ kho bhagavaa goyogapilakkhasmi.m {goyogamilakkhasmi.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} pi.n.daaya caramaano {caramaana.m (ka0)} a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m rittassaada.m baahirassaada.m mu.t.thassati.m ^a^V1.0315^ea^ asampajaana.m asamaahita.m vibbhantacitta.m paakatindriya.m. disvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca ^a^T1.0361^ea^ --

[03] ``maa kho tva.m, bhikkhu, attaana.m ka.tuviyamakaasi. ta.m vata bhikkhu ka.tuviyakata.m attaana.m aamagandhena {aamagandhe (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} avassuta.m makkhikaa naanupatissanti naanvaassavissantiiti {naanubandhissanti (ka0)}, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii''ti. atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavataa iminaa ovaadena ovadito sa.mvegamaapaadi. atha kho bhagavaa baaraa.nasiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] ``idhaaha.m, bhikkhave, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya baaraa.nasi.m ^a^M1.0284^ea^ pi.n.daaya paavisi.m. addasa.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, goyogapilakkhasmi.m pi.n.daaya caramaano a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m rittassaada.m baahirassaada.m mu.t.thassati.m asampajaana.m asamaahita.m vibbhantacitta.m paakatindriya.m. disvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca.m --

[03] ```maa kho tva.m, bhikkhu, attaana.m ka.tuviyamakaasi. ta.m vata bhikkhu ka.tuviyakata.m attaana.m aamagandhena avassuta.m makkhikaa naanupatissanti naanvaassavissantiiti, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, so bhikkhu mayaa iminaa ovaadena ovadito sa.mvegamaapaadii''ti. eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho, bhante, ka.tuviya.m? ko aamagandho? kaa makkhikaa''ti?

[03] ``abhijjhaa kho, bhikkhu, ka.tuviya.m; byaapaado aamagandho; paapakaa akusalaa vitakkaa makkhikaa. ta.m vata, bhikkhu, ka.tuviyakata.m attaana.m aamagandhena avassuta.m makkhikaa naanupatissanti naanvaassavissantiiti, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii''ti.
[21] ``agutta.m ^a^P1.0281^ea^ cakkhusotasmi.m, indriyesu asa.mvuta.m.
[22] makkhikaanupatissanti ^a^T1.0362^ea^, sa"nkappaa raaganissitaa..
[21] ``ka.tuviyakato ^a^V1.0316^ea^ bhikkhu, aamagandhe avassuto.
[22] aarakaa hoti nibbaanaa, vighaatasseva bhaagavaa..
[21] ``gaame vaa yadi vaara~n~ne, aladdhaa samathamattano {samamattano (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), sammamattano (pii0)}.
[22] pareti {careti (syaa0 ka0)} baalo dummedho, makkhikaahi purakkhato..
[21] ``ye ca siilena sampannaa, pa~n~naayuupasamerataa.
[22] upasantaa sukha.m senti, naasayitvaana makkhikaa''ti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa anuruddho yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa anuruddho bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idhaaha.m, bhante, dibbena cakkhunaa ^a^M1.0285^ea^ visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena yebhuyyena passaami maatugaama.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjamaana.m. katihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannaagato maatugaamo kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjatii''ti?

[03] ``tiihi kho, anuruddha, dhammehi samannaagato maatugaamo kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. katamehi tiihi? idha, anuruddha, maatugaamo pubba.nhasamaya.m maccheramalapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa agaara.m ajjhaavasati, majjhanhikasamaya.m issaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa agaara.m ajjhaavasati, saayanhasamaya.m kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa agaara.m ajjhaavasati ^a^T1.0363^ea^. imehi kho, anuruddha, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato maatugaamo kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa anuruddho yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa ^a^V1.0317^ea^ saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ^a^P1.0282^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa anuruddho aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``idhaaha.m, aavuso saariputta, dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena sahassa.m loka.m olokemi. aaraddha.m kho pana me viiriya.m asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa {apammu.t.thaa (sii0), apamu.t.thaa (syaa0 ka.m0)}, passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m ekagga.m. atha ca pana me naanupaadaaya {na anupaadaaya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} aasavehi citta.m vimuccatii''ti.

[03] ``ya.m kho te, aavuso anuruddha, eva.m hoti -- `aha.m dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena sahassa.m loka.m volokemii'ti, ida.m te maanasmi.m. yampi te, aavuso anuruddha, eva.m hoti -- `aaraddha.m kho pana me viiriya.m asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa, passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m ekagga'nti, ida.m te uddhaccasmi.m. yampi te, aavuso anuruddha, eva.m hoti -- `atha ca pana me naanupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimuccatii'ti, ida.m ^a^M1.0286^ea^ te kukkuccasmi.m. saadhu vataayasmaa anuruddho ime tayo dhamme pahaaya, ime tayo dhamme amanasikaritvaa amataaya dhaatuyaa citta.m upasa.mharatuu''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa anuruddho aparena ^a^T1.0364^ea^ samayena ime tayo dhamme pahaaya, ime tayo dhamme amanasikaritvaa amataaya dhaatuyaa citta.m upasa.mhari {upasa.mhaasi (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), upasa.mharati (ka0)}. atha kho aayasmaa anuruddho eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa anuruddho arahata.m ahosiiti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani, bhikkhave, pa.ticchannaani aavahanti {vahanti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, no viva.taani. katamaani tii.ni? maatugaamo, bhikkhave, pa.ticchanno aavahati, no viva.to; braahma.naana.m, bhikkhave, mantaa pa.ticchannaa aavahanti, no viva.taa ^a^P1.0283^ea^; micchaadi.t.thi, bhikkhave, pa.ticchannaa aavahati, no viva.taa. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni pa.ticchannaani aavahanti, no viva.taani.

[03] ``tii.nimaani ^a^V1.0318^ea^, bhikkhave, viva.taani virocanti, no pa.ticchannaani. katamaani tii.ni? candama.n.dala.m, bhikkhave, viva.ta.m virocati, no pa.ticchanna.m; suuriyama.n.dala.m, bhikkhave, viva.ta.m virocati, no pa.ticchanna.m; tathaagatappavedito dhammavinayo, bhikkhave, viva.to virocati, no pa.ticchanno. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni viva.taani virocanti, no pa.ticchannaanii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ ``tayome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? paasaa.nalekhuupamo puggalo, pathavilekhuupamo puggalo, udakalekhuupamo ^a^T1.0365^ea^ puggalo. katamo ca, bhikkhave, paasaa.nalekhuupamo puggalo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhi.nha.m kujjhati. so ca khvassa kodho ^a^M1.0287^ea^ diigharatta.m anuseti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, paasaa.ne lekhaa na khippa.m lujjati vaatena vaa udakena vaa, cira.t.thitikaa hoti; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo abhi.nha.m kujjhati. so ca khvassa kodho diigharatta.m anuseti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, paasaa.nalekhuupamo puggalo.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, pathavilekhuupamo puggalo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhi.nha.m kujjhati. so ca khvassa kodho na diigharatta.m anuseti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, pathaviyaa lekhaa khippa.m lujjati vaatena vaa udakena vaa, na cira.t.thitikaa hoti; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo abhi.nha.m kujjhati. so ca khvassa kodho na diigharatta.m anuseti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, pathavilekhuupamo puggalo.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, udakalekhuupamo puggalo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo aagaa.lhenapi vuccamaano pharusenapi ^a^P1.0284^ea^ vuccamaano amanaapenapi vuccamaano sandhiyatimeva {... yeva (syaa0 ka.m0) ... ceva (pii0)} sa.msandatimeva {... yeva (syaa0 ka.m0) ... ceva (pii0)} sammodatimeva {... yeva (syaa0 ka.m0) ... ceva (pii0)}. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, udake lekhaa khippa.myeva pa.tivigacchati, na cira.t.thitikaa hoti; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo aagaa.lhenapi vuccamaano pharusenapi vuccamaano amanaapenapi vuccamaano sandhiyatimeva sa.msandatimeva sammodatimeva. aya.m ^a^V1.0319^ea^ vuccati, bhikkhave, udakalekhuupamo puggalo. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti {pu0 pa0 115}. dasama.m.
[06] kusinaaravaggo terasamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] kusinaarabha.n.danaa ^a^T1.0366^ea^ ceva, gotamabhara.n.duhatthako.
[22] ka.tuviya.m dve anuruddhaa, pa.ticchanna.m lekhena te dasaati..

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi ^a^V1.0320^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato yodhaajiivo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkhya.m gacchati. katamehi tiihi ^a^M1.0288^ea^? idha, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivo duure paatii ca hoti akkha.navedhii ca mahato ca kaayassa padaaletaa. imehi, kho, bhikkhave, tiihi a"ngehi samannaagato yodhaajiivo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkhya.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tiihi a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi tiihi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu duure paatii ca hoti akkha.navedhii ca mahato ca kaayassa padaaletaa.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu duure paatii hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m ruupa.m -- `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. yaa kaaci vedanaa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhattaa vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa hiinaa vaa pa.niitaa vaa yaa duure santike vaa, sabba.m vedana.m ^a^T1.0367^ea^ {sabbaa vedanaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} -- `neta.m mama, nesohamasmsmmi ^a^P1.0285^ea^, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. yaa kaaci sa~n~naa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhattaa vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa hiinaa vaa pa.niitaa vaa yaa duure santike vaa, sabba.m sa~n~na.m {sabbaa sa~n~naa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} -- `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. ye keci sa"nkhaaraa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhattaa vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa hiinaa vaa pa.niitaa vaa ye duure santike vaa, sabbe sa"nkhaare -- `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^V1.0321^ea^ -- `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu duure paatii hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkha.navedhii hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii ^a^M1.0289^ea^ pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkha.navedhii hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahato kaayassa padaaletaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahanta.m avijjaakkhandha.m padaaleti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahato kaayassa padaaletaa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ^a^T1.0368^ea^ aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, parisaa. katamaa tisso? ukkaacitaviniitaa parisaa, pa.tipucchaaviniitaa parisaa, yaavataaviniitaa {yaavatajjhaaviniitaa (a.t.thakathaaya.m paa.thantara.m)} parisaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso parisaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi ^a^P1.0286^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato mitto sevitabbo. katamehi tiihi? ( ) {(idha bhikkhave bhikkhu) (pii0 ka0)} duddada.m dadaati, dukkara.m karoti, dukkhama.m khamati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi a"ngehi samannaagato mitto sevitabbo''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ ``uppaadaa vaa, bhikkhave, tathaagataana.m anuppaadaa vaa tathaagataana.m, .thitaava saa dhaatu ^a^V1.0322^ea^ dhamma.t.thitataa dhammaniyaamataa. sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa. ta.m tathaagato abhisambujjhati abhisameti. abhisambujjhitvaa abhisametvaa aacikkhati deseti pa~n~naapeti pa.t.thapeti vivarati vibhajati uttaaniikaroti -- `sabbe sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa'ti. uppaadaa vaa, bhikkhave, tathaagataana.m anuppaadaa vaa tathaagataana.m .thitaava saa dhaatu dhamma.t.thitataa dhammaniyaamataa. sabbe sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaa. ta.m tathaagato abhisambujjhati abhisameti. abhisambujjhitvaa ^a^M1.0290^ea^ abhisametvaa aacikkhati deseti pa~n~naapeti pa.t.thapeti vivarati vibhajati uttaaniikaroti -- `sabbe sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaa'ti. uppaadaa vaa, bhikkhave, tathaagataana.m anuppaadaa vaa tathaagataana.m .thitaava saa dhaatu dhamma.t.thitataa dhammaniyaamataa. sabbe dhammaa anattaa. ta.m tathaagato abhisambujjhati abhisameti. abhisambujjhitvaa abhisametvaa aacikkhati deseti pa~n~naapeti pa.t.thapeti vivarati vibhajati uttaaniikaroti -- `sabbe ^a^T1.0369^ea^ dhammaa anattaa'''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici tantaavutaana.m vatthaana.m, kesakambalo tesa.m pa.tiki.t.tho akkhaayati. kesakambalo, bhikkhave, siite siito, u.nhe u.nho, dubba.n.no, duggandho, dukkhasamphasso. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yaani kaanici puthusama.nabraahma.navaadaana.m {sama.nappavaadaana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} makkhalivaado tesa.m pa.tiki.t.tho akkhaayati.

[03] ``makkhali, bhikkhave, moghapuriso eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- `natthi kamma.m, natthi kiriya.m, natthi viiriya'nti. yepi ^a^P1.0287^ea^ te, bhikkhave, ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, tepi bhagavanto kammavaadaa ceva ahesu.m kiriyavaadaa ca viiriyavaadaa ca. tepi, bhikkhave, makkhali moghapuriso pa.tibaahati -- `natthi kamma.m, natthi kiriya.m, natthi viiriya'nti. yepi te, bhikkhave, bhavissanti anaagatamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, tepi bhagavanto kammavaadaa ceva bhavissanti kiriyavaadaa ca viiriyavaadaa ca. tepi, bhikkhave, makkhali moghapuriso pa.tibaahati -- `natthi kamma.m, natthi kiriya.m, natthi viiriya'nti. ahampi, bhikkhave, etarahi araha.m sammaasambuddho kammavaado ceva kiriyavaado ca viiriyavaado ca. mampi, bhikkhave, makkhali moghapuriso pa.tibaahati -- `natthi kamma.m, natthi kiriya.m, natthi viiriya'''nti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V1.0323^ea^, bhikkhave, nadiimukhe khippa.m u.d.deyya {o.d.deyya (sii0)} bahuuna.m {bahunna.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} macchaana.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya anayaaya byasanaaya; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, makkhali moghapuriso manussakhippa.m ma~n~ne loke uppanno bahuuna.m sattaana.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya anayaaya ^a^T1.0370^ea^ byasanaayaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.
[03] 139^b^.^eb^ ``tisso ^a^M1.0291^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, sampadaa. katamaa tisso? saddhaasampadaa, siilasampadaa, pa~n~naasampadaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso sampadaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.
[03] 140^b^.^eb^ ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, vuddhiyo. katamaa tisso? saddhaavuddhi, siilavuddhi, pa~n~naavuddhi -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso vuddhiyo''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ ``tayo ca, bhikkhave, assakha.lu"nke desessaami tayo ca purisakha.lu"nke. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, tayo assakha.lu"nkaa? idha ^a^P1.0288^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco assakha.lu"nko javasampanno hoti; na va.n.nasampanno, na aarohapari.naahasampanno. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assakha.lu"nko javasampanno ca hoti va.n.nasampanno ca; na aarohapari.naahasampanno. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assakha.lu"nko javasampanno ca hoti va.n.nasampanno ca aarohapari.naahasampanno ca. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo assakha.lu"nkaa.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, tayo purisakha.lu"nkaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco purisakha.lu"nko javasampanno hoti; na va.n.nasampanno, na aarohapari.naahasampanno. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco purisakha.lu"nko ^a^T1.0371^ea^ ^a^V1.0324^ea^ javasampanno ca hoti va.n.nasampanno ca; na aarohapari.naahasampanno. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco purisakha.lu"nko javasampanno ca hoti va.n.nasampanno ca aarohapari.naahasampanno ca.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, purisakha.lu"nko javasampanno hoti; na va.n.nasampanno na aarohapari.naahasampanno? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. idamassa javasmi.m vadaami. abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pa~nha.m pu.t.tho sa.msaadeti ^a^M1.0292^ea^ {sa.mhiireti (ka0)}, no vissajjeti. idamassa na va.n.nasmi.m vadaami. na kho pana laabhii hoti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. idamassa na aarohapari.naahasmi.m vadaami. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, purisakha.lu"nko javasampanno hoti; na va.n.nasampanno, na aarohapari.naahasampanno.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, purisakha.lu"nko javasampanno ca hoti va.n.nasampanno ca; na aarohapari.naahasampanno? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. idamassa javasmi.m vadaami. abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pa~nha.m pu.t.tho vissajjeti, no sa.msaadeti. idamassa va.n.nasmi.m vadaami. na pana laabhii hoti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. idamassa na aarohapari.naahasmi.m vadaami. eva.m kho ^a^P1.0289^ea^, bhikkhave, purisakha.lu"nko javasampanno ca hoti va.n.nasampanno ca; na aarohapari.naahasampanno.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, purisakha.lu"nko javasampanno ca hoti va.n.nasampanno ca aarohapari.naahasampanno ca? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m ^a^T1.0372^ea^ dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. idamassa javasmi.m vadaami. abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pa~nha.m pu.t.tho vissajjeti, no sa.msaadeti. idamassa va.n.nasmi.m vadaami. laabhii kho pana hoti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. idamassa aarohapari.naahasmi.m ^a^V1.0325^ea^ vadaami. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, purisakha.lu"nko javasampanno ca hoti va.n.nasampanno ca aarohapari.naahasampanno ca. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo purisakha.lu"nkaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ ``tayo ca, bhikkhave, assaparasse {assasadasse (sii syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} desessaami tayo ca purisaparasse {purisasadasse (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katame ^a^M1.0293^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, tayo assaparassaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assaparasso javasampanno hoti; na va.n.nasampanno na aarohapari.naahasampanno. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assaparasso javasampanno hoti va.n.nasampanno ca; na aarohapari.naahasampanno. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assaparasso javasampanno ca hoti va.n.nasampanno ca aarohapari.naahasampanno ca. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo assaparassaa.

[01] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, tayo purisaparassaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco purisaparasso javasampanno hoti; na va.n.nasampanno na aarohapari.naahasampanno. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti va.n.nasampanno ca; na aarohapari.naahasampanno. idha pana, bhikkhave ^a^T1.0373^ea^, ekacco purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti va.n.nasampanno ca aarohapari.naahasampanno ca.

[03] 157-163^b^.^eb^ ``tisso ^a^T1.0380^ea^ ^a^V1.0333^ea^ ^a^P1.0295^ea^ ^a^M1.0300^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, pa.tipadaa. katamaa tisso? aagaa.lhaa pa.tipadaa, nijjhaamaa pa.tipadaa, majjhimaa pa.tipadaa. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, aagaa.lhaa pa.tipadaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco eva.mvaadii hoti eva.mdi.t.thi -- `natthi kaamesu doso'ti. so kaamesu paatabyata.m aapajjati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, aagaa.lhaa pa.tipadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, nijjhaamaa pa.tipadaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco acelako hoti muttaacaaro, hatthaapalekhano {hatthaavalekhano (syaa0 ka.m0) dii0 ni0 1.394; ma0 ni0 1.155 passitabba.m}, na ehibhadantiko, na ti.t.thabhadantiko, naabhiha.ta.m na uddissakata.m na nimantana.m saadiyati. so na kumbhimukhaa pa.tigga.nhaati, na ka.lopimukhaa {kha.lopimukhaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} pa.tigga.nhaati na e.lakamantara.m na da.n.damantara.m na musalamantara.m na dvinna.m bhu~njamaanaana.m na gabbhiniyaa na paayamaanaaya na purisantaragataaya na sa"nkittiisu na yattha saa upa.t.thito hoti na yattha makkhikaa sa.n.dasa.n.dacaarinii na maccha.m na ma.msa.m na sura.m na meraya.m, na thusodaka.m pivati. so ekaagaariko vaa hoti ekaalopiko, dvaagaariko vaa hoti dvaalopiko... sattaagaariko vaa hoti sattaalopiko; ekissaapi dattiyaa yaapeti, dviihipi dattiihi yaapeti... sattahipi dattiihi yaapeti; ekaahikampi aahaara.m aahaareti, dvaahikampi aahaara.m aahaareti... sattaahikampi aahaara.m aahaareti -- iti evaruupa.m addhamaasikampi pariyaayabhattabhojanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati.

[03] so saakabhakkhopi hoti, saamaakabhakkhopi hoti, niivaarabhakkhopi hoti, daddulabhakkhopi hoti, ha.tabhakkhopi hoti ^a^T1.0381^ea^, ka.nhabhakkhopi hoti, aacaamabhakkhopi hoti, pi~n~naakabhakkhopi hoti, ti.nabhakkhopi hoti, gomayabhakkhopi hoti, vanamuulaphalaahaaro yaapeti pavattaphalabhojii.
